This_DT increase_NN is_VBZ shared_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT circles_NNS except_IN Darjeeling_NNP ,_, which_WDT shows_VBZ a_DT slight_JJ decrease_NN ._.

II_NNP ._.
The_DT returns_NNS of_IN the_DT vaccine_NN circles_NNS are_VBP trustworthy_JJ ,_, since_IN they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN subjected_VBN to_TO careful_VB scrutiny_JJ by_IN comparison_NN with_IN actual_JJ vaccinations_NNS by_IN trustworthy_JJ officers_NNS ._.
They_PRP amount_VBP to_TO 573,170_CD ,_, or_CC 72.3_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT whole_NN ._.
The_DT dispensary_JJ vaccine_NN returns_NNS are_VBP not_RB so_RB reliable_JJ as_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT circles_NNS ,_, since_IN much_RB of_IN this_DT vaccination_NN has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN inspected_VBN and_CC verified_VBN as_IN frequently_RB and_CC carefully_RB as_IN is_VBZ desirable_JJ ._.
The_DT amount_NN of_IN check_NN and_CC supervision_NN exercised_VBN over_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN dispensary_JJ vac-_JJ cinators_NNS and_CC ex-inoculators_NNS varied_VBN in_IN the_DT different_JJ districts_NNS ,_, as_IN will_MD be_VB noticed_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ remarks_NNS under_IN that_DT head_NN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ one_CD feature_NN in_IN dispensary_JJ vaccination_NN which_WDT I_PRP will_MD now_RB notice_RB ,_, viz_NN ._.
the_DT percentage_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS ._.
In_IN season_NN 1872-73_CD the_DT percentage_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS in_IN dispensary_JJ vaccination_NN was_VBD 89.33_CD ,_, whereas_NNS in_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN it_PRP is_VBZ 79.12_CD ,_, showing_VBG that_IN greater_JJR pains_NNS were_VBD taken_VBN in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN check_NN and_CC supervision_NN to_TO ascertain_VB the_DT truth_NN ._.
In_IN addition_NN to_TO the_DT 493_CD ex-inoculators_NNS who_WP worked_VBD and_CC submitted_VBD their_PRP$ returns_NNS ,_, there_EX were_VBD others_NNS who_WP were_VBD also_RB engaged_VBN in_IN vaccination_NN ,_, but_CC who_WP never_RB sent_VBD in_IN any_DT return_NN ._.
The_DT unrepresented_JJ work_NN of_IN these_DT additional_JJ men_NNS would_MD more_JJR than_IN compensate_VB any_DT exaggeration_NN or_CC inaccuracy_NN in_IN the_DT returns_NNS of_IN dispensary_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT figures_NNS given_VBN in_IN the_DT above_JJ statement_NN may_MD be_VB accepted_VBN as_IN very_RB near_IN the_DT truth_NN ._.
But_CC even_RB taking_VBG the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS at_IN 791,634_CD ,_, I_PRP find_VBP it_PRP falls_VBZ far_RB short_JJ of_IN the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT province_NN ._.
The_DT population_NN being_VBG 68_CD millions_NNS ,_, the_DT birth-rate_NN ,_, at_IN 30_CD per_IN 1,000_CD ,_, would_MD be_VB 2,040,000_CD ,_, whereas_VBD the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS is_VBZ 791,634_CD ,_, or_CC a_DT little_RB more_JJR than_IN one-third_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, satis-_JJ factory_NN to_TO find_VB that_DT in_IN this_DT respect_NN some_DT progress_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, since_IN in_IN season_NN 1872-73_CD the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS did_VBD not_RB reach_VB quite_RB one-third_NN of_IN the_DT birth-rate_NN ._.

Dr._NNP Gupta_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ deputy_NN superintendents_NNS worked_VBD very_RB hard_RB during_IN the_DT season_NN ._.

22_CD ._.
Small-pox.8_JJ REPORT_NNP ._.

gang_NN ._.
This_DT year_NN he_PRP pointed_VBD out_RP an_DT area_NN where_WRB the_DT gang_NN was_VBD to_TO work_VB ,_, so_IN that_IN he_PRP might_MD inspect_VB them_PRP twice_RB during_IN the_DT season_NN ._.

9_CD 31_CD ._.
I_PRP am_VBP sure_JJ Dr._NNP Charles_NNP if_IN asked_VBN will_MD &_CC quot_VB ;_: be_VB glad_VBN to_TO supply_VB Dr._NNP Lidderdale_NNP with_IN a_DT number_NN of_IN copies_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ Bengali_NNP pamphlet_NN on_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC also_RB give_VBP him_PRP permission_NN to_TO translate_VB the_DT other_JJ brochure_NN on_IN popular_JJ information_NN regarding_VBG small-pox_NN ,_, inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC vaccination_NN into_IN Nepalese_NNP ._.

32_CD ._.

in_IN Lohardugga_NNP The_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN small-pox_NN in_IN the_DT circle_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN was_VBD 667_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT 338_CD were_VBD reported_VBN from_IN Hazareebagh_NNP ,_, 201_CD from_IN Lohardugga_NNP ,_, 95_CD from_IN Manbhoom_NNP ,_, and_CC 33_CD from_IN Singbhoom_NNP ._.
The_DT mortality_NN was_VBD much_RB larger_JJR this_DT year_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ one_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT disease_NN prevailed_VBD to_TO a_DT greater_JJR extent_NN ._.
Ex-inoculators_NNS ._.
38_CD ._.
Vaccination_NN by_IN the_DT agency_NN of_IN ex-inoculators_NNS in_IN the_DT Chota_NNP Nagpore_NNP division_NN has_VBZ now_RB become_VBN an_DT institution_NN ,_, more_RBR especially_RB in_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN Manbhoom_NNP and_CC Singbhoom_NNP ,_, as_IN will_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT abstract_JJ reports_NNS of_IN the_DT civil_JJ surgeons_NNS of_IN those_DT districts_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Wood_NNP has_VBZ given_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN a_DT summary_NN of_IN the_DT proceedings_NNS of_IN the_DT ex-inoculators_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ circle_NN ._.
In_IN Manbhoom_NNP six_CD Hindustani_NNP vaccinators_NNS and_CC 23_CD ex-inoculators_NNS worked_VBN in_IN 295_CD villages_NNS ,_, and_CC vaccinated_VBD 15,150_CD cases_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT Mr._NNP Wilson_NNP ,_, the_DT civil_JJ surgeon_NN ,_, verified_VBD 12,213_CD ._.
Out_IN of_IN the_DT number_NN verified_VBD ,_, 9,775_CD ,_, or_CC 87.85_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
In_IN Singbhoom_NNP 24_CD ex-inoculators_NNS were_VBD engaged_VBN in_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC worked_VBD in_IN 291_CD villages_NNS ._.
The_DT number_NN operated_VBD was_VBD 17,777_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT 16,722_CD are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN successful_JJ and_CC 455_CD unsuccessful_JJ ,_, though_IN Mr._NNP Manook_NNP inspected_VBD only_RB 541_CD cases_NNS ._.
Thirty_NNP converted_VBD inoculators_NNS worked_VBN in_IN Hazareebagh_NNP and_CC vaccinated_VBD 10,132_CD persons_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP 9,320_CD ,_, or_CC 93.21_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN successful_JJ ,_, and_CC 37_CD men_NNS vaccinated_VBD 26,804_CD persons_NNS in_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Lohardugga_NNP ,_, and_CC 14,021_CD ,_, or_CC 97.90_CD ,_, successfully_RB ._.
No_DT check*_NN or_CC supervision_NN was_VBD exercised_VBN over_IN the_DT operations_NNS of_IN these_DT men_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT figures_NNS are_VBP not_RB very_RB reliable_JJ ._.
Three_CD Christian_JJ Coles_NNP learnt_POS vaccination_NN and_CC operated_VBD on_IN 2,307_CD persons_NNS ._.
Five_CD others_NNS also_RB worked_VBD ,_, but_CC submitted_VBD no_DT return_NN ._.
A_DT great_JJ many_JJ apprentices_NNS ,_, exact_JJ number_NN not_RB given_VBN ,_, were_VBD attached_VBN to_TO the_DT circle_NN ._.
Though_IN they_PRP received_VBD no_DT allowance_NN ,_, they_PRP worked_VBD remarkably_RB well_RB ,_, as_IN they_PRP had_VBD the_DT prospect_NN of_IN being_VBG appointed_VBN as_IN vaccinators_NNS whenever_WRB vacancies_NNS occurred_VBD ._.
The_DT native_JJ superintendents_NNS are_VBP reported_VBN to_TO have_VB taken_VBN more_JJR pains_NNS and_CC trouble_NN for_IN them_PRP than_IN for_IN the_DT establishment_NN ._.
They_PRP vaccinated_VBD 17,922_CD persons_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP 17,667_CD ,_, or_CC 99.53_CD ,_, were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
I_PRP concur_VBP with_IN Dr._NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: Wood_NNP 's_POS remark_NN that_IN these_DT apprentices_NNS should_MD receive_VB some_DT subsistence_NN allowance_NN ._.
Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP circle_NN ._.
39_CD ._.
Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP circle_NN ,_, establishment.REPORT_NN ._.
11_CD rendered_JJ great_JJ assistance_NN and_CC facilitated_VBD the_DT work_NN ._.

Inspection_NN ._.
Establishment_NN ._.
42_CD ._.
Baboo_NNP Bhoobun_NNP Mohun_NNP Mitter_NNP was_VBD on_IN inspection_NN tour_NN from_IN 15th_CD October_NNP to_TO 24th_CD May_NNP ,_, and_CC visited_VBD each_DT gang_NN four_CD or_CC six_CD times_NNS ._.
He_PRP verified_VBD upwards_NNS of_IN 21,000_CD cases_NNS ,_, comparing_VBG the_DT names_NNS with_IN the_DT registers_NNS ,_, and_CC inspected_JJ village_NN after_IN village_NN in_IN a_DT systematic_JJ plan_NN ._.

Small-pox_NNP ._.
50_CD ._.
The_DT year_NN 1873-74_CD was_VBD remarkable_JJ for_IN the_DT great_JJ prevalence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ._.
The_DT disease_NN was_VBD not_RB absent_JJ from_IN any_DT district_NN ,_, while_IN it_PRP assumed_VBD an_DT epidemic_JJ form_NN in_IN several_JJ localities_NNS ._.

Small-pox_NNP was_VBD more_RBR or_CC less_RBR severe_JJ in_IN Jessore_NNP ,_, Moorshedabad_NNP ,_, Cuttack_NNP ,_, Pooree_NNP ,_, Noakholly_NNP ,_, Goalpara_NNP ,_, Nowgong_NNP ,_, Arrah_NNP ,_, Sarun_NNP ,_, Chumparun_NNP ,_, Monghyr_NNP ,_, Hazareebagh_NNP ,_, Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP ,_, and_CC other_JJ districts_NNS ._.
There_EX is_VBZ no_DT doubt_NN that_IN 1873-74_CD was_VBD a_DT year_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ._.
The_DT usual_JJ cause_NN which_WDT lights_VBZ up_RP small-pox_NN is_VBZ always_RB present_JJ in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, namely_RB the_DT baneful_JJ practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN without_IN any_DT rule_NN or_CC restriction_NN ._.
But_CC this_DT alone_RB could_MD not_RB account_VB for_IN the_DT unusual_JJ prevalence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN during_IN the_DT last_JJ year_NN ._.
There_EX must_MD have_VB been_VBN other_JJ causes_NNS at_IN work_NN ._.
What_WP those_DT causes_NNS are_VBP ,_, have_VBP not_RB yet_RB been_VBN ascertained_VBN ._.
Some_DT atmospheric_JJ conditions_NNS are_VBP believed_VBN to_TO exercise_VB much_JJ influence_NN over_IN small-pox_NN ._.
Atmospheric_JJ changes_NNS are_VBP above_IN human_JJ control_NN ,_, but_CC we_PRP should_MD endeavour_VB to_TO reduce_VB to_TO a_DT minimum_NN the_DT chances_NNS of_IN small-pox_JJ spreading_NN ._.
This_DT can_MD be_VB effected_VBN by_IN thorough_NN and_CC systematic_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC by_IN putting_VBG a_DT stop_NN to_TO the_DT baneful_JJ practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Charles_NNP has_VBZ brought_VBN out_RP fully_RB the_DT benefits_NNS which_WDT thorough_VBP and_CC systematic_JJ vaccination_NN confers_NNS on_IN a_DT community_NN ._.
Though_IN case_NN after_IN case_NN of_IN small-pox_NN was_VBD imported_VBN into_IN the_DT city_NN ,_, the_DT spark_NN was_VBD soon_RB extinguished_VBN ._.

Before_IN he_PRP had_VBD time_NN to_TO carry_VB his_PRP$ designs_NN further_RBR into_IN execution_NN he_PRP was_VBD tried_VBN before_IN a_DT magistrate_NN and_CC sentenced_VBN to_TO the_DT full_JJ penalty_NN of_IN confinement_NN with_IN hard_JJ labour_NN for_IN three_CD calendar_JJ months_NNS ._.
Before_IN moving_VBG for_IN a_DT prosecution_NN I_PRP satisfied_VBD myself_PRP that_IN this_DT man_NN was_VBD not_RB a_DT professional_JJ inoculator_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN he_PRP had_VBD not_RB been_VBN driven_VBN into_IN breaking_VBG the_DT law_NN by_IN the_DT loss_NN of_IN his_PRP$ hereditary_JJ occupation_NN ._.
The_DT man_NN 's_POS name_NN was_VBD Oodeen_NNP Bahalia_NNP ,_, and_CC sufficiently_RB points_NNS him_PRP out_RP as_IN deserving_NN of_IN no_DT sympathy_NN while_IN inoculating_VBG in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, even_RB had_VBD the_DT investigation_NN not_RB shown_VBN that_IN he_PRP was_VBD deserving_VBG of_IN special_JJ punishment_NN ._.
Defects_NNS in_IN the_DT Act_NNP prohibiting_VBG inoculation_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ most_RBS unlikely_JJ that_IN recourse_NN will_MD have_VB to_TO be_VB made_VBN sufficiently_RB often_RB to_TO this_DT law_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP to_TO render_VB it_PRP advisable_JJ to_TO have_VB the_DT Act_NNP amended_VBD ;_: but_CC in_IN case_NN any_DT emergency_NN may_MD arise_VB in_IN other_JJ districts_NNS ,_, it_PRP may_MD perhaps_RB not_RB be_VB out_IN of_IN place_NN for_IN me_PRP to_TO put_VB on_IN record_NN that_IN the_DT Act_NNP ,_, as_IN it_PRP at_IN present_JJ stands_NNS ,_, is_VBZ not_RB an_DT easy_JJ one_CD to_TO work_VB ._.
While_IN conducting_VBG the_DT prosecution_NN with_IN the_DT law_NN officers_NNS of_IN Government_NNP it_PRP appeared20_VBD CALCUTTA_NNP AND_CC THE_NNP SUBURBS_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ for_IN me_PRP to_TO express_VB in_IN a_DT more_RBR vivid_JJ form_NN the_DT mistake_NN it_PRP would_MD be_VB to_TO leave_VB such_JJ small_JJ unprotected_JJ localities_NNS for_IN small-pox_NN to_TO keep_VB itself_PRP up_RP unchecked_JJ by_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC month_NN by_IN month_NN be_VB carried_VBN into_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC into_IN the_DT surrounding_JJ districts_NNS for_IN which_WDT vaccine_NN establishments_NNS have_VBP been_VBN provided_VBN ._.
Small-pox_JJ thus_RB spread_VBP about_IN costs_NNS the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN heavy_NN sums_NNS to_TO stamp_VB out_RP ;_: and_CC not_RB only_RB so_RB but_CC ,_, as_IN frequently_RB pointed_VBN out_RP before_IN ,_, a_DT vaccinated_JJ tract_NN of_IN country_NN only_RB receives_VBZ relative_JJ ,_, and_CC not_RB absolute_VB ,_, immunity_NN from_IN small-_JJ pox_NN ,_, and_CC each_DT vaccinated_JJ person_NN who_WP takes_VBZ the_DT disease_NN after_IN having_VBG been_VBN vaccinated_VBN naturally_RB shakes_VBZ the_DT confidence_NN of_IN the_DT community_NN among_IN whom_WP it_PRP occurs_VBZ in_IN the_DT efficacy_NN of_IN the_DT prophylactic_JJ ._.
A_DT few_JJ years_NNS hence_RB all_DT of_IN those_DT included_VBN within_IN the_DT vaccine_NN circles_NNS will_MD have_VB had_VBN sufficient_JJ reason_NN afforded_VBD to_TO them_PRP to_TO believe_VB in_IN the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT protection_NN they_PRP receive_VBP ,_, and_CC any_DT stray_JJ instances_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN after_IN the_DT protection_NN afforded_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN will_MD produce_VB little_JJ effect_NN on_IN their_PRP$ minds_NNS ._.
After_IN they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN witness_JJ to_TO the_DT comparative_JJ immunity_NN from_IN small-_JJ pox_NN of_IN a_DT well_NN vaccinated_JJ population_NN ,_, they_PRP will_MD listen_VB to_TO reason_NN and_CC appreciate_NN at_IN their_PRP$ true_JJ worth_NN any_DT cases_NNS in_IN which_WDT vaccination_NN falls_VBZ short_JJ of_IN what_WP they_PRP expected_VBD ._.
For_IN the_DT present_JJ ,_, while_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ on_IN its_PRP$ trial_NN among_IN ignorant_JJ millions_NNS ,_, I_PRP conceive_VBP it_PRP to_TO be_VB the_DT duty_NN of_IN all_DT to_TO arrange_VB as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ that_IN its_PRP$ shortcomings_NNS shall_MD be_VB kept_VBN out_IN of_IN sight_NN ._.
One_CD point_NN of_IN importance_NN to_TO secure_VB this_DT end_NN is_VBZ so_RB to_TO arrange_VB that_IN no_DT unprotected_JJ spots_NNS remain_VBP in_IN the_DT centre_NN of_IN vaccine_NN circles_NNS ._.
For_IN the_DT above_JJ reasons_NNS ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO urge_VB that_IN nothing_NN should_MD be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO stand_VB in_IN the_DT way_NN of_IN providing_VBG vaccination_NN for_IN the_DT four_CD districts_NNS which_WDT stand_VBP out_RP conspicuously_RB for_IN their_PRP$ want_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, while_IN being_VBG surrounded_VBN on_IN every_DT side_NN by_IN other_JJ districts_NNS which_WDT hem_VBP them_PRP in_IN by_IN a_DT population_NN for_IN which_WDT vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN provided_VBN ._.
Memorandum_NN by_IN H._NNP B._NNP BUCKLE_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, Presidency_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, (_( No_UH ._.
10_CD ,_, dated_VBN Fort_NNP William_NNP ,_, the_DT 17th_CD June_NNP 1874_CD ._. )_)
FORWARDS_IN the_DT annual_JJ returns_NNS and_CC report_NN of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1873-74_CD ,_, submitted_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendent-General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ._.
The_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT establishment_NN and_CC the_DT practical_JJ results_NNS demonstrated_VBN by_IN the_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN treated_VBN ,_, and_CC of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN that_DT disease_NN in_IN the_DT populous_JJ city_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ suburbs_NN ,_, and_CC which_WDT can_MD only_RB be_VB ascribed_VBN to_TO the_DT thorough_JJ manner_NN in_IN which_WDT protection_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN given_VBN ,_, is_VBZ most_JJS satisfactory_JJ ._.
This_DT office_NN memorandum_NN No_NNP ._.
9L_CD ,_, dated_VBD 3rd_CD June_NNP Bengal_NNP Vaccination_NNP Report_NNP for_IN 1872-73_JJ ._.
With_IN reference_NN to_TO Dr._NNP Charles_NNP 's_POS proposal_NN for_IN extending_VBG the_DT area_NN of_IN vaccination_NN round_NN Calcutta_NNP ,_, he_PRP recommends_VBZ that_IN Midnapore_NNP should_MD be_VB included_VBN in_IN the_DT vaccinating_NN circles_NNS ._.
At_IN present_PDT a_DT scheme_NN of_IN vaccinating_VBG by_IN the_DT local_JJ inoculators_NNS who_WP have_VBP been_VBN instructed_VBN in_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ under_IN trial_NN ;_: the_DT magistrate_NN and_CC the_DT civil_JJ surgeon_NN are_VBP very_RB sanguine_JJ of_IN success.In_NN forwarding_VBG the_DT vaccine_JJ report_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, Metropolitan_NNP circle_NN ,_, attention_NN was_VBD requested_VBN to_TO Dr._NNP Mathew_NNP 's_POS report_NN for_IN the_DT year_NN 1872-73_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ suggested_VBN that_IN further_JJ inquiry_NN should_MD be_VB made_VBN as_IN to_TO how_WRB the_DT system_NN has_VBZ answered_VBN this_DT yearbefore_NN putting_VBG a_DT stop_NN to_TO it_PRP and_CC introducting_VBG another_DT ._.
A_DT great_JJ point_NN would_MD be_VB gained_VBN if_IN it_PRP were_VBD possible_JJ to_TO encourage_VB and_CC develop_VB a_DT local_JJ scheme_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN a_DT district_NN rather_RB than_IN the_DT more_RBR forced_JJ one_CD of_IN vaccination_NN by_IN a_DT special_JJ agency_NN ._.
The_DT real_JJ difference_NN is_VBZ in_IN the_DT thorough_JJ supervision_NN and_CC inspection_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN that_WDT is_VBZ provided_VBN for_IN in_IN the_DT latter_NN ;_: but_CC surely_RB it_PRP would_MD be_VB possible_JJ to_TO provide_VB for_IN this_DT in_IN a_DT system_NN like_IN that_DT in_IN practice_NN in_IN the_DT Midnapore_NNP district_NN ._.

The_DT 2nd_CD Metropolitan_NNP circle.24_NN METROPOLITAN_NNP CIRCLES_NNP ._.
Another_DT gang_NN under_IN head_NN vaccinator_NN Troylukho_NNP Nath_NNP Chuckerbutty_NNP commenced_VBD oper-_JJ ations_NNS in_IN sudder_NN thana_NN Burdwan_NNP ,_, but_CC they_PRP were_VBD soon_RB laid_VBN up_RP with_IN fever_NN and_CC became_VBD almost_RB useless_JJ ._.
The_DT men_NNS became_VBD so_RB much_JJ dispirited_VBD that_IN it_PRP was_VBD cruel_JJ and_CC useless_JJ to_TO keep_VB them_PRP there_RB any_DT longer_JJR ,_, so_IN I_PRP ordered_VBD their_PRP$ removal_NN to_TO Khundghose_NNP and_CC Roynah_NNP ,_, as_IN about_IN a_DT third_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT former_JJ and_CC a_DT fifth_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ thana_NN had_VBD remained_VBN over_IN from_IN last_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT health_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS improved_VBN by_IN the_DT change_NN ,_, and_CC they_PRP were_VBD able_JJ to_TO do_VB some_DT work_NN ._.
They_PRP vaccin-_VBP ated_VBN nearly_RB all_PDT the_DT unprotected_JJ villages_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD about_RB to_TO undertake_VB some_DT other_JJ thana_NNS when_WRB they_PRP were_VBD ordered_VBN to_TO proceed_VB to_TO Beerbhoom_NNP to_TO stamp_VB out_RP small-pox_NN which_WDT had_VBD been_VBN raging_VBG there_RB for_IN some_DT time_NN ._.
They_PRP visited_VBD 77_CD villages_NNS situated_VBN in_IN four_CD thanas_NN ,_, and_CC vaccinated_VBD 9,211_CD persons_NNS in_IN the_DT Beerbhoom_NNP district_NN ,_, notwithstanding_VBG all_DT opposition_NN from_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC without_IN any_DT assistance_NN whatever_WDT from_IN the_DT district_NN authorities_NNS ._.
A_DT third_JJ gang_NN ,_, under_IN head_NN vaccinator_NN Woomesh_NNP Chunder_NNP Mookerjee_NNP ,_, vaccinated_VBD in_IN thanas_JJ Culna_NNP ,_, Gangoor_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT portion_NN of_IN Montessur_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT first-named_JJ thana_NN there_EX were_VBD several_JJ khas_NNS villages_NNS ,_, i.e_NN ._.
villages_NNS devoted_VBN to_TO the_DT worship_NN of_IN Shitollah_NNP ,_, the_DT goddess_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ,_, and_CC opposed_VBD to_TO both_DT vaccination_NN and_CC inoculation_NN ._.
Woomesh_NNP Chunder_NNP 's_POS gang_NN deserve_RB much_JJ credit_NN for_IN having_VBG succeeded_VBN in_IN vaccinating_VBG nearly_RB all_DT of_IN them_PRP ,_, though_IN there_EX still_RB remain_VBP some_DT houses_NNS and_CC families_NNS that_WDT have_VBP not_RB yet_RB accepted_VBN vaccination_NN ._.
A_DT fourth_JJ gang_NN ,_, under_IN head_NN vaccinator_NN Tarruck_NNP Chunder_NNP Chatterjee_NNP ,_, commenced_VBD in_IN thana_NN Selimabad_NNP ,_, where_WRB they_PRP suffered_VBD dreadfully_RB from_IN fever_NN ;_: their_PRP$ peon_NN died_VBD ,_, and_CC one_CD or_CC two_CD vaccin-_JJ ators_NNS deserted_VBD through_IN fear_NN ._.
These_DT and_CC other_JJ untoward_JJ circumstances_NNS interfered_VBN with_IN the_DT thorough_JJ vaccination_NN of_IN the_DT thana_NN ,_, for_IN which_WDT I_PRP had_VBD to_TO make_VB arrangements_NNS with_IN the_DT 2nd_CD circle_NN ._.
From_IN Selimabad_NNP the_DT gang_NN proceeded_VBD to_TO thana_VB Jehanabad_NNP ,_, where_WRB they_PRP vaccinated_VBD nearly_RB all_PDT the_DT unprotected_JJ villages_NNS in_IN its_PRP$ southern_JJ portion_NN ._.
A_DT few_JJ still_RB remain_VBP to_TO be_VB done_VBN ._.
They_PRP also_RB vaccinated_VBD some_DT villages_NNS in_IN the_DT adjoining_VBG thana_NN of_IN Khanacool_NNP ._.
A_DT fifth_JJ gang_NN ,_, under_IN first_JJ class_NN vaccinator_NN Ram_NNP Chunder_NNP Nusker_NNP ,_, got_VBD thana_JJ Bullaghur_NNP ,_, in_IN Hooghly_NNP ,_, which_WDT they_PRP completely_RB vaccinated_VBD in_IN three_CD months_NNS ._.
To_TO provide_VB fresh_JJ work_NN for_IN this_DT gang_NN I_PRP communicated_VBD with_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP of_IN 24-Pergunnahs_JJ ,_, and_CC eventually_RB sent_VBD them_PRP to_TO thana_VB Diamond_NNP Harbour_NNP ._.
Meantime_RB the_DT gang_NN crossed_VBD the_DT river_NN Hooghly_NNP and_CC vaccinated_VBD some_DT villages_NNS in_IN thanas_JJ Chogdah_NNP and_CC Ranaghat_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Nuddea_NNP district_NN ._.
A_DT sixth_JJ gang_NN ,_, under_IN first_JJ class_NN vaccinator_NN Koylash_NNP Chunder_NNP Mitter_NNP ,_, took_VBD thanas_NN Oolaberiah_NNP and_CC Shampore_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Howrah_NNP district_NN ._.
Area_NNP of_IN 3rd_CD circle_NN ._.
The_DT area_NN of_IN the_DT country_NN undertaken_VBN by_IN the_DT 3rd_CD circle_NN is_VBZ 1,333_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ,_, and_CC popu-_JJ lation_NN 862,038_CD ._.
The_DT vaccinators_NNS visited_VBD 1,844_CD villages_NNS and_CC vaccinated_VBD 168,118_CD persons_NNS ,_, of_IN whom_WP the_DT deputy_NN superintendent_NN inspected_VBD 119,366_CD ,_, or_CC 71.0_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.

Baraset_NNP ,_, Dum-Dum_NNP ,_, and_CC Ooriaparah_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT first_JJ week_NN of_IN January_NNP I_PRP again_RB proceeded_VBD to_TO Coomercolly_NNP ,_, as_IN my_PRP$ first_JJ visit_NN to_TO that_DT thana_NN had_VBD been_VBN very_RB short_JJ and_CC hurried_VBD ._.
After_IN returning_VBG to_TO Calcutta_NNP I_PRP went_VBD down_RB again_RB to_TO thanas_VB Oolaberiah_NNP and_CC Shampore_NNP ,_, and_CC inspected_VBD the_DT vaccine_NN operations_NNS there_RB ;_: came_VBD back_RB and_CC started_VBD on_IN a_DT long_JJ tour_NN ,_, beginning_VBG with_IN thana_JJ Culna_NNP ,_, passed_VBD on_IN to_TO thana_VB Selimabad_NNP ._.
Leaving_VBG Selimabad_NNP I_PRP proceeded_VBD to_TO thanas_VB Dhunniakhally_NNP and_CC Hurripaul_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Hooghly_NNP district_NN ;_: crossed_VBD the_DT Damoodur_NNP ,_, and_CC went_VBD over_IN to_TO the_DT southern_JJ portion_NN of_IN thana_NN Jehanabad_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Burdwan_NNP district_NN ._.
From_IN thana_JJ Jehanabad_NNP came_VBD back_RB to_TO Hurripal_NNP ,_, and_CC thence_NN to_TO Buddybatee_NNP and_CC Chunditollah_NNP ._.
After_IN resting_VBG for_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD days_NNS ,_, started_VBD again_RB for_IN the_DT Burdwan_NNP district_NN ._.

From_IN Montessur_NNP I_PRP returned_VBD to_TO Calcutta_NNP at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP ,_, when_WRB the_DT season_NN expired_VBD ._.
I_PRP regret_VBP I_PRP had_VBD no_DT time_NN left_VBD to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT extreme_JJ north_NN and_CC east_NN of_IN the_DT 24-Pergunnahs_JJ ,_, but_CC Deputy_NNP Superintendent_NNP Ramsoonder_NNP Ghose_NNP has_VBZ thoroughly_RB inspected_VBN all_PDT the_DT thanas_NN in_IN that_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN ._.
With_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN the_DT gang_NN deputed_VBD to_TO Beerbhoom_NNP ,_, I_PRP visited_VBD every_DT gang_NN twice_RB ,_, and_CC some_DT three_CD times_NNS ,_, during_IN the_DT season_NN ._.
The_DT Beerbhoom_NNP gang_NN was_VBD inspected_VBN by_IN Deputy_NNP Superintendent_NNP Jadub_NNP Chunder_NNP Ghose_NNP ._.
Number_NNP inspected_VBN by_IN superintendent_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN inspected_VBN by_IN me_PRP during_IN the_DT season_NN is_VBZ 47,165_CD ,_, against_IN 51,368_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ season_NN ,_, showing_VBG a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 4,203_CD ._.
There_EX are_VBP several_JJ causes_NNS for_IN this_DT falling_VBG off_RP ,_, the_DT first_JJ and_CC principal_JJ being_VBG that_IN the_DT three_CD circles_NNS were_VBD scattered_VBN in_IN three_CD ._.
districts_NNS ,_, whereas_NNS in_IN the_DT previous_JJ season_NN the_DT first_JJ and_CC second_JJ circles_NNS worked_VBN near_IN each_DT other_JJ in_IN Nuddea_NNP ._.
Then_RB ,_, again_RB ,_, in_IN season_NN 1872-73_CD the_DT first_JJ two_CD circles_NNS got_VBD virgin_JJ soil_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP were_VBD ,_, where_WRB vaccination_NN had_VBD never_RB been_VBN done_VBN before_IN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB the_DT numbers_NNS vaccinated_VBN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN inspected_VBN ,_, were_VBD larger_JJR ._.
I_PRP lost_VBD much_JJ time_NN in_IN travelling_VBG from_IN one_CD circle_NN to_TO another_DT ,_, as_IN the_DT details_NNS given_VBN above_RB will_MD show_VB ._.
I_PRP inspected_VBD 614_CD villages_NNS ,_, situated_VBN in_IN twenty-five_JJ different_JJ thanas_NNS ,_, exclusive_JJ of_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP circle_NN ._.
The_DT result_NN of_IN my_PRP$ inspection_NN is_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ table_NN :_: METROPOLITAN_NNP CIRCLES_NNP ._.
27_CD In_IN places_NNS which_WDT were_VBD vaccinated_VBN for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT good_JJ deal_NN of_IN opposition_NN at_IN first_JJ ,_, such_JJ as_IN Jonye_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ surrounding_NN villages_NNS in_IN thana_NN Chunditollah_NNP ,_, the_DT khas_NN villages_NNS in_IN thana_NN Culna_NNP and_CC thana_JJ Montessur_NNP in_IN the_DT Burdwan_NNP district_NN ._.
In_IN Jonye_NNP the_DT vaccinators_NNS succeeded_VBD after_IN three_CD months_NNS ;_: and_CC in_IN Montessur_NNP the_DT Brahmin_NNP vaccinators_NNS worked_VBD on_IN the_DT prejudices_NNS of_IN the_DT sudra_NN zemindar_NN by_IN laying_VBG huttya_NN ,_, and_CC thereby_RB bringing_VBG Baboo_NNP Parbuttychurn_NNP Roy_NNP round_NN ,_, to_TO whom_WP all_PDT the_DT neighbouring_JJ villages_NNS looked_VBD up_RP ._.

was_VBD extensively_RB carried_VBN on_IN during_IN the_DT past_JJ season_NN ._.

Character_NN of_IN vaccination.30_JJ PRESIDENCY_NNP CIRCLE_NNP prevent_VBP the_DT spread_NN of_IN the_DT disease_NN ,_, this_DT occupies_VBZ some_DT time_NN ,_, during_IN which_WDT disease_NN is_VBZ extending_VBG and_CC considerable_JJ loss_NN of_IN life_NN taking_VBG place_NN ._.
Instruction_NN of_IN inoculators_NNS With_IN reference_NN to_TO Mr._NNP Gupta_NNP 's_POS remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT instruction_NN of_IN inoculators_NNS ,_, the_DT same_JJ necessity_NN as_IN in_IN all_DT vaccination_NN operations_NNS for_IN a_DT really_RB efficient_JJ supervising_VBG and_CC controlling_VBG agency_NN exists_NNS ._.
The_DT protective_JJ influence_NN of_IN vaccination_NN depending_VBG so_RB completely_RB on_IN the_DT care_NN with_IN which_WDT the_DT operation_NN is_VBZ performed_VBN and_CC the_DT selection_NN of_IN proper_JJ lymph_NN ,_, can_MD not_RB be_VB left_VBN to_TO be_VB carried_VBN out_RP by_IN any_DT agency_NN except_IN it_PRP is_VBZ under_IN thorough_JJ control_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN inspected_VBN by_IN competent_NN and_CC trustworthy_JJ officers_NNS ._.
If_IN this_DT can_MD be_VB arranged_VBN ,_, a_DT system_NN similar_JJ to_TO that_DT in_IN practice_NN in_IN the_DT Midnapore_NNP district_NN might_MD probably_RB answer_VB ._.
There_EX the_DT vaccinators_NNS are_VBP ex-inoculators_NNS ,_, and_CC receive_VB a_DT purwanah_NN from_IN the_DT magistrate_NN granting_VBG them_PRP permission_NN to_TO vaccinate_VB in_IN the_DT villages_NNS named_VBN on_IN the_DT document_NN ._.
The_DT privilege_NN is_VBZ jealously_RB guarded_VBN ;_: all_DT outsiders_NNS ,_, both_DT inoculators_NNS and_CC vaccinators_NNS ,_, are_VBP warned_VBN off_RP as_IN interlopers_NNS ,_, the_DT men_NNS holding_VBG the_DT purwanahs_NN looking_VBG to_TO remunerate_VB themselves_PRP by_IN fees_NNS ._.

The_DT supervising_NN and_CC controlling_VBG agency_NN rests_NNS with_IN the_DT civil_JJ surgeon_NN ,_, and_CC depends_VBZ very_RB much_JJ on_IN the_DT time_NN he_PRP can_MD personally_RB devote_VB to_TO the_DT duty_NN ,_, visiting_VBG and_CC testing_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT trustworthi-_JJ ness_NN of_IN the_DT more_RBR educated_JJ vaccinators_NNS he_PRP entertains_VBZ for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN inspecting_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT men_NNS at_IN the_DT different_JJ villages_NNS ._.
It_PRP seems_VBZ possible_JJ that_IN some_DT system_NN of_IN the_DT kind_NN indicated_VBD might_MD be_VB developed_VBN ,_, while_IN to_TO vaccinate_VB the_DT population_NN of_IN a_DT country_NN by_IN establishments_NNS maintained_VBN for_IN that_DT purpose_NN appears_VBZ ,_, after_IN the_DT first_JJ opposition_NN to_TO the_DT measure_NN has_VBZ been_VBN overcome_VBN ,_, likely_JJ to_TO limit_VB the_DT extent_NN to_TO which_WDT vaccination_NN ought_MD to_TO be_VB carried_VBN out_IN ,_, and_CC to_TO prevent_VB its_PRP$ becoming_VBG at_IN any_DT period_NN either_CC self-supporting_NN or_CC generally_RB accepted_VBN by_IN the_DT community_NN at_IN large_JJ ._.

Mr_NNP Picachy_NNP mentions_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN ,_, which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ been_VBN good_JJ enough_RB to_TO communicate_VB to_TO me_PRP ,_, that_IN one_CD man_NN sent_VBN in_IN a_DT return_NN of_IN what_WP he_PRP had_VBD done_VBN ._.
These_DT men_NNS resorted_VBD to_TO the_DT magistrate_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, as_IN they_PRP knew_VBD they_PRP would_MD not_RB get_VB certificates_NNS of_IN proficiency_NN from_IN me_PRP until_IN I_PRP was_VBD satisfied_VBN they_PRP knew_VBD their_PRP$ work_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD insist_VB on_IN inspecting_VBG it_PRP and_CC taking_VBG returns_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP had_VBN correspondence_NN with_IN Mr_NNP ,_, Kemble_NNP on_IN this_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP seems_VBZ desirous_JJ of_IN giving_VBG me_PRP every_DT assistance_NN ,_, so_IN that_IN these_DT men_NNS may_MD be_VB made_VBN efficient_JJ vaccinators_NNS ._.
With_IN such_PDT a_DT number_NN ,_, each_DT one_CD performing_NN 1,500_CD operations_NNS ,_, the_DT birth-rate_NN of_IN Purneah_NNP would_MD yearly_RB be_VB exceeded_VBN ._.
Inspector_NN of_IN inoculators_NNS required_VBN ._.
The_DT want_NN of_IN an_DT inspector_NN of_IN inoculators_NNS was_VBD severely_RB felt_VBN during_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, as_IN no_DT one_NN would_MD ,_, at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN pay_NN granted_VBN ,_, undertake_VB the_DT work_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ one_CD of_IN constant_JJ travelling_NN and_CC exposure_NN for_IN half_PDT the_DT year_NN ._.
If_IN three_CD suitable_JJ men_NNS are_VBP obtainable_JJ at_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, I_PRP trust_VBP they_PRP may_MD be_VB ordered_VBN up_RP in_IN September_NNP ,_, or_CC at_IN latest_JJS October_NNP ,_, as_IN I_PRP see_VBP no_DT present_JJ prospect_NN of_IN getting_VBG men_NNS in_IN my_PRP$ circle_NN ._.
The_DT pay_NN granted_VBN for_IN a_DT man_NN who_WP has_VBZ for_IN so_RB many_JJ months_NNS to_TO pay_VB for_IN food_NN and_CC lodging_NN :_: every_DT night_NN away_RB from_IN his_PRP$ home_NN is_VBZ too_RB small_JJ to_TO attract_VB trustworthy_JJ men_NNS ._.
Apprentices_NNS ._.
The_DT plan_NN of_IN paying_VBG 42_CD apprentices_NNS while_IN under_IN instruction_NN is_VBZ a_DT most_RBS admirable_JJ measure_NN ,_, from_IN which_WDT I_PRP have_VBP the_DT highest_JJS hopes_NNS as_RB soon_RB as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ brought_VBN into_IN full_JJ working_NN ._.

39_CD (_( e_NN )_) The_DT staff_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS in_IN Darjeeling_NNP is_VBZ three_CD ._.

(_( f_NN )_) There_EX is_VBZ no_DT really_RB good_JJ class_NN available_JJ from_IN which_WDT to_TO choose_VB vaccinators_NNS in_IN Darjeeling_NNP ,_, while_IN the_DT supply_NN in_IN Kumaon_NNP and_CC Gurhwal_NNP must_MD be_VB ample_JJ ._.
The_DT collections_NNS in_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP hills_NNS are_VBP therefore_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT superintendent_NN 's_POS hand_NN alone_RB ._.
From_IN the_DT foregoing_VBG it_PRP must_MD not_RB be_VB supposed_VBN that_IN no_DT lymph_NN can_MD be_VB issued_VBN from_IN Darjee-_NNP ling_NN ,_, or_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ useless_JJ as_IN a_DT source_NN of_IN supply_NN ._.

8_CD each_DT ._.
There_EX were_VBD no_DT changes_NNS among_IN these_DT ._.
Non-working_JJ season_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT non-working_JJ season.50_NN SONTHAL_NNP PERGUNNAHS_NNP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ impelled_VBN ,_, as_IN it_PRP were_VBD ,_, by_IN a_DT sort_NN of_IN religious_JJ fear_NN not_RB to_TO remain_VB unprotected_JJ in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN neighbouring_VBG protected_VBN villages_NNS ,_, with_IN whom_WP it_PRP must_MD have_VB frequent_JJ intercourse_NN ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT greater_JJR portion_NN of_IN pergunnah_NN Ambar_NNP and_CC the_DT northern_JJ portion_NN of_IN pergunnah_NN Sultanabad_NNP ,_, constituting_VBG the_DT zemindaree_JJ portions_NNS of_IN the_DT sub-division_NN of_IN Pakour_NNP ,_, have_VBP been_VBN protected_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN last_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT area_NN ,_, as_IN may_MD be_VB seen_VBN from_IN the_DT accompanying_VBG sketch_NN map_NN ,_, extends_VBZ westward_NN to_TO within_IN a_DT few_JJ miles_NNS of_IN the_DT boundary_JJ line_NN between_IN Pakour_NNP and_CC Doomka_NNP ;_: southward_NN to_TO within_IN a_DT few_JJ miles_NNS of_IN Moheshpore_NNP ,_, the_DT residence_NN of_IN Rajah_NNP Gopal_NNP Singh_NNP Bahadoor_NNP ,_, zemindar_NN of_IN Sultanabad_NNP ;_: and_CC eastward_VB to_TO near_IN the_DT railway_NN line_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN certain_JJ places_NNS even_RB across_IN that_DT line_NN to_TO the_DT east_NN ._.

Number_NNP of_IN villages_NNS protected_VBN ._.
In_IN this_DT area_NN 163_CD villages_NNS have_VBP been_VBN protected_VBN ,_, and_CC a_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN 10,091_CD primary_JJ and_CC two_CD secondary_JJ vaccinations_NNS performed_VBD ;_: 9,804_CD primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN success_NN was_VBD therefore_RB 97.20_CD ,_, excluding_VBG the_DT cases_NNS unknown_VBP from_IN total_JJ ._.
The_DT two_CD cases_NNS of_IN re-vaccination_NN were_VBD successful_JJ ._.
The_DT population_NN of_IN Pakour_NNP sub-division_NN ,_, according_VBG to_TO the_DT last_JJ census_NN ,_, amounts_NNS to_TO 141,304_CD ;_: now_RB ,_, taking_VBG the_DT annual_JJ birth-rate_NN at_IN 30_CD per_IN 1,000_CD ,_, we_PRP have_VBP 4,239.12_CD children_NNS annually_RB born_VBN ,_, so_IN that_IN more_JJR than_IN double_RB this_DT number_NN has_VBZ been_VBN protected_VBN ._.
The_DT village_NN of_IN Pakour_NNP itself_PRP ,_, in_IN which_WDT stands_VBZ the_DT residence_NN of_IN the_DT zemindar_NN of_IN Ambar_NNP ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN left_VBN unprotected_JJ ._.
The_DT reason_NN is_VBZ that_IN for_IN two_CD successive_JJ seasons_NNS past_IN I_PRP have_VBP been_VBN foiled_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ attempts_NNS to_TO get_VB vaccination_NN introduced_VBN into_IN the_DT zemindar_NN 's_POS family_NN and_CC village_NN ._.
This_DT year_NN I_PRP did_VBD not_RB at_IN first_JJ think_NN of_IN renewing_VBG my_PRP$ attempt_NN ,_, because_IN I_PRP was_VBD afraid_JJ that_WDT would_MD weaken_VB the_DT cause_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN their_PRP$ zemindaree_NN ._.
These_DT rich_JJ men_NNS have_VBP a_DT great_JJ influence_NN for_IN good_JJ as_RB well_RB as_IN for_IN evil_NN ._.
If_IN we_PRP succeed_VB with_IN them_PRP ,_, the_DT good_JJ that_WDT is_VBZ done_VBN to_TO the_DT cause_NN of_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ immeasurable_JJ ;_: but_CC if_IN we_PRP fail_VBP ,_, the_DT mischief_NN that_WDT is_VBZ done_VBN is_VBZ quite_RB as_RB great_JJ ,_, if_IN not_RB greater_JJR ._.
People_NNS are_VBP very_RB apt_JJ to_TO follow_VB their_PRP$ example_NN So_IN instead_RB of_IN disturbing_VBG them_PRP at_IN first_JJ and_CC throwing_VBG them_PRP into_IN open_JJ resistance_NN ,_, I_PRP had_VBD this_DT year_NN adopted_VBD the_DT policy_NN of_IN quietly_RB establishing_VBG vaccination_NN in_IN their_PRP$ zemindaree_NN and_CC almost_RB all_DT round_VBP their_PRP$ village_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT hope_NN of_IN getting_VBG them_PRP round_VBN by_IN degrees_NNS ._.
Subsequently_RB ,_, when_WRB vaccination_NN had_VBD been_VBN established_VBN in_IN the_DT surrounding_NN locality_NN ,_, I_PRP had_VBD attempted_VBN to_TO influence_VB them_PRP ,_, through_IN the_DT head-_JJ master_NN of_IN their_PRP$ school_NN whose_WP$ children_NNS got_VBD vaccinated_VBN ,_, but_CC without_IN success_NN ._.
By_IN the_DT exercise_NN of_IN tact_NN and_CC judgment_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, we_PRP have_VBP succeeded_VBN in_IN accomplishing_VBG the_DT object_NN of_IN establish-_JJ ing_VBG vaccination_NN in_IN their_PRP$ zemindaree_NN without_IN their_PRP$ aid_NN ,_, as_RB much_JJ as_IN we_PRP could_MD have_VB done_VBN with_IN it_PRP ._.
The_DT present_JJ year_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, opens_VBZ with_IN an_DT auspicious_JJ circumstance_NN ._.
Rajah_NNP Gopal_NNP Singh_NNP Bahadoor_NNP ,_, zemindar_NN of_IN Sultanabad_NNP ,_, has_VBZ allowed_VBN his_PRP$ household_NN and_CC his_PRP$ village_NN to_TO be_VB thoroughly_RB vaccinated_VBN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ thus_RB paved_VBN the_DT way_NN for_IN the_DT future_JJ progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN his_PRP$ zemindaree_NN ._.
Rajmehal_NNP ._.
7_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT sub-division_NN of_IN Rajmehal_NNP two_CD vaccinators_NNS ,_, viz_NN ._.

They_PRP were_VBD carrying_VBG on_IN their_PRP$ work_NN with_IN vigour_NNS in_IN the_DT tract_NN of_IN land_NN lying_VBG six_CD or_CC seven_CD miles_NNS to_TO the_DT west_NN of_IN Bahawa_NNP station_NN ,_, East_NNP Indian_NNP Railway_NNP ,_, when_WRB outbreaks_NNS of_IN small-_JJ pox_NN occurring_VBG in_IN the_DT sub-division_NN itself_PRP ,_, and_CC subsequently_RB in_IN the_DT sub-division_NN of_IN Godda_NNP ,_, interfered_VBD with_IN the_DT regular_JJ progress_NN of_IN their_PRP$ work_NN ._.
Vaccinator_NNP Peary_NNP Mohun_NNP Doss_NNP had_VBD to_TO be_VB sent_VBN to_TO Godda_NNP in_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN January_NNP ,_, for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN suppressing_VBG the_DT fearful_JJ epidemic_NN of_IN small-pox_NN that_WDT broke_VBD out_IN there_RB ,_, and_CC of_IN giving_VBG instruction_NN ,_, if_IN possible_JJ ,_, to_TO the_DT inoculators_NNS who_WP were_VBD at_IN work_NN in_IN the_DT sub-division_NN ;_: and_CC vaccinator_NN Bhagiruth_NNP Doss_NNP also_RB followed_VBD him_PRP towards_VB the_DT latter_JJ end_NN of_IN February_NNP ._.
Number_NNP of_IN villages_NNS protected_VBN and_CC operations_NNS performed_VBN In_IN the_DT sub-division_NN of_IN Rajmehal_NNP 38_CD villages_NNS have_VBP been_VBN protected_VBN last_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN 3,296_CD primary_JJ and_CC 53_CD secondary_JJ vaccinations_NNS performed_VBN ._.
3,071_CD ,_, or_CC 93.17_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, of_IN the_DT former_JJ ,_, and_CC 45_CD ,_, or_CC 84.90_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, of_IN the_DT latter_NN were_VBD successful_JJ ._.

51_CD Results_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT total_JJ 15,039_CD cases_NNS ,_, 14,984_CD were_VBD primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 14,409_CD ,_, or_CC 96.19_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, were_VBD successful_JJ ,_, and_CC 55_CD were_VBD re-vaccinations_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT 47_CD ,_, or_CC 85.45_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, were_VBD successful_JJ ._.

The_DT above_NN ,_, I_PRP humbly_RB presume_VBP to_TO say_VB ,_, should_MD be_VB accepted_VBN as_IN an_DT exceedingly_RB gratifying_JJ result_NN ,_, considering_VBG the_DT smallness_NN of_IN our_PRP$ staff_NN ,_, the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS with_IN whom_WP we_PRP have_VBP to_TO deal_VB ,_, and_CC the_DT rugged_NN and_CC hilly_RB character_NN of_IN the_DT tract_NN where_WRB we_PRP have_VBP had_VBN to_TO work_VB ,_, in_IN the_DT midst_NN of_IN hardships_NNS and_CC difficulties_NNS inconceivable_JJ ._.
Superintendent_NN 's_POS inspection_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT tabular_JJ statement_NN given_VBN below_IN shows_NNS the_DT results_NNS of_IN my_PRP$ inspections_NNS ._.
My_PRP$ inspections_NNS were_VBD conducted_VBN on_IN the_DT same_JJ thorough_NN system_NN as_IN last_JJ year_NN ._.
I_PRP would_MD take_VB up_RP the_DT work_NN of_IN one_CD vaccinator_NN at_IN a_DT time_NN ,_, and_CC go_VB on_IN from_IN village_NN to_TO village_VB ,_, minutely_RB inspecting_VBG as_IN many_JJ cases_NNS as_IN I_PRP could_MD find_VB ,_, and_CC often_RB comparing_VBG them_PRP with_IN the_DT registers_NNS kept_VBD ._.
After_IN finishing_VBG the_DT work_NN of_IN one_CD I_PRP would_MD go_VB over_IN to_TO another_DT ,_, and_CC so_RB on_IN ._.
On_IN my_PRP$ approach_NN in_IN a_DT certain_JJ locality_NN ,_, notice_NN is_VBZ sent_VBN through_IN the_DT chowkidars_NNS to_TO the_DT people_NNS of_IN the_DT villages_NNS which_WDT I_PRP would_MD propose_VB to_TO inspect_VB ,_, directing_VBG them_PRP to_TO keep_VB their_PRP$ vaccinated_JJ children_NNS for_IN inspection_NN ._.
Without_IN such_JJ previous_JJ notice_NN people_NNS are_VBP apt_JJ to_TO go_VB abroad_RB to_TO work_VB in_IN the_DT fields_NNS and_CC jungles_NNS ,_, often_RB taking_VBG their_PRP$ children_NNS with_IN them_PRP ._.
In_IN order_NN that_IN I_PRP should_MD not_RB lose_VB the_DT opportunity_NN of_IN inspecting_VBG the_DT people_NNS of_IN as_IN many_JJ villages_NNS as_IN may_MD have_VB assembled_VBN to_TO meet_VB me_PRP ,_, I_PRP would_MD sometimes_RB commence_VB work_NN in_IN the_DT morning_NN ,_, and_CC would_MD not_RB cease_VB till_NN evening_NN ,_, when_WRB after_IN a_DT whole_JJ day_NN 's_POS toil_NN I_PRP would_MD retire_VB to_TO take_VB my_PRP$ meals_NNS and_CC my_PRP$ night_NN 's_POS rest_NN in_IN a_DT poor_JJ lowly_RB Sonthalee_NNP hut_VBD or_CC a_DT miserable_JJ cowshed_NN ,_, which_WDT are_VBP often_RB the_DT only_JJ shelters_NNS afforded_VBD us_PRP against_IN wild_JJ beasts_NNS and_CC biting_VBG frosts_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN my_PRP$ tours_NNS ,_, I_PRP would_MD also_RB often_RB take_VBP the_DT opportunity_NN to_TO introduce_VB vaccin-_JJ ation_NN in_IN villages_NNS where_WRB it_PRP has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN introduced_VBN before_IN ,_, and_CC to_TO remove_VB doubts_NNS and_CC suspicions_NNS from_IN the_DT minds_NNS of_IN those_DT who_WP would_MD question_VB the_DT protective_JJ influence_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
Thus_RB I_PRP would_MD try_VB to_TO make_VB the_DT most_JJS of_IN my_PRP$ time_NN during_IN each_DT tour_NN ._.

all_DT prophylactic_JJ measures_NNS ,_, and_CC who_WP therefore_RB make_VBP it_PRP their_PRP$ study_NN to_TO conceal_VB the_DT fact_NN of_IN any_DT occurrence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN their_PRP$ villages_NNS ._.
Twenty-two_JJ lives_NNS were_VBD sacrificed_VBN at_IN Palasbona_NNP before_IN the_DT people_NNS gave_VBD us_PRP any_DT notice_NN of_IN the_DT outbreak_NN ;_: and_CC even_RB then_RB ,_, when_WRB we_PRP went_VBD to_TO inspect_VB in_IN their_PRP$ village_NN and_CC explained_VBD to_TO them_PRP the_DT noble_JJ mission_NN which_WDT had_VBD brought_VBN us_PRP there_RB ,_, they_PRP would_MD not_RB show_VB us_PRP the_DT cases_NNS that_WDT had_VBD occurred_VBN ,_, or_CC give_VB us_PRP any_DT certain_JJ information_NN regarding_VBG them_PRP ._.
Such_JJ ,_, unfortunately_RB ,_, is_VBZ the_DT sad_JJ case_NN with_IN the_DT people_NNS generally_RB of_IN this_DT district_NN ._.
Rude_NNP and_CC ignorant_NN in_IN the_DT extreme_NN ,_, they_PRP exhibit_VBP a_DT lamentable_JJ degree_NN of_IN apathy_NN and_CC indifference_NN to_TO the_DT invasions_NNS of_IN any_DT epidemic_JJ disease_NN ,_, and_CC are_VBP not_RB roused_VBN from_IN their_PRP$ lethargy_NN until_IN they_PRP see_VBP their_PRP$ village_NN about_IN to_TO be_VB depopulated_VBN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP convinced_VBN that_IN ,_, were_VBD it_PRP not_RB for_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN vaccination_NN and_CC the_DT extreme_JJ vigilance_NN exercised_VBN by_IN our_PRP$ men_NNS ,_, most_JJS of_IN these_DT outbreaks_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN would_MD never_RB have_VB come_VBN to_TO light_NN ._.
The_DT want_NN of_IN a_DT regular_JJ police_NN here_RB ,_, combined_VBN with_IN the_DT stupid_JJ inactivity_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, rendered_VBD it_PRP extremely_RB difficult_JJ to_TO obtain_VB information_NN of_IN these_DT occur-_JJ rences_NNS ._.
In_IN eleven_NN of_IN the_DT infected_JJ places_NNS mentioned_VBN above_IN ,_, including_VBG the_DT town_NN ,_, vaccination_NN was_VBD introduced_VBN ;_: in_IN seven_CD of_IN these_DT it_PRP was_VBD completely_RB established_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN four_CD only_RB partially_RB so_RB ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT obstinate_JJ resistance_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB introduced_VBN in_IN the_DT three_CD villages_NNS Kankjole_NNP ,_, Islampore_NNP ,_, and_CC Newabdewree_NNP ;_: and_CC owing_VBG to_TO the_DT people_NNS being_VBG protected_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ,_, it_PRP was_VBD not_RB undertaken_VBN in_IN the_DT two_CD villages_NNS Gurgaon_NNP and_CC Maharajpore_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT epidemic_NN did_VBD not_RB show_VB any_DT tendency_NN to_TO spread_VB ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT heat_NN of_IN the_DT weather_NN at_IN this_DT season_NN ,_, as_IN already_RB stated_VBN ,_, extreme_JJ difficulty_NN was_VBD experienced_VBN in_IN affording_VBG protection_NN to_TO the_DT infected_JJ localities_NNS ._.
Many_JJ persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD imbibed_VBN the_DT poison_NN were_VBD liable_JJ to_TO be_VB affected_VBN ,_, even_RB after_IN vaccination_NN had_VBD been_VBN performed_VBN and_CC before_IN it_PRP had_VBD taken_VBN effect_NN ;_: and_CC this_DT circumstance_NN rendered_VBD us_PRP liable_JJ to_TO distrust_VB and_CC suspicion_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD therefore_RB under_IN extremely_RB disadvantageous_JJ circumstances_NNS that_IN the_DT work_NN had_VBD to_TO be_VB carried_VBN on_IN during_IN the_DT non-working_JJ season_NN ._.
Thirty-two_JJ cases_NNS of_IN small-pox_JJ took_VBD place_NN after_IN vaccination_NN ,_, seven_CD of_IN which_WDT died_VBD ._.
In_IN these_DT cases_NNS the_DT vaccination_NN had_VBD either_CC failed_VBD ,_, or_CC the_DT eruptions_NNS had_VBD appeared_VBN before_IN the_DT fifth_JJ day_NN of_IN the_DT operation_NN ,_, when_WRB it_PRP had_VBD not_RB taken_VBN effect_NN ._.
Twelve_NN cases_NNS were_VBD ascertained_VBN to_TO have_VB occurred_VBN in_IN persons_NNS who_WP had_VBD old_JJ inoculation_NN ,_, five_CD of_IN which_WDT died_VBD ._.
13_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT working_VBG season_NN ,_, i.e_NN ._.
from_IN October_NNP to_TO March_NNP ,_, the_DT following_JJ villages_NNS in_IN Rajmehal_NNP sub-division_NN were_VBD known_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN infected_VBN ,_, viz_NN ._.
Motyjhurna_NNP ,_, Dhanbita_NNP ,_, Oodwa_NNP ,_, Jhubree_NNP ,_, Banspahar_NNP ,_, Rangamatea_NNP ,_, Gadye_NNP ,_, Puturchapti_NNP ,_, Simuldhop_NNP ,_, Pungro_NNP ,_, Kelabaree_NNP ,_, Tetulia_NNP ,_, Ramchowkee_NNP ,_, Pokhoria_NNP ,_, and_CC Hurnadanga_NNP ._.

Epidemic_NNP in_IN Godda_NNP ._.
14_CD ._.
Towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN December_NNP 1873_CD information_NN reached_VBD us_PRP of_IN an_DT epidemic_JJ of_IN small-pox_NN at_IN Godda_NNP ._.
The_DT principal_JJ vaccinator_NN of_IN my_PRP$ staff_NN ,_, Peary_NNP Mohun_NNP Doss_NNP ,_, was_VBD imme-_JJ diately_RB ordered_VBN to_TO the_DT spot_NN ,_, with_IN instructions_NNS to_TO afford_VB protection_NN to_TO the_DT people_NNS of_IN infected_JJ villages_NNS ,_, and_CC if_IN possible_JJ to_TO train_VB up_RP as_RB many_JJ inoculators_NNS as_IN he_PRP could_MD find_VB there_RB ,_, in_IN order_NN that_IN they_PRP might_MD be_VB taken_VBN to_TO assist_VB him_PRP in_IN stamping_VBG out_RP small-pox_NN ._.
Subsequently_RB another_DT vaccinator_NN was_VBD detached_VBN from_IN my_PRP$ staff_NN and_CC sent_NN to_TO Godda_NNP ._.
I_PRP myself_PRP went_VBD there_RB in_IN February_NNP ,_, and_CC found_VBD that_IN vaccination_NN was_VBD established_VBN in_IN 13_CD infected_JJ villages_NNS ._.
The_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO have_VB spread_VBN itself_PRP very_RB widely_RB ._.
I_PRP have_VBP already_RB ,_, in_IN my_PRP$ special_JJ reports_NNS on_IN small-pox_NN ,_, submitted_VBD a_DT long_JJ list_NN showing_VBG the_DT villages_NNS infected_VBN and_CC the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS that_WDT had_VBD occurred_VBN ._.
I_PRP need_VBP not_RB therefore_RB swell_VB this_DT report_NN by_IN an_DT unnecessary_JJ repetition_NN of_IN the_DT names_NNS of_IN those_DT villages_NNS ._.
I_PRP think_VBP it_PRP will_MD suffice_VB to_TO say_VB ,_, generally_RB ,_, that_IN in_IN pergunnah_NN Godda_NNP ,_, of_IN the_DT sub-division_NN of_IN Godda_NNP ,_, we_PRP had_VBD up_RP to_TO the_DT end_NN of_IN March_NNP 1874_CD a_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN 33_CD villages_NNS infected_VBN ,_, of_IN 269_CD cases_NNS ,_, and_CC 58_CD deaths_NNS ;_: in_IN pergunnah_NN Barkop_NNP ,_, 19_CD villagas_NN ,_, 180_CD cases_NNS ,_, and_CC 19_CD deaths_NNS ;_: in_IN pergunnah_NN Muneehari_NNP ,_, four_CD villages_NNS ,_, 25_CD cases_NNS ,_, and_CC five_CD deaths_NNS ;_: in_IN pergunnah_NN Pursunda_NNP ,_, three_CD villages_NNS ,_, 14_CD cases_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD death_NN ;_: and_CC in_IN pergunnah_JJ Pusye_NNP ,_, eight_CD villages_NNS ,_, 14_CD cases_NNS (_( besides_IN several_JJ others_NNS in_IN three_CD of_IN the_DT villages_NNS ,_, whose_WP$ exact_JJ number_NN could_MD not_RB be_VB ascertained_VBN )_) ,_, and_CC 21_CD deaths_NNS ._.

&_CC quot_NN ;_: Of_IN these_DT 153_CD ,_, returns_NNS have_VBP been_VBN received_VBN from_IN 98_CD only_RB ;_: a_DT few_JJ of_IN the_DT remainder_NN are_VBP known_VBN to_TO have_VB left_VBN the_DT district_NN without_IN operating_NN ,_, four_CD or_CC five_CD having_VBG brought_VBN back_RP their_PRP$ perwannahs_NN ,_, saying_VBG that_IN they_PRP could_MD get_VB no_DT practice_NN this_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT returns_NNS received_VBD from_IN these_DT 98_CD men_NNS show_VBP 5,836_CD cases_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, being_VBG a_DT decrease_NN of_IN 2,200_CD as_IN compared_VBN with_IN last_JJ year_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ due_JJ chiefly_NN to_TO a_DT large_JJ reduction_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS in_IN the_DT Banka_NNP and_CC sudder_JJR sub-divisions_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT former_JJ especially_RB ,_, the_DT falling_VBG off_RP there_RB being_VBG nearly_RB 3,000_CD cases_NNS ,_, and_CC attributable_JJ to_TO the_DT absence_NN of_IN a_DT Bengali_NNP vaccinator_NN ,_, who_WP alone_RB operated_VBD nearly_RB 2,000_CD cases_NNS last_JJ year_NN under_IN pressure_NN of_IN an_DT existing_VBG epidemic_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ._.
The_DT returns_NNS from_IN Soopole_NNP and_CC Muddehpoora_NNP show_VBP 29_CD against_IN 21_CD only_RB in_IN the_DT preceding_NN season_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ remarkable_JJ ,_, as_IN these_DT two_CD sub-divisions_NNS include_VBP the_DT most_RBS distressed_JJ portion_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN ._.

&_CC quot_NN ;_: 6_CD ._.
The_DT only_JJ paid_VBD vaccinators_NNS employed_VBN were_VBD Janky_NNP Ram_NNP ,_, a_DT man_NN who_WP had_VBD been_VBN attached_VBN to_TO the_DT sudder_NN dispensary_NN in_IN that_DT capacity_NN for_IN some_DT years_NNS ,_, and_CC Amjad_NNP Hossain_NNP ,_, a_DT former_JJ com-_NN pounder_NN in_IN the_DT dispensary_NN ._.

&_CC quot_NN ;_: 10_CD ._.

when_WRB every_DT village_NN under_IN him_PRP willingly_RB comply_VBP ._.

A_DT very_RB good_JJ instance_NN of_IN this_DT occurred_VBN during_IN the_DT season_NN under_IN report_NN ._.

He_PRP very_RB willingly_RB assented_VBN and_CC I_PRP sent_VBD a_DT tekait_NN to_TO him_PRP ._.

The_DT manley_NN very_RB wisely_RB came_VBD and_CC reported_VBD the_DT circumstances_NNS to_TO me_PRP ;_: and_CC the_DT deputy_NN commissioner_NN ,_, on_IN being_VBG informed_VBN ,_, had_VBD the_DT men_NNS sent_VBD for_IN and_CC judicially_RB fined_VBN ._.
They_PRP also_RB received_VBD a_DT warning_NN from_IN me_PRP that_IN ,_, on_IN a_DT repetition_NN of_IN such_JJ actions_NNS on_IN their_PRP$ part_NN ,_, they_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB allowed_VBN to_TO vaccinate_VB at_IN all_DT ._.
The_DT punishment_NN of_IN these_DT men_NNS will_MD have_VB a_DT very_RB good_JJ result_NN on_IN the_DT others_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN time_NN it_PRP may_MD be_VB possible_JJ to_TO make_VB these_DT tekaits_NNS work_VBP wherever_IN they_PRP are_VBP ordered_VBN ._.
Ex-inoculators_NNS ._.
Number_NNP protected_VBD ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: 7_CD ._.
The_DT register_NN shows_VBZ the_DT names_NNS of_IN 52_CD ex-inoculators_NNS ._.
Among_IN these_DT ,_, only_RB four_CD were_VBD added_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD has_VBZ been_VBN reported_VBN dead_JJ ._.
Of_IN the_DT 51_CD registered_VBD tekaits_NNS ,_, only_RB 26_CD ,_, or_CC half_PDT the_DT number_NN ,_, applied_VBN for_IN lymph_NN ._.
They_PRP worked_VBD in_IN eighteen_JJ localities_NNS ,_, and_CC were_VBD allowed_VBN to_TO retain_VB their_PRP$ old_JJ beats_NNS ,_, so_RB far_RB as_IN this_DT could_MD be_VB done_VBN without_IN depriving_VBG certain_JJ areas_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
In_IN last_JJ year_NN 's_POS report_NN it_PRP was_VBD mentioned_VBN that_IN certain_JJ vaccine_NN centres_NNS were_VBD formed_VBN ,_, which_WDT would_MD be_VB extended_VBN year_NN by_IN year_NN ._.
These_DT were_VBD Chuckerdhurpore_NNP ,_, 16_CD miles_NNS to_TO the_DT north-_JJ west_NN ;_: Holdipookur_NNP ,_, in_IN Dhulbhum_NNP ,_, 22_CD miles_NNS to_TO the_DT east_NN ;_: a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Colehan_NNP ,_, six_CD miles_NNS to_TO the_DT south-east_NN ;_: and_CC Chyebassa_NNP central_JJ ._.
Vaccinators_NNS were_VBD this_DT year_NN also_RB made_VBD to_TO work_VB round_VB their_PRP$ points_NNS ._.
The_DT Chyebassa_NNP centre_NN has_VBZ extended_VBN towards_IN the_DT east_NN and_CC south_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Colehan_NNP centre_NN to_TO the_DT south-east_NN has_VBZ also_RB extended_VBN ;_: but_CC I_PRP have_VBP not_RB been_VBN able_JJ to_TO unite_VB it_PRP to_TO Chyebassa_NNP ._.
There_EX are_VBP still_RB some_DT villages_NNS intervening_VBG ,_, and_CC next_JJ season_NN the_DT protection_NN of_IN these_DT will_MD be_VB taken_VBN in_IN hand_NN ._.
Work_NN has_VBZ also_RB been_VBN going_VBG on_IN in_IN the_DT Holdipookur_NNP centre_NN by_IN two_CD sets_NNS of_IN vaccinators_NNS ._.
The_DT men_NNS set_VBD to_TO work_VB in_IN Chuckerdhurpore_NNP ,_, after_IN vaccinating_VBG the_DT remaining_VBG villages_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ beats_NNS not_RB protected_VBN last_JJ year_NN ,_, came_VBD away_RB ,_, as_IN they_PRP would_MD not_RB encroach_VB on_IN the_DT beats_NNS of_IN others_NNS ._.
But_CC from_IN this_DT point_NN also_RB the_DT extent_NN of_IN protection_NN has_VBZ increased_VBN ,_, as_IN two_CD vaccinators_NNS have_VBP been_VBN working_VBG in_IN Kera_NNP Pir_NNP ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ adjoining_VBG Chuckerdherpore_NNP ._.
Of_IN the_DT 18_CD sets_NNS of_IN inoculators_NNS working_VBG in_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, 15_CD have_VBP submitted_VBN returns_NNS ;_: against_IN 12_CD sets_NNS of_IN inoculators_NNS ,_, and_CC eight_CD sets_NNS who_WP submitted_VBD returns_NNS during_IN last_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN vaccinated_VBN ,_, as_IN shown_VBN in_IN this_DT return_NN ,_, is_VBZ more_RBR than_IN double_RB that_IN of_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, being_VBG 17,155_CD against_IN 8,358_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN villages_NNS vaccinated_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD 291_CD against_IN 120_CD last_JJ year_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ good_JJ season_NN 's_POS work_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT results_NNS could_MD be_VB more_RBR closely_RB inspected_VBN ._.
Unfortunately_RB I_PRP could_MD inspect_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN only_RB two_CD ._.
I_PRP visited_VBD sixteen_JJ villages_NNS and_CC inspected_VBD 541_CD cases_NNS ._.
Of_IN these_DT 254_CD only_RB were_VBD very_RB successful_JJ cases_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, the_DT vesicles_NNS being_VBG whole_JJ and_CC well_RB formed_VBN ;_: 225_CD were_VBD very_RB indifferent_JJ ,_, the_DT vesicles_NNS having_VBG burst_NN and_CC turned_VBD into_IN ulcers_NNS ;_: and_CC 62_CD were_VBD quite_RB unsuccessful_JJ ._.
This_DT result_NN would_MD give_VB only_RB 46.95_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS ,_, a_DT very_RB unsatisfactory_JJ result_NN if_IN only_RB the_DT best_JJS kind_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, as_IN it_PRP ought_MD to_TO be_VB ,_, should_MD be_VB insisted_VBN on_IN ._.
This_DT I_PRP took_VBD every_DT care_NN to_TO impress_VB on_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS ;_: and_CC if_IN inspection_NN could_MD be_VB more_RBR methodically_RB and_CC frequently_RB carried_VBD out_RP ,_, improvement_NN would_MD follow_VB ._.

&_CC quot_NN ;_: In_IN Chyebassa_NNP the_DT numbers_NNS vaccinated_VBN were_VBD not_RB many_JJ ;_: 21_CD were_VBD vaccinated_VBN by_IN the_DT hospital_NN assistant_NN attached_VBN to_TO the_DT police_NN ,_, and_CC 13_CD by_IN me_PRP ._.

READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) 4_CD ._.
The_DT amount_NN of_IN inspection_NN work_NN performed_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN the_DT various_JJ circles_NNS was_VBD satisfactory_JJ ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS personally_RB examined_VBN and_CC verified_VBN with_IN the_DT registers_NNS was_VBD no_DT less_JJR than_IN 47,165_CD in_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP circle_NN ,_, 29,754_CD in_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP circle_NN ,_, and_CC 21,269_CD in_IN the_DT Dacca_NNP circle_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Ranchee_NNP circle_NN the_DT number_NN was_VBD comparatively_RB small_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB moved_VBN freely_RB about_IN the_DT country_NN and_CC ._.
to_TO have_VB been_VBN careful_JJ in_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN his_PRP$ work_NN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ observes_NNS that_IN com-_JJ plaints_NNS are_VBP made_VBN of_IN the_DT inferiority_NN of_IN dispensary_JJ practice_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT difficulty_NN with_IN which_WDT vaccinators_NNS who_WP have_VBP engaged_VBN in_IN it_PRP are_VBP induced_VBN to_TO adopt_VB correct_JJ methods_NNS ._.
The_DT returns_NNS furnished_VBD disclose_VB great_JJ variations_NNS in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN at_IN the_DT various_JJ dispensaries_NNS ,_, and_CC there_RB seems_VBZ to_TO be_VB little_JJ doubt_NN that_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS entertained_VBD there_EX are_VBP inefficient_JJ ._.

5_CD ._.
Judged_VBN by_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN on_IN an_DT average_JJ by_IN each_DT vaccinator_NN ,_, there_EX has_VBZ been_VBN ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ to_TO notice_VB ,_, an_DT improvement_NN in_IN the_DT efficiency_NN of_IN the_DT establishments_NNS entertained_VBD ._.
The_DT work_NN performed_VBN in_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP circle_NN and_CC in_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP ,_, which_WDT amounted_VBD on_IN an_DT average_NN to_TO 3,931_CD and_CC 2,506_CD cases_NNS respectively_RB ,_, was_VBD particularly_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP and_CC Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP circles_VBZ some_DT difficulty_NN has_VBZ been_VBN experienced_VBN in_IN bringing_VBG up_RP the_DT staff_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS to_TO the_DT full_JJ sanctioned_VBD number_NN ._.

So_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT ex-inoculators_NNS are_VBP under_IN instruction_NN ,_, it_PRP may_MD be_VB necessary_JJ or_CC advisable_JJ to_TO give_VB them_PRP a_DT subsistence_NN allowance_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP will_MD receive_VB favour-_JJ ably_RB proposals_NNS to_TO this_DT effect_NN ._.

The_DT experience_NN of_IN successive_JJ years_NNS has_VBZ demonstrated_VBN the_DT danger_NN of_IN giving_VBG them_PRP the_DT support_NN of_IN Government_NNP without_IN any_DT security_NN against_IN misconduct_NN on_IN their_PRP$ part_NN ._.
The_DT present_JJ reports_NNS contain_NN more_JJR than_IN one_CD instance_NN where_WRB the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN of_IN Government_NNP vaccinators_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN discredited_VBN ,_, and_CC where_WRB obstacles_NNS have_VBP been_VBN thrown_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ way_NN by_IN the_DT irresponsible_JJ action_NN of_IN ex-inoculators_NNS whose_WP$ proceed-_JJ ings_NNS have_VBP been_VBN uncontrolled_VBN ._.
8_CD ._.
In_IN Bankoora_NNP ,_, where_WRB Dr._NNP Conolly_NNP has_VBZ interested_VBN himself_PRP very_RB success-_JJ fully_RB in_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP has_VBZ accordingly_RB sanc-_JJ tioned_VBD a_DT special_JJ establishment_NN to_TO supervise_VB the_DT inoculators_NNS whom_WP he_PRP has_VBZ trained_VBN ,_, and_CC ,_, should_MD the_DT system_NN be_VB successful_JJ ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP will_MD be_VB glad_JJ to_TO extend_VB it_PRP to_TO other_JJ districts_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ particularly_RB desirable_JJ that_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Beerbhoom_NNP should_MD persevere_VB in_IN his_PRP$ endeavours_NN to_TO utilize_VB the_DT ex-inoculators_NNS whom_WP he_PRP has_VBZ already_RB engaged_VBN in_IN vaccination_NN ._.
In_IN Midnapore_NNP operations_NNS were_VBD much_RB interfered_VBN with_IN by_IN the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN fever_NN ,_, which_WDT prevailed_VBD throughout_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, indisposing_VBG the_DT people_NNS to_TO vaccination_NN and_CC crippling_VBG the_DT staff_NN at_IN the_DT dis-_JJ posal_NN of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ attention_NN was_VBD necessarily_RB much_RB diverted_VBN to_TO the_DT establishment_NN of_IN endemic_JJ dispensaries_NNS ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ trusts_NNS that_IN in_IN the_DT current_JJ season_NN more_JJR progress_NN will_MD be_VB possible_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN a_DT fair_JJ start_NN will_MD be_VB given_VBN to_TO a_DT system_NN which_WDT promises_VBZ to_TO be_VB self-supporting_JJ ._.
9_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN ,_, small-pox_NN was_VBD more_JJR than_IN usually_RB preva-_JJ lent_NN in_IN all_PDT the_DT circles_NNS except_IN the_DT Darjeeling_VBG one_CD ._.
It_PRP was_VBD present_JJ in_IN Calcutta_NNP throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC appeared_VBD also_RB in_IN the_DT 24-Pergunnahs_JJ and_CC Burdwan_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD particularly_RB severe_JJ in_IN Bankoora_NNP ,_, Beerbhoom_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD also_RB epidemic_JJ in_IN Hazareebagh_NNP and_CC Lohardugga_NNP ._.
Full_NNP advantage_NN was_VBD taken_VBN of_IN the_DT circumstance_NN to_TO push_VB forward_JJ operations_NNS ,_, the_DT people_NNS accepting_VBG vaccination_NN the_DT more_JJR readily_RB when_WRB danger_NN is_VBZ at_IN hand_NN ._.
Vaccinators_NNS detached_VBD from_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP staff_NN protected_VBD nearly_RB 10,000_CD persons_NNS in_IN Beer-_NNP bhoom_NN ._.
In_IN Bankoora_NNP more_JJR than_IN twice_RB that_IN number_NN were_VBD protected_VBN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT good_JJ arrangements_NNS made_VBN by_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Medical_NNP Officer_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP the_DT staff_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS at_IN the_DT disposal_NN of_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Superin-_NNP tendent_NN was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB quite_RB insufficient_JJ ._.
It_PRP has_VBZ now_RB been_VBN reinforced_VBN by_IN the_DT transfer_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS from_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP circle_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD now_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ expected_VBN ,_, fully_RB meet_VBZ the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT Pergunnahs_NNP ._.
10_CD ._.

The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP has_VBZ read_VBN with_IN interest_NN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP '_POS remarks_NNS on_IN the_DT degree_NN of_IN protection_NN from_IN small-pox_NN which_WDT has_VBZ been_VBN afforded_VBN to_TO Calcutta_NNP in_IN the_DT past_JJ season_NN by_IN vaccination_NN ._.
11_CD ._.

(_( 4_CD )_) 12_CD ._.

13_CD ._.
The_DT work_NN done_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, as_IN contrasted_VBN with_IN the_DT preceding_VBG year_NN ,_, is_VBZ clearly_RB shown_VBN in_IN the_DT following_JJ statement_NN :_: 6_CD REPORT_NNP OF_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP Cause_NNP of_IN the_DT comparative_JJ mildness_NN of_IN recent_JJ epidemics_NNS ._.
The_DT comparative_JJ immunity_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP from_IN small-pox_NN since_IN 1865_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT comparatively_RB small_JJ dimensions_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ epidemic_NN ,_, may_MD fairly_RB be_VB claimed_VBN as_IN a_DT triumph_NN for_IN vaccination_NN ._.
The_DT satisfactory_JJ result_NN thus_RB exhibited_VBN is_VBZ attributed_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP to_TO the_DT better_JJR protection_NN of_IN the_DT inhabitants_NNS and_CC the_DT increased_JJ power_NN of_IN vaccination_NN to_TO grapple_VB with_IN emergencies_NNS ._.
He_PRP adds_VBZ his_PRP$ testimony_NN ,_, derived_VBN from_IN personal_JJ experience_NN ,_, in_IN favor_NN of_IN the_DT comparative_JJ mildness_NN of_IN this_DT epidemic_NN in_IN support_NN of_IN the_DT statistics_NNS ._.
Localities_NNS visited_VBN by_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
Small-pox_NN in_IN the_DT suburbs_JJ 15_CD ._.
As_IN usual_JJ ,_, the_DT epidemic_NN was_VBD mainly_RB limited_VBN to_TO certain_JJ localities_NNS ._.
Burra_NNP Bazaar_NNP ,_, whose_WP$ vaccination_NN has_VBZ presented_VBN peculiar_JJ difficulties_NNS ,_, as_IN explained_VBN in_IN previous_JJ reports_NNS ,_, suffered_VBD signally_RB ._.
The_DT adjoining_VBG Muchooa_NNP Bazaar_NNP also_RB suffered_VBD severely_RB ._.
A_DT neighbouring_JJ community_NN of_IN Mahomedan_NNP lascars_NNS were_VBD severely_RB visited_VBN ,_, as_IN also_RB a_DT class_NN of_IN Mahomedans_NNPS called_VBN Nacodas_NNP ,_, who_WP came_VBD from_IN Cutch_NNP 200_CD years_NNS ago_RB ,_, and_CC colonised_VBD the_DT heart_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP in_IN Moorgeehatta_NNP ,_, Amratolla_NNP Lane_NNP ,_, and_CC New_NNP China_NNP Bazaar_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT southern_JJ division_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, the_DT disease_NN was_VBD worst_RB in_IN the_DT Taltollah_NNP Thana_NNP ,_, at_IN Harroo_NNP Luskur_NNP 's_POS Hât_NNP ,_, Comedan_NNP Bagan_NNP ,_, and_CC Harreeparah_NNP Lane_NNP ;_: in_IN the_DT Padoopookur_NNP Thana_NNP ,_, Hyderam_NNP Bannerjee_NNP 's_POS Lane_NNP and_CC Kerannee_NNP Bagan_NNP suffered_VBD considerably_RB ;_: and_CC scattered_JJ cases_NNS were_VBD met_VBN with_IN in_IN Fenwick_NNP Bazaar_NNP ,_, Collingah_NNP ,_, and_CC Bow_NNP Bazaar_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT suburbs_NN the_DT disease_NN ,_, though_IN widespread_JJ ,_, also_RB exhibited_VBD a_DT tendency_NN to_TO locali-_JJ zation_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD sharp_JJ outbreaks_NNS at_IN Zeerat_NNP ,_, Garden_NNP Reach_NNP ,_, and_CC Kidderpore_NNP ,_, and_CC scattered_JJ cases_NNS at_IN Tallygunge_NNP and_CC Bhowanipore_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT northern_JJ suburbs_NNS there_EX was_VBD a_DT comparative_JJ exemption_NN ._.
Cases_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT Beliaghattah_NNP Thana_NNP (_( at_IN Rajah_NNP Bagan_NNP and_CC Rajah_NNP Bazaar_NNP )_) and_CC in_IN the_DT Entally_NNP Thana_NNP ._.
No_DT cases_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN from_IN the_DT Cossrpore_NNP ,_, Chitpore_NNP ,_, Manicktollah_NNP ,_, and_CC Ooltadangah_NNP Thanas_NNP ._.
These_DT particulars_NNS have_VBP been_VBN thus_RB fully_RB detailed_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN of_IN illustrating_VBG the_DT property_NN which_WDT epidemic_JJ diseases_NNS possess_NN of_IN predominant_JJ prevalence_NN in_IN particular_JJ places_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN recording_VBG in_IN what_WP manner_NN this_DT property_NN was_VBD actually_RB exhibited_VBN by_IN small-pox_JJ in_IN 1874-75_CD ._.
Particular_JJ classes_NNS affected_VBD ._.
Residentscomparativelyexempt_NNP ._.
Strangers_NNS specially_RB liable_JJ ._.
16_CD ._.
The_DT disease_NN not_RB only_RB showed_VBD a_DT proneness_NN to_TO affix_VB itself_PRP to_TO particular_JJ localities_NNS ,_, but_CC it_PRP likewise_RB showed_VBD a_DT tendency_NN to_TO attack_VB particular_JJ classes_NNS of_IN the_DT community_NN ._.
The_DT habitually_RB resident_JJ Bengali_NNP population_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP enjoyed_VBD the_DT greatest_JJS exemption_NN ._.
This_DT section_NN of_IN the_DT com-_JJ munity_NN is_VBZ also_RB the_DT most_RBS efficiently_RB protected_VBN by_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT cases_NNS which_WDT did_VBD occur_PRP in_IN it_PRP took_VBD place_NN principally_RB among_IN recent_JJ arrivals_NNS and_CC temporary_JJ sojourners_NNS ,_, whom_WP it_PRP was_VBD found_VBN very_RB difficult_JJ to_TO vaccinate_VB ._.
In_IN contrast_NN ,_, the_DT up-country_JJ Hindustani_NNP residents_NNS ,_, who_WP are_VBP mostly_RB a_DT fleeting_JJ class_NN ,_, suffered_VBD severely_RB ._.
As_IN a_DT general_JJ rule_NN ,_, the_DT epidemic_JJ prevailed_JJ rather_RB among_IN outsiders_NNS and_CC strangers_NNS than_IN among_IN the_DT proper_JJ population_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
Immunity_NN of_IN young_JJ unvaccinated_JJ children_NNS ._.
Cause_NN ._.
Young_NNP children_NNS should_MD be_VB exempted_VBN from_IN compulsory_JJ vaccination_NN ._.
Reasons_NNS 17_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Charles_NNP draws_RB pointed_VBD attention_NN to_TO the_DT great_JJ immunity_NN which_WDT obtained_VBD among_IN young_JJ unvaccinated_JJ children_NNS ._.
He_PRP attributes_VBZ this_DT to_TO oriental_JJ usage_NN ,_, which_WDT provides_VBZ for_IN the_DT comparative_JJ seclusion_NN of_IN infants_NNS of_IN tender_NN years_NNS ;_: and_CC he_PRP draws_VBZ from_IN the_DT circumstance_NN the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN ,_, in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN a_DT law_NN of_IN compulsory_NN vaccination_NN ever_RB being_VBG passed_VBN for_IN India_NNP ,_, it_PRP will_MD not_RB be_VB expedient_JJ ,_, as_IN in_IN England_NNP ,_, to_TO enact_VB that_DT every_DT child_NN must_MD be_VB vaccinated_VBN before_IN the_DT age_NN of_IN three_CD months_NNS ,_, because_IN (_( 1_CD )_) the_DT people_NNS have_VBP a_DT strong_JJ prejudice_NN against_IN infant_JJ vaccin-_JJ ation_NN founded_VBN on_IN their_PRP$ experience_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ,_, and_CC it_PRP would_MD not_RB be_VB prudent_JJ to_TO run_VB counter_RB to_TO it_PRP ;_: (_( 2_CD )_) the_DT practice_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN and_CC rains_NNS is_VBZ not_RB desirable_JJ on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT frequent_JJ irritative_JJ results_NNS then_RB met_VBD with_IN ;_: and_CC (_( 3_CD )_) experience_NN shows_VBZ that_IN young_JJ children_NNS are_VBP not_RB liable_JJ to_TO attack_VB by_IN small-pox_JJ if_IN older_JJR children_NNS and_CC adults_NNS are_VBP protected_VBN ._.
Presentestablishmentsufficient_NN ._.
Superintendentscommended_VBN ._.
18_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Charles_NNP ,_, after_IN the_DT experience_NN of_IN this_DT trying_VBG and_CC anxious_JJ year_NN ,_, arrives_VBZ at_IN the_DT conclusion_NN that_IN the_DT present_JJ establishment_NN is_VBZ quite_RB equal_JJ to_TO the_DT duties_NNS required_VBN of_IN it_PRP ._.
He_PRP accords_RB high_JJ praise_NN to_TO the_DT superintendents_NNS ,_, Baboos_NNP Kali_NNP Das_NNP Bose_NNP and_CC Kassi_NNP Chunder_NNP Dutt_NNP ._.
On_IN the_DT former_JJ ,_, as_IN in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT northern_JJ division_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, the_DT brunt_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN stamping_VBG out_RP frequently_RB recurring_VBG outbreaks_NNS of_IN small-pox_JJ mainly_NN fell_VBD ,_, and_CC he_PRP acquitted_VBD himself_PRP admirably_RB ,_, and_CC displayed_VBD great_JJ tact_NN and_CC diligence_NN in_IN dealing_VBG with_IN these_DT ._.
I_PRP need_VBP hardly_RB add_VB that_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP himself_PRP continues_VBZ to_TO apply_VB himself_PRP to_TO this_DT very_RB important_JJ duty_NN with_IN his_PRP$ usual_JJ energy_NN and_CC enthusiasm_NN ._.

The_DT people_NNS are_VBP prejudiced_VBN ,_, and_CC inoculation_NN is_VBZ rampant_JJ ._.
