.17_VBD 16_CD J._NNP G._NNP PILCHER_NNP ,_, Officiating_NNP Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
W._NNP H._NNP D_NNP '_POS C.MEDICAL_NNP ._.
CALCUTTA_NNP ,_, THE_NNP 11TH_CD NOVEMBER_NNP 1875_CD ._.
RESOLUTION_NNP ._.
READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) must_MD observe_VB that_IN the_DT conduct_NN of_IN operations_NNS in_IN this_DT circle_NN demands_VBZ the_DT closest_JJS attention_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Medical_NNP Department_NNP ._.
With_IN the_DT very_RB large_JJ increase_NN to_TO the_DT establishment_NN allotted_VBD to_TO it_PRP in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT failure_NN in_IN obtaining_VBG adequate_JJ results_NNS has_VBZ not_RB ,_, in_IN part_NN at_IN least_JJS ,_, been_VBN due_JJ to_TO some_DT inefficiency_NN or_CC neglect_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP and_CC of_IN the_DT inspecting_JJ staff_NN placed_VBN at_IN his_PRP$ disposal_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
There_EX is_VBZ little_JJ to_TO remark_VB regarding_VBG the_DT sex_NN ,_, caste_NN ,_, and_CC age_NN of_IN the_DT vacci-_JJ nated_JJ ._.
The_DT results_NNS are_VBP very_RB similar_JJ to_TO those_DT obtained_VBN in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ,_, (_( 3_CD )_) certain_JJ districts_NNS ._.
From_IN the_DT report_NN now_RB submitted_VBN ,_, he_PRP regrets_VBZ to_TO observe_VB that_IN the_DT matter_NN has_VBZ not_RB received_VBN that_IN attention_NN at_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN most_JJS civil_JJ surgeons_NNS which_WDT it_PRP deserves_VBZ ._.
Indeed_RB ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ gathered_VBN from_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP 's_POS narrative_JJ that_IN ,_, up_RB till_VBZ a_DT very_RB late_JJ date_NN ,_, he_PRP had_VBD received_VBN no_RB reports_NNS or_CC returns_NNS whatever_WDT on_IN this_DT subject_NN from_IN certain_JJ officers_NNS ._.
Other_JJ officers_NNS ,_, while_IN interesting_VBG them-_JJ selves_NNS in_IN the_DT matter_NN ,_, apparently_RB failed_VBD to_TO appreciate_VB the_DT importance_NN of_IN working_VBG in_IN a_DT systematic_JJ manner_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP ,_, and_CC in_IN certain_JJ districts_NNS of_IN the_DT Chota_NNP Nagpore_NNP division_NN ,_, licenses_VBZ to_TO practice_NN appear_VB to_TO have_VB been_VBN given_VBN to_TO men_NNS ,_, the_DT result_NN of_IN whose_WP$ operations_NNS have_VBP shown_VBN them_PRP to_TO have_VB been_VBN utterly_RB untrained_JJ ._.
Again_RB ,_, in_IN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ cases_NNS no_DT attempt_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN made_VBN to_TO supervise_VB the_DT work_NN of_IN those_DT to_TO whom_WP licenses_NNS were_VBD granted_VBN ._.
While_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ aware_JJ that_IN in_IN educating_VBG and_CC in_IN settling_VBG ex-inocu-_JJ lators_NNS it_PRP may_MD not_RB be_VB possible_JJ to_TO follow_VB out_RP strictly_RB the_DT system_NN of_IN concentrated_JJ operations_NNS which_WDT he_PRP has_VBZ prescribed_VBN for_IN circle_NN vaccination_NN ,_, he_PRP yet_RB thinks_VBZ that_IN much_JJ may_MD be_VB done_VBN in_IN this_DT direction_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP would_MD call_VB the_DT immediate_JJ attention_NN of_IN all_DT civil_JJ surgeons_NNS to_TO the_DT matter_NN ,_, thereby_RB reminding_VBG them_PRP that_IN the_DT remarks_NNS by_IN Government_NNP ,_, as_IN contained_VBN in_IN the_DT Resolutions_NNS on_IN the_DT annual_JJ reports_NNS ,_, are_VBP meant_VBN to_TO be_VB for_IN the_DT practical_JJ guidance_NN of_IN all_DT concerned_VBN ,_, and_CC are_VBP expected_VBN to_TO be_VB acted_VBN upon_IN ._.
At_IN the_DT instance_NN of_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, provision_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN for_IN the_DT entertainment_NN ,_, in_IN those_DT districts_NNS where_WRB the_DT greatest_JJS progress_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN in_IN training_VBG ex-inoculators_NNS ,_, of_IN a_DT sufficient_JJ inspecting_NN staff_NN ._.
Rules_NNS have_VBP also_RB been_VBN drawn_VBN up_RP and_CC sanctioned_VBN under_IN which_WDT licenses_VBZ for_IN the_DT practice_NN of_IN vaccination_NN are_VBP to_TO be_VB granted_VBN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN rewards_NNS to_TO such_JJ of_IN the_DT independent_JJ practitioners_NNS as_IN may_MD show_VB the_DT most_RBS successful_JJ results_NNS ._.
In_IN giving_VBG effect_NN to_TO these_DT rules_NNS ,_, care_NN should_MD be_VB taken_VBN not_RB to_TO assign_VB too_RB large_JJ an_DT area_NN to_TO each_DT ex-inoculator_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO secure_VB on_IN the_DT whole_JJ compact_JJ circles_NNS of_IN inspection_NN ,_, and_CC these_DT circles_NNS should_MD be_VB gradually_RB and_CC effectually_RB protected_VBN before_IN other_JJ circles_NNS are_VBP taken_VBN up_RP ._.
10_CD ._.
As_IN regards_NNS individual_JJ districts_NNS ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ observes_NNS that_WDT very_RB favourable_JJ mention_NN is_VBZ made_VBN of_IN the_DT continued_VBN interest_NN which_WDT Dr._NNP Conolly_NNP of_IN Bankoorah_NNP has_VBZ shown_VBN in_IN promoting_VBG vaccination_NN ._.
The_DT train-_JJ ing_NN of_IN ex-inoculators_NNS there_EX has_VBZ proceeded_VBN ,_, under_IN his_PRP$ supervision_NN ,_, with_IN very_RB satisfactory_JJ results_NNS ,_, and_CC His_PRP$ Honor_NNP desires_VBZ that_IN an_DT expression_NN of_IN the_DT thanks_NNS of_IN Government_NNP may_MD be_VB conveyed_VBN to_TO Dr._NNP Conolly_NNP for_IN the_DT energy_NN and_CC zeal_NN displayed_VBN by_IN him_PRP in_IN this_DT matter_NN ._.
In_IN Midnapore_NNP ,_, on_IN the_DT other_JJ hand_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT system_NN of_IN self-supporting_JJ vaccination_NN and_CC ex-inoculators_NNS had_VBD been_VBN fairly_RB started_VBN ,_, little_JJ or_CC no_DT progress_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN ,_, and_CC ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT absence_NN of_IN proper_JJ supervision_NN ,_, the_DT results_NNS are_VBP not_RB so_RB satisfactory_JJ as_IN they_PRP should_MD have_VB been_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP the_DT question_NN of_IN training_NN and_CC employ-_JJ ing_VBG ex-inoculators_NNS should_MD have_VB the_DT careful_JJ attention_NN of_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ when_WRB taking_VBG up_RP the_DT question_NN of_IN systematising_VBG the_DT operations_NNS of_IN the_DT circle_NN vaccinators_NNS ._.
The_DT question_NN of_IN opening_VBG out_RP two_CD new_JJ circles_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN for_IN the_DT Orissa_NNP and_CC Patna_NNP and_CC Bhagulpore_NNP divisions_NNS is_VBZ now_RB under_IN the_DT consideration_NN of_IN the_DT Govern-_NNP ment_NN ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT Darjeeling_NNP circle_NN ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ observes_NNS that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT lack_NN of_IN candidates_NNS to_TO practise_VB as_IN licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS ._.
As_IN the_DT entertainment_NN of_IN no_DT less_JJR than_IN 42_CD apprentices_NNS on_IN the_DT staff_NN of_IN this_DT circle_NN has_VBZ been_VBN sanctioned_VBN ,_, he_PRP trusts_VBZ that_IN there_EX will_MD be_VB no_DT difficulty_NN in_IN selecting_VBG men_NNS who_WP have_VBP undergone_VBN a_DT complete_JJ training_NN in_IN the_DT art_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN every_DT encouragement_NN will_MD be_VB given_VBN to_TO such_JJ men_NNS to_TO settle_VB down_RP as_RB independent_JJ practitioners_NNS ._.
11_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Orissa_NNP division_NN vaccination_NN is_VBZ still_RB limited_VBN to_TO the_DT sudder_NN stations_NNS and_CC to_TO the_DT dispensaries_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ immediate_JJ vicinity_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN the_DT Patna_NNP division_NN self-supporting_NN vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN initiated_VBN with_IN some_DT promise_NN of_IN success_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ ex-inoculators_NNS have_VBP been_VBN converted_VBN and_CC are_VBP now_RB practising_VBG ._.
In_IN the_DT Bhagulpore_NNP division_NN greater_JJR progress_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN made_VBN ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ gratifying_VBG to_TO learn_VB that_DT so_RB much_JJ has_VBZ already_RB been_VBN done_VBN in_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN this_DT division_NN to_TO promote_VB a_DT self-supporting_JJ system_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
12_CD ._.
In_IN his_PRP$ Minute_NNP already_RB referred_VBD to_TO ,_, Sir_NNP Richard_NNP Temple_NNP observed_VBD that_IN the_DT proper_JJ ,_, perhaps_RB the_DT only_JJ ,_, test_NN of_IN success_NN in_IN regard_NN to_TO vaccination_NN is_VBZ the_DT total_JJ disappearance_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT table_NN appended_VBD to_TO the_DT present_JJ report_NN ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ observed_VBN that_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN this_DT disease_NN registered_VBD in_IN Bengal_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN review_NN was_VBD 11,948_CD ,_, against_IN (_( 4_CD )_) 11,017_CD in_IN 1873_CD ._.
Judged_VBN by_IN this_DT primary_JJ test_NN ,_, then_RB ,_, we_PRP must_MD acknowledge_VB ,_, with_IN great_JJ regret_NN ,_, that_IN no_DT head_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN in_IN the_DT country_NN generally_RB against_IN this_DT disease_NN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP expects_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN this_DT considera-_JJ tion_NN will_MD have_VB the_DT effect_NN of_IN stimulating_VBG our_PRP$ officers_NNS to_TO further_JJ efforts_NNS ._.
The_DT better_JJR test_NN will_MD ,_, however_RB ,_, be_VB the_DT examination_NN of_IN the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN those_DT particular_JJ localities_NNS where_WRB vaccination_NN work_NN has_VBZ been_VBN concentrated_VBN in_IN the_DT manner_NN recently_RB laid_VBD down_RB ._.
And_CC the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ hopes_NNS that_IN this_DT will_MD be_VB done_VBN in_IN future_JJ annual_JJ reports_NNS ._.
13_CD ._.
The_DT fact_NN that_IN the_DT outbreak_NN of_IN this_DT disease_NN is_VBZ in_IN a_DT great_JJ many_JJ cases_NNS traceable_JJ to_TO the_DT operations_NNS of_IN inoculators_NNS ,_, has_VBZ often_RB been_VBN pressed_VBN on_IN the_DT notice_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.
The_DT prohibition_NN of_IN inoculation_NN where_WRB efficient_JJ vaccination_NN is_VBZ substituted_VBN is_VBZ ,_, as_IN remarked_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, an_DT unmixed_JJ good_NN ._.
Still_RB the_DT day_NN when_WRB it_PRP can_MD be_VB generally_RB prohibited_VBN in_IN these_DT provinces_NNS appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB yet_RB far_RB distant_JJ ,_, unless_IN greater_JJR efforts_NNS can_MD be_VB put_VBN forth_RB than_IN those_DT which_WDT have_VBP been_VBN heretofore_RB made_VBN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ hopes_NNS that_IN this_DT consideration_NN will_MD sink_VB into_IN the_DT minds_NNS of_IN all_DT district_NN officers_NNS in_IN whose_WP$ jurisdiction_NN vaccination_NN has_VBZ not_RB yet_RB been_VBN fully_RB organized_VBN ,_, as_IN there_EX are_VBP few_JJ districts_NNS where_WRB the_DT existing_VBG staff_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS is_VBZ sufficient_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT Metro-_NNP politan_NN circles_VBZ the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ glad_JJ to_TO observe_VB that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS performed_VBN is_VBZ estimated_VBN to_TO be_VB more_JJR than_IN sufficient_JJ to_TO meet_VB the_DT requirements_NNS of_IN the_DT population_NN in_IN this_DT respect_NN ,_, and_CC there_RB accordingly_RB inocula-_JJ tion_NN has_VBZ been_VBN prohibited_VBN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN other_JJ places_NNS where_WRB proper_NN and_CC sufficient_JJ arrangements_NNS have_VBP been_VBN made_VBN to_TO carry_VB on_IN vaccination_NN ._.
Still_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, inocu-_JJ lators_NNS are_VBP found_VBN to_TO practise_VB ,_, and_CC so_RB long_RB as_IN this_DT is_VBZ the_DT case_NN ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP can_MD not_RB absolve_VB the_DT local_JJ magistracy_NN from_IN the_DT charge_NN of_IN apathy_JJ and_CC indifference_NN ._.
In_IN Calcutta_NNP itself_PRP ,_, though_IN inoculation_NN has_VBZ long_RB been_VBN prohibited_VBN ,_, scattered_VBD outbreaks_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN continue_NN to_TO occur_VB ._.
The_DT figures_NNS given_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP ,_, to_TO show_VB the_DT effect_NN which_WDT vaccination_NN has_VBZ had_VBN in_IN repressing_VBG the_DT disease_NN ,_, are_VBP very_RB interesting_JJ ._.
They_PRP seem_VBP to_TO prove_VB that_DT comparatively_RB large_JJ as_IN was_VBD the_DT number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN small-pox_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, they_PRP yet_RB represent_VBP but_CC a_DT very_RB small_JJ proportion_NN of_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN such_JJ an_DT epidemic_JJ as_IN might_MD reasonably_RB be_VB expected_VBN to_TO occur_VB in_IN Calcutta_NNP every_DT fifth_NN or_CC sixth_JJ year_NN in_IN the_DT absence_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
14_CD ._.
In_IN conclusion_NN ,_, the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP would_MD express_VB his_PRP$ concur-_JJ rence_NN with_IN the_DT opinion_NN of_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ that_IN the_DT history_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP during_IN 1874-75_JJ contains_NNS some_DT (_( though_IN not_RB sufficient_JJ )_) element_NN of_IN pro-_JJ gress_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ suggestive_JJ of_IN hope_NN for_IN greater_JJR things_NNS in_IN future_JJ ._.

19_CD ._.
A_DT sensible_JJ programme_NN embracing_VBG the_DT season_NN 's_POS operations_NNS which_WDT was_VBD prepared_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Gupta_NNP ,_, and_CC by_IN me_PRP submitted_VBD formally_RB to_TO Government_NNP ,_, was_VBD approved_VBN and_CC sanctioned_VBN after_IN due_JJ consultation_NN with_IN the_DT local_JJ civil_JJ authorities_NNS ._.
The_DT vaccinators_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN out_RP in_IN the_DT middle_NN of_IN September_NNP ,_, after_IN the_DT usual_JJ preparations_NNS had_VBD been_VBN made_VBN ,_, viz_NN ._.
the_DT local_JJ civil_JJ authorities_NNS were_VBD informed_VBN and_CC requested_VBN to_TO give_VB every_DT aid_NN ._.
The_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN was_VBD partly_RB carried_VBN on_IN in_IN the_DT southern_JJ half_NN of_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN JessoreFOR_NNP THE_NNP YEAR_NNP 1875-76_CD ._.
7_CD 434_CD villages_NNS ,_, situated_VBN in_IN 33_CD thanas_NNS and_CC five_CD districts_NNS ,_, and_CC inspected_VBD over_IN 46,500_CD cases_NNS ._.
The_DT following_VBG table_NN shows_VBZ the_DT result_NN of_IN his_PRP$ inspection_NN :_: 8_CD REPORT_NNP OF_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP Joynuggore_NNP ,_, one_CD in_IN Nawabgunge_NNP ,_, one_CD in_IN Assasoonee_NNP ,_, two_CD in_IN Bankipore_NNP ,_, two_CD in_IN Sooltanpore_NNP ,_, one_CD in_IN Nyehatty_NNP ,_, one_CD in_IN Bishtopore_NNP ,_, and_CC one_CD in_IN Mothoorapore_NNP ._.
Burdwan_NNP ._.

Howrah_NNP ._.

&_CC quot_NN ;_: One_CD was_VBD reported_VBN from_IN Jessore_NNP ,_, affecting_VBG one_CD village_NN in_IN thana_NNP Dalootee._NNP &_CC quot_NN ;_: Vaccinators_NNS supplied_VBD to_TO municipalities_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN 25_CD ._.
Several_JJ municipalities_NNS and_CC a_DT few_JJ private_JJ individuals_NNS applied_VBN for_IN and_CC obtained_VBD the_DT services_NNS of_IN trained_JJ vaccinators_NNS from_IN the_DT staff_NN of_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP circles_NNS ,_, for_IN periods_NNS varying_VBG from_IN one_CD to_TO six_CD months_NNS ,_, and_CC at_IN the_DT rate_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
12_CD per_IN month_NN ._.
About_IN 6,000_CD vaccinations_NNS were_VBD thus_RB done_VBN by_IN their_PRP$ instrumentality_NN ._.
Results_NNS ._.
26_CD ._.
The_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP circles_NNS are_VBP very_RB satisfactory_JJ ,_, and_CC exceedingly_RB credit-_JJ able_JJ to_TO Dr._NNP Gupta_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ assistants_NNS Rai_NNP Jadub_NNP Chunder_NNP Ghose_NNP Bahadoor_NNP ,_, Rai_NNP Ram_NNP Soondur_NNP Ghose_NNP Bahadoor_NNP ,_, and_CC Buddy_NNP Nath_NNP Brummo_NNP ._.
The_DT first-named_JJ assistant_NN ,_, Rai_NNP Jadub_NNP Chunder_NNP Ghose_NNP Bahadoor_NNP ,_, is_VBZ singled_VBN out_RP for_IN special_JJ praise_NN for_IN returning_VBG the_DT largest_JJS number_NN ever_RB given_VBN ,_, and_CC deserves_VBZ the_DT favourable_JJ notice_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.
The_DT Metropolitan_NNP circles_NNS have_VBP contributed_VBN one-half_NN of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS done_VBN in_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT work_NN was_VBD of_IN a_DT high_JJ order_NN ,_, as_IN proved_VBN by_IN the_DT personal_JJ inspection_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ deputies_NNS ._.
For_IN such_JJ good_JJ work_NN increasing_VBG year_NN after_IN year_NN ,_, and_CC with_IN the_DT lowest_JJS average_NN cost_NN (_( Re_NNP ._.
0-1-3_NN )_) ,_, Dr._NNP Gupta_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ assistants_NNS are_VBP entitled_VBN to_TO all_PDT the_DT credit_NN which_WDT is_VBZ usually_RB bestowed_VBN upon_IN the_DT good_JJ and_CC faithful_JJ servants_NNS ._.
DARJEELING_NNP CIRCLE_NNP Establishment_NNP ._.
27_CD ._.
Darjeeling_VBG Circle.FOR_NNP THE_DT YEAR_NNP 1875-76_CD ._.

in_IN this_DT district_NN were_VBD joined_VBN on_IN to_TO those_DT in_IN Rungpore_NNP and_CC Bogra_NNP ._.

The_DT comparatively_RB small_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN municipal_JJ vacci-_JJ nators_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT smallness_NN of_IN the_DT sums_NNS devoted_VBN by_IN municipalities_NNS to_TO their_PRP$ support_NN ,_, has_VBZ lately_RB attracted_VBN the_DT special_JJ attention_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC separate_JJ instructions_NNS on_IN the_DT subject_NN have_VBP been_VBN issued_VBN to_TO district_NN officers_NNS ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP can_MD not_RB but_CC view_VBP with_IN dissatisfaction_NN the_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN dispensary_JJ vaccinators_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ the_DT duty_NN of_IN every_DT medical_JJ officer_NN in_IN charge_NN of_IN a_DT dispensary_JJ to_TO promote_VB vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT apparent_JJ general_JJ neglect_NN of_IN this_DT part_NN of_IN their_PRP$ duty_NN should_MD engage_VB the_DT attention_NN of_IN the_DT Surgeon-_NNP General_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
The_DT aggregate_JJ cost_NN of_IN vaccination_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, as_IN shown_VBN in_IN the_DT report_NN ,_, was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
1,05,800_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT Government_NNP contributed_VBD Rs_NNP ._.
96,629_CD ,_, the_DT (_( 3_CD )_) balance_NN being_VBG defrayed_VBN by_IN municipalities_NNS and_CC from_IN local_JJ sources_NNS ._.

92,413_CD contributed_VBN by_IN the_DT State_NNP out_IN of_IN a_DT total_JJ expenditure_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
1,02,069_CD ._.
It_PRP therefore_RB appears_VBZ that_IN the_DT local_JJ contributions_NNS amounted_VBD to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
9,171_CD only_RB in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, against_IN Rs_NNP ._.
9,656_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
This_DT result_NN is_VBZ not_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
An_DT increase_NN of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
3,731_CD in_IN the_DT total_JJ expenditure_NN falling_VBG upon_IN the_DT Government_NNP ,_, is_VBZ attributable_JJ to_TO the_DT open-_JJ ing_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD new_JJ circles_NNS above_RB referred_VBD to_TO ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ case_NN of_IN vaccination_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN was_VBD one_CD anna_NN ten_NN pies_NNS ,_, or_CC precisely_RB the_DT same_JJ as_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP ,_, Metropolitan_NNP ,_, and_CC Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP Circles_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT sensible_JJ reduction_NN in_IN the_DT average_JJ cost_NN ,_, while_IN in_IN the_DT Ranchee_NNP Circle_NNP the_DT cost_NN was_VBD nearly_RB double_JJ that_IN of_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.
11_CD ._.
In_IN reviewing_VBG in_IN detail_NN the_DT progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT different_JJ circles_NNS of_IN superintendence_NN ,_, the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ remarks_NNS that_IN in_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ Suburbs_NNP the_DT character_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN remained_VBD as_RB high_JJ as_IN ever_RB ;_: that_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP continued_VBD to_TO apply_VB himself_PRP with_IN his_PRP$ usual_JJ devotion_NN to_TO his_PRP$ work_NN ;_: and_CC that_IN he_PRP and_CC his_PRP$ establishment_NN have_VBP achieved_VBN a_DT splendid_JJ success_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP Circles_NNP operations_NNS were_VBD chiefly_NNS carried_VBN on_IN in_IN the_DT Jessore_NNP district_NN ._.
The_DT system_NN pursued_VBD ,_, as_IN described_VBN ,_, being_VBG &_CC quot_NN ;_: continuous_JJ systematic_JJ progress_NN by_IN gangs_NNS under_IN close_JJ inspec-_JJ tion_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT exhaustive_JJ protection_NN of_IN definite_JJ areas_NNS radiating_VBG from_IN a_DT centre._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: The_DT proceedings_NNS have_VBP therefore_RB been_VBN entirely_RB in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN Government_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, which_WDT prescribe_VBP the_DT concentration_NN of_IN operations_NNS ._.
The_DT results_NNS are_VBP said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN very_RB satisfactory_JJ and_CC exceedingly_RB creditable_JJ to_TO Dr._NNP Gupta_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ assistants_NNS Rai_NNP Jadub_NNP Chunder_NNP Ghose_NNP Bahadoor_NNP ,_, Rai_NNP Ramsoonder_NNP Ghose_NNP Bahadoor_NNP ,_, and_CC Buddy_NNP Nath_NNP Brummo_NNP ._.
A_DT similarly_RB favour-_JJ able_JJ report_NN is_VBZ given_VBN of_IN the_DT work_NN done_VBN in_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP Circle_NNP ._.

12_CD ._.
As_IN it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB intended_VBN that_IN the_DT circle_NN establishments_NNS should_MD be_VB a_DT permanent_JJ burden_NN on_IN the_DT resources_NNS of_IN the_DT State_NNP ,_, the_DT importance_NN of_IN training_VBG up_RP men_NNS who_WP shall_MD eventually_RB enter_VB upon_IN independent_JJ practice_NN as_IN vaccinators_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN frequently_RB pressed_VBN upon_IN the_DT attention_NN of_IN all_DT medical_JJ officers_NNS ._.

13_CD ._.
The_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT experiment_NN are_VBP reported_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ in_IN the_DT districts_NNS in_IN which_WDT it_PRP was_VBD tried_VBN ._.
In_IN Midnapore_NNP three_CD inspecting_VBG vaccinators_NNS were_VBD entertained_VBN ,_, and_CC twenty-six_JJ apprentices_NNS were_VBD placed_VBN under_IN (_( 4_CD )_) training_NN ._.

In_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP two_CD apprentices_NNS were_VBD trained_VBN ,_, and_CC seventy-five_JJ ex-inoculators_NNS vaccinated_VBD 57,722_CD persons_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT Bhagulpore_NNP district_NN three_CD ex-inoculators_NNS vaccinated_VBD 3,973_CD persons_NNS ._.

One_CD hundred_CD and_CC ninety_CD ex-inoculators_NNS are_VBP also_RB said_VBD to_TO have_VB been_VBN employed_VBN ,_, who_WP vaccinated_VBD 21,063_CD persons_NNS ._.
In_IN Chumparun_NNP forty-nine_JJ ex-inoculators_NNS vaccinated_VBD 2,123_CD children_NNS ._.
These_DT results_NNS are_VBP encouraging_VBG ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ unfortunately_RB clear_JJ ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN all_PDT the_DT civil_JJ surgeons_NNS con-_NNS cerned_VBN have_VBP not_RB taken_VBN the_DT same_JJ amount_NN of_IN interest_NN in_IN the_DT matter_NN ._.

14_CD ._.
Briefly_NNP stated_VBD ,_, the_DT result_NN of_IN the_DT experiment_NN was_VBD this_DT ,_, that_IN in_IN eight_CD districts_NNS no_DT less_JJR than_IN 178,032_CD persons_NNS were_VBD successfully_RB vaccinated_VBN at_IN an_DT aggregate_NN cost_NN to_TO Government_NNP of_IN Rs_NNP ._.
3,311_CD only_RB ,_, or_CC on_IN the_DT average_NN at_IN a_DT cost_NN of_IN just_RB one_CD quarter_NN of_IN an_DT anna_NN per_IN case_NN ._.
As_IN noted_VBN above_IN ,_, these_DT results_NNS do_VBP not_RB at_IN all_DT repre-_JJ sent_VBD what_WP might_MD have_VB been_VBN achieved_VBN had_VBD all_DT the_DT officers_NNS worked_VBD with_IN equal_JJ zeal_NN and_CC interest_NN ._.
15_CD ._.
The_DT conclusion_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP has_VBZ arrived_VBN on_IN the_DT whole_JJ question_NN is_VBZ that_IN the_DT time_NN has_VBZ now_RB arrived_VBN when_WRB he_PRP must_MD make_VB it_PRP distinctly_RB understood_VBD that_IN where_WRB districts_NNS have_VBP been_VBN once_RB gone_VBN over_IN and_CC thoroughly_RB protected_VBN by_IN the_DT circle_NN establishments_NNS ,_, the_DT civil_JJ surgeons_NNS of_IN districts_NNS must_MD be_VB held_VBN responsible_JJ for_IN organizing_VBG establishments_NNS of_IN independent_JJ practi-_JJ tioners_NNS with_IN a_DT view_NN to_TO maintain_VB vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT protected_JJ areas_NNS ._.

Pubna_NNP is_VBZ among_IN this_DT number_NN ._.
16_CD ._.

(_( 5_CD )_) Dr._NNP Charles_NNP ,_, Calcutta_NNP ._.

FROM_IN THE_NNP SURGEON-GENERAL_NNP FOR_NNP BENGAL_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP ,_, JUDICIAL_NNP ,_, POLITICAL_NNP ,_, AND_NNP APPOINTMENT_NNP DEPARTMENTS_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT 6th_CD September_NNP 1879_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, IN_NNP submitting_VBG the_DT report_NN on_IN Vaccination_NNP in_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN commencing_VBG 1st_CD April_NNP 1878_CD and_CC terminating_VBG 31st_CD March_NNP 1879_CD ,_, I_PRP have_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO state_NN that_IN during_IN that_DT period_NN Surgeon-Major_NNP T._NNP E._NNP Charles_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, was_VBD Superintendent-General_JJ of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, Calcutta_NNP and_CC suburbs_NNS ,_, and_CC Surgeon-_NNP Major_NNP R._NNP Lidderdale_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
Surgeon_NNP J._NNP J_NNP ._.
Wood_NN ,_, M.B._NNP ,_, was_VBD Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Ranchee_NNP Circle_NNP from_IN 1st_CD April_NNP to_TO the_DT 22nd_CD July_NNP 1878_CD ,_, when_WRB ,_, having_VBG been_VBN appointed_VBN to_TO act_VB as_IN Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Hazaribagh_NNP in_IN room_NN of_IN Dr._NNP E._NNP A._NNP Birch_NNP ,_, who_WP was_VBD proceeding_VBG to_TO England_NNP on_IN sick_JJ leave_NN ,_, Surgeon_NNP D._NNP Basu_NNP relieved_VBD him_PRP ,_, and_CC continued_VBD to_TO officiate_VB as_IN Superintendent_NNP during_IN the_DT remainder_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT Metropolitan_NNP Circles_NNP were_VBD superintended_VBN during_IN the_DT entire_JJ year_NN by_IN Surgeon_NNP K._NNP P._NNP Gupta_NNP ,_, M.B_NNP ._.
The_DT Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP Circle_NNP was_VBD under_IN Apothecary_NNP A._NN Lyons_NNP ;_: the_DT Behar_NNP Circle_NNP under_IN Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Kali_NNP Dass_NNP Bose_NNP as_IN Superintendent_NNP ;_: the_DT Sonthal_NNP Per-_NNP gunnahs_NN under_IN Deputy_NNP Superintendent_NNP Mothoora_NNP Nath_NNP Sen_NNP ;_: and_CC the_DT Orissa_NNP Circle_NNP under_IN Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Prisitosh_NNP Haldar_NNP ._.

Agency.2_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP 3_CD ._.
Operations.FOR_IN THE_DT YEAR_NN 1878-79_RB ._.
3_CD 6_CD ._.
Net_JJ increase.4_NN REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP 9_CD ._.
Sex_NN of_IN those_DT vaccinated.FOR_IN THE_DT YEAR_NN 1878-79_RB ._.
5_CD 13_CD ._.
I._NN must_MD refer_VB to_TO the_DT reports_NNS of_IN Superintendents_NNS which_WDT follow_VBP for_IN details_NNS as_IN to_TO the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT different_JJ circles_NNS ._.
I_PRP have_VBP merely_RB a_DT few_JJ remarks_NNS to_TO make_VB in_IN reference_NN to_TO these_DT reports_NNS ._.
Dr._NNP Charles_NNP has_VBZ sent_VBN a_DT full_JJ report_NN on_IN the_DT small-pox_JJ epidemic_NN which_WDT has_VBZ prevailed_VBN in_IN Calcutta_NNP during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
That_DT small-pox_NN should_MD so_RB extensively_RB prevail_VBP in_IN Calcutta_NNP is_VBZ of_IN course_NN an_DT indication_NN of_IN a_DT want_NN of_IN sufficient_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, but_CC whether_IN this_DT is_VBZ owing_VBG to_TO any_DT deficiency_NN in_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP Vaccine_NNP Department_NNP I_PRP have_VBP not_RB the_DT means_NNS of_IN ascertaining_VBG ._.
It_PRP must_MD also_RB be_VB fully_RB admitted_VBN that_IN probably_RB Calcutta_NNP ,_, from_IN its_PRP$ position_NN and_CC from_IN the_DT large_JJ numbers_NNS of_IN strangers_NNS in_IN the_DT shape_NN of_IN emigrants_NNS ,_, pilgrims_NNS ,_, and_CC people_NNS in_IN search_NN of_IN work_NN who_WP flock_VBZ to_TO it_PRP ,_, can_MD never_RB be_VB properly_RB protected_VBN till_NN such_JJ people_NNS believe_VBP more_RBR fully_RB in_IN vaccination_NN than_IN they_PRP do_VBP at_IN present_NN ._.
Dr._NNP Charles_NNP gives_VBZ details_NNS of_IN the_DT extraordinary_JJ arrangements_NNS which_WDT he_PRP made_VBD for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN in_IN May_NNP 1879_CD ,_, when_WRB he_PRP employed_VBD the_DT staff_NN of_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP Circles_NNP for_IN that_DT purpose_NN ._.

15_CD &_CC quot_NN ;_: The_DT presence_NN of_IN cholera_NN during_IN the_DT whole_JJ cold_NN weather_NN interfered_VBD with_IN operations_NNS in_IN many_JJ places_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD generally_RB distributed_VBN ,_, of_IN a_DT severe_JJ type_NN ,_, and_CC many_JJ deaths_NNS occurred_VBD ;_: fever_NN ,_, of_IN course_NN ,_, gave_VBD much_JJ trouble_NN ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: Several_NNP of_IN the_DT thanas_NN taken_VBN up_RP had_VBD already_RB been_VBN visited_VBN by_IN men_NNS sent_VBN out_RP from_IN dis-_JJ pensaries_NNS ,_, and_CC by_IN others_NNS ,_, stealing_VBG instruments_NNS and_CC lymph_NN and_CC taking_VBG the_DT name_NN of_IN Government_NNP vacinators_NNS ._.

As_IN these_DT men_NNS had_VBD been_VBN ordered_VBN about_IN and_CC had_VBD been_VBN obliged_VBN to_TO work_VB only_RB when_WRB it_PRP suited_VBD the_DT villagers_NNS ,_, the_DT same_JJ system_NN of_IN treatment_NN was_VBD adopted_VBN towards_JJ Government_NNP vacccinators_NNS desiring_VBG to_TO progress_VB steadily_RB on_IN from_IN village_NN to_TO village_VB leaving_VBG nobody_JJ unpro-_JJ tected_VBN behind_IN ,_, the_DT constant_NN disputes_VBZ which_WDT arose_VBD ,_, and_CC delays_NNS which_WDT were_VBD brought_VBN about_RB show_VBP how_WRB very_RB undesirable_JJ it_PRP is_VBZ even_RB to_TO carry_VB on_IN vaccine_JJ operations_NNS in_IN any_DT country_NN except_IN on_IN a_DT regular_JJ understood_NN system_NN and_CC under_IN proper_JJ supervision_NN ._.

against_IN 34,748_CD ,_, or_CC 97.87_CD ,_, in_IN 1877-78_JJ ._.

&_CC quot_NN ;_: No_CC pains_NNS were_VBD spared_VBN to_TO work_VB in_IN a_DT thorough_NN and_CC systematic_JJ manner_NN and_CC protect_JJ village_NN after_IN village_NN ._.

3_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS reported_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN successful_JJ in_IN 1878-79_JJ was_VBD 1,251,936_CD ,_, against_IN 1,182,665_CD in_IN 1877-78_JJ ._.

in_IN 1877-78_CD ._.

of_IN the_DT primary_JJ ,_, and_CC 77.57_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT secondary_JJ operations_NNS are_VBP reported_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN successful_JJ in_IN 1878-79_JJ ,_, against_IN 93.77_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
and_CC 84.29_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, respectively_RB ,_, in_IN 1877-78_JJ ._.
4_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT persons_NNS vaccinated_VBD during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, the_DT age_NN was_VBD recorded_VBN of_IN only_RB 1,246,290_CD ,_, and_CC of_IN these_DT 106,695_CD ,_, or_CC 8.5_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, were_VBD under_IN one_CD year_NN and_CC the_DT rest_NN above_IN that_DT age_NN ._.

were_VBD males_NNS ,_, and_CC 46.18_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.

&_CC quot_NN ;_: other_JJ castes._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Compared_VBN with_IN the_DT results_NNS of_IN 1877-78_JJ ,_, the_DT proportions_NNS of_IN males_NNS and_CC females_NNS were_VBD nearly_RB the_DT same_JJ ,_, but_CC there_RB was_VBD a_DT considerable_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN Hindoos_NNP ,_, and_CC a_DT corresponding_JJ decrease_NN in_IN that_DT of_IN Mussulmans_NNPS ._.

5_CD ._.

of_IN the_DT total_JJ cost_NN ,_, against_IN 11.01_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
in_IN 1877-78_CD ._.
The_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ case_NN was_VBD 1_CD anna_NN and_CC 6_CD pies_NNS ,_, against_IN 1_CD anna_NN and_CC 7_CD pies_NNS in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ._.

In_IN dispensaries_NNS ,_, it_PRP rose_VBD from_IN 10_CD pies_NNS in_IN 1877-78_JJ to_TO 1_CD anna_NNS and_CC 1_CD pie_NN in_IN 1878-79_JJ ._.
6_CD ._.
The_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN each_DT circle_NN vaccinator_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN was_VBD 1,191_CD ,_, against_IN 1,488_CD in_IN 1877-78_JJ ._.
In_IN the_DT Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP ,_, Darjeeling_NNP ,_, and_CC Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP circles_NNS ,_, there_EX was_VBD a_DT slight_JJ increase_NN in_IN 1878-79_JJ in_IN the_DT amount_NN of_IN work_NN done_VBN by_IN each_DT vaccinator_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Orissa_NNP and_CC Ranchee_NNP circles_VBZ a_DT slight_JJ decrease_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Behar_NNP circle_NN the_DT decrease_NN was_VBD more_JJR than_IN 22_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP circle_NN more_JJR than_IN 37_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP circle_NN ,_, in_IN which_WDT the_DT decrease_NN was_VBD greatest_JJS ,_, each_DT vaccinator_NN on_IN an_DT average_NN did_VBD less_JJR than_IN half_PDT the_DT work_NN per-_NN formed_VBN in_IN 1877-78_JJ ,_, but_CC this_DT was_VBD due_JJ in_IN a_DT great_JJ measure_NN to_TO the_DT introduction_NN of_IN the_DT self-supporting_JJ system_NN of_IN vaccination_NN ._.
As_IN in_IN 1877-78_JJ and_CC 1876-77_JJ ,_, the_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS was_VBD lowest_JJS in_IN the_DT Behar_NNP circle_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT out-turn_NN of_IN work_NN in_IN this_DT circle_NN since_IN it_PRP came_VBD into_IN existence_NN has_VBZ been_VBN so_RB small_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB dispro-_JJ portionate_NN to_TO its_PRP$ cost_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN Patna_NNP recently_RB recommended_VBD the_DT abolition_NN of_IN the_DT whole_JJ establishment_NN ._.
The_DT opposition_NN offered_VBD to_TO vaccination_NN here_RB appears_VBZ ,_, however_RB ,_, to_TO be_VB greater_JJR than_IN in_IN other_JJ circles_NNS ,_, and_CC as_RB in_IN this_DT matter_NN the_DT Beharis_NNP are_VBP less_RBR docile_JJ ,_, and_CC more_JJR obstinate_NN than_IN the_DT Bengalis_NNP and_CC Ooryas_NNP ,_, a_DT great_JJ deal_NN of_IN tact_NN and_CC energy_NN is_VBZ required_VBN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP has_VBZ allowed_VBN the_DT circle_NN to_TO remain_VB for_IN the_DT present_JJ as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ ,_, but_CC if_IN the_DT results_NNS continue_VBP to_TO be_VB as_RB unsatisfactory_JJ as_IN they_PRP have_VBP been_VBN ,_, it_PRP will_MD be_VB a_DT question_NN whether_IN the_DT present_JJ expensive_JJ establishment_NN should_MD not_RB be_VB done_VBN away_RB with_IN ._.
(_( 3_CD )_) 7_CD ._.
The_DT system_NN of_IN self-supporting_JJ vaccination_NN under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN officers_NNS attached_VBN to_TO circles_NNS and_CC paid_VBN by_IN Government_NNP was_VBD worked_VBN on_IN a_DT very_RB extensive_JJ scale_NN during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD introduced_VBN throughout_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP circle_NN ,_, the_DT largest_JJS circle_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, where_WRB it_PRP was_VBD only_RB partially_RB tried_VBN in_IN 1877-78_CD ._.
The_DT establishment_NN of_IN paid_VBN vaccin-_NN ators_NNS and_CC head-vaccinators_NNS attached_VBN to_TO this_DT circle_NN was_VBD abolished_VBN from_IN October_NNP 1878_CD ,_, and_CC licensed_VBD vaccinators_NNS were_VBD substituted_VBN ,_, who_WP worked_VBD for_IN their_PRP$ own_JJ benefit_NN and_CC without_IN aid_NN from_IN Government_NNP ._.
Instead_RB of_IN the_DT 12_CD head-_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, 102_CD vaccinators_NNS and_CC 66_CD ex-inoculators_NNS employed_VBN in_IN 1877-78_JJ ,_, 294_CD licensed_VBD vaccinators_NNS worked_VBD during_IN the_DT past_JJ season_NN ,_, under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN 24_CD Inspectors_NNS ,_, four_CD Deputy_NN Superintendents_NNP ,_, and_CC one_CD Superintendent_NN ._.
These_DT vaccinators_NNS were_VBD authorized_VBN to_TO charge_VB a_DT uniform_JJ fee_NN of_IN two_CD annas_NNS for_IN each_DT successful_JJ operation_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN ,_, the_DT percentage_NN of_IN successful_JJ cases_NNS in_IN primary_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ case_NN were_VBD 3,94,186_CD ,_, 99.37_CD ,_, and_CC 1_CD anna_NN 3_CD pies_NNS ,_, respectively_RB ,_, against_IN 457,757_CD ,_, 99.56_CD ,_, and_CC 1_CD anna_NN 4_CD pies_NNS ,_, respectively_RB ,_, in_IN 1877-78_JJ ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP agrees_VBZ with_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ in_IN thinking_VBG that_IN the_DT results_NNS obtained_VBD in_IN this_DT circle_NN were_VBD satisfactory_JJ for_IN the_DT first_JJ season_NN of_IN the_DT experiment_NN ._.
8_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP circle_NN 90_CD licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS worked_VBD during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ,_, against_IN 69_CD in_IN the_DT year_NN preceding_NN ._.
They_PRP were_VBD under_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN three_CD Inspectors_NNS ,_, and_CC one_CD Deputy_NNP Superintendent_NNP ,_, and_CC performed_VBD 88,871_CD operations_NNS ,_, against_IN 63,429_CD in_IN 1877-78_JJ ._.
Each_DT successful_JJ case_NN cost_NN the_DT Government_NNP for_IN supervision_NN five_CD pies_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN a_DT successful_JJ operation_NN performed_VBN by_IN the_DT paid_JJ staff_NN was_VBD two_CD annas_NNS and_CC one_CD pie_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Ranchee_NNP circle_NN 125_CD licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS and_CC ex-inoculators_NNS ,_, under_IN three_CD Inspectors_NNS paid_VBN by_IN Government_NNP and_CC one_CD Inspector_NNP paid_VBN by_IN the_DT Sirgoojah_NNP estate_NN ,_, operated_VBN on_IN 87,492_CD persons_NNS ,_, against_IN 91,061_CD persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN by_IN 128_CD ex-inoculators_NNS in_IN 1877-78_CD ._.
The_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ operation_NN in_IN 1878-79_CD was_VBD 2_CD (_( 4_CD )_) previous_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS employed_VBN in_IN municipalities_NNS and_CC dispensaries_NNS in_IN 1878-79_CD was_VBD 159_CD ,_, against_IN 192_CD in_IN 1877-78_CD ,_, the_DT decrease_NN being_VBG due_JJ to_TO the_DT abolition_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN of_IN Government_NNP vaccinators_NNS attached_VBD to_TO dispensaries_NNS ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN these_DT men_NNS and_CC by_IN medical_JJ subordinates_NNS attached_VBN to_TO dispensaries_NNS was_VBD 122,822_CD ,_, of_IN which_WDT 114,781_CD are_VBP reported_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN successful_JJ ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ agrees_NNS with_IN Dr._NNP Irving_NNP that_IN all_DT vaccine_NN operations_NNS carried_VBD on_IN within_IN a_DT vaccin-_JJ ation_NN circle_NN should_MD be_VB entirely_RB directed_VBN and_CC superintended_VBN by_IN officers_NNS of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP ._.
Dr._NNP Lawrie_NNP 's_POS report_NN on_IN the_DT ex-inoculators_NNS in_IN Monghyr_NNP is_VBZ now_RB the_DT subject_NN of_IN a_DT separate_JJ correspondence_NN with_IN the_DT Surgeon-_NNP General_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
Of_IN the_DT 394,186_CD operations_NNS in_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP circle_NN ,_, 291,745_CD ,_, or_CC about_IN 75_CD per_IN cent._NN ,_, were_VBD verified_VBN by_IN the_DT Inspectors_NNS ,_, while_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Superin-_NNP tendents_NNS inspected_VBD 135,198_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP 29,270_CD cases_NNS ._.
In_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP circle_NN more_JJR than_IN one-third_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN the_DT paid_VBN vaccinators_NNS were_VBD inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP and_CC his_PRP$ deputy_NN ._.
Nearly_RB half_PDT the_DT work_NN turned_VBD out_RP by_IN both_DT paid_VBN and_CC licensed_VBN vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT Ranchee_NNP circle_NN was_VBD examined_VBN ._.
In_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP circle_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN 36,287_CD vaccinations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN the_DT paid_VBN establishment_NN ,_, 10,241_CD were_VBD verified_VBN by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Superintendent_NNP ,_, and_CC about_IN the_DT same_JJ number_NN by_IN the_DT Inspectors_NNS ;_: while_IN ,_, out_IN of_IN 3,942_CD operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN the_DT licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, 635_CD were_VBD inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Superintendent_NNP and_CC only_RB 425_CD by_IN the_DT Inspectors_NNS ._.
Very_RB little_JJ work_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN done_VBN by_IN the_DT Inspectors_NNPS in_IN this_DT circle_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP circle_NN ,_, out_IN of_IN 184,854_CD operations_NNS by_IN the_DT paid_JJ staff_NN ,_, 25,275_CD were_VBD verified_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ._.
More_JJR than_IN 50_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT cases_NNS in_IN the_DT Orissa_NNP circle_NN ,_, and_CC more_JJR than_IN 78_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN those_DT in_IN the_DT Behar_NNP circle_NN were_VBD examined_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN the_DT respective_JJ circles_NNS ._.
On_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, a_DT fair_JJ amount_NN of_IN inspection_NN work_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN performed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
10_CD ._.
The_DT epidemic_NN of_IN small-pox_NN which_WDT visited_VBD Calcutta_NNP in_IN 1877-78_JJ continued_JJ with_IN unabated_JJ severity_NN during_IN the_DT early_JJ months_NNS of_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN ._.
The_DT registered_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN April_NNP 1878_CD was_VBD 338_CD ,_, against_IN 287_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ month_NN ._.
In_IN May_NNP the_DT number_NN was_VBD 331_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN June_NNP 253_CD ._.
In_IN July_NNP ,_, August_NNP ,_, and_CC September_NNP the_DT mortality_NN diminished_VBD considerably_RB ,_, the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS in_IN those_DT months_NNS being_VBG 114_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT last_JJ quarter_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN there_EX were_VBD 46_CD deaths_NNS ,_, in_IN January_NNP 63_CD ,_, in_IN February_NNP 133_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN March_NNP 212_CD ._.
The_DT epidemic_JJ thus_RB extended_VBN over_RP two_CD years_NNS ,_, a_DT circumstance_NN of_IN very_RB rare_JJ occurrence_NN ,_, there_EX being_VBG in_IN the_DT office_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent-General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP only_RB one_CD other_JJ recorded_VBD instance_NN ,_, viz_NN ._.
the_DT epidemic_NN of_IN 1849_CD and_CC 1850_CD ,_, when_WRB 1,724_CD deaths_NNS occurred_VBD in_IN the_DT former_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC 4,492_CD in_IN the_DT latter_NN ._.
The_DT contrast_NN between_IN the_DT high_JJ figures_NNS of_IN 1850_CD and_CC the_DT much_RB lighter_JJR ones_NNS of_IN 1879_CD is_VBZ so_RB far_RB satisfactory_JJ that_IN it_PRP points_VBZ strongly_RB to_TO the_DT increased_VBN pro-_JJ tection_NN against_IN small-pox_NN afforded_VBD to_TO the_DT general_JJ population_NN since_IN 1850_CD ._.
Dr._NNP Charles_NNP attributes_VBZ the_DT exceptional_JJ prevalence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN May_NNP and_CC June_NNP 1878_CD to_TO the_DT coolness_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, and_CC expresses_VBZ the_DT opinion_NN that_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN usually_RB met_VBN with_IN in_IN those_DT months_NNS &_CC quot_NN ;_: desiccates_NNS and_CC renders_NNS inert_VBP the_DT contagion_NN of_IN small-pox_JJ and_CC of_IN all_DT other_JJ contagious_JJ diseases._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: A_DT tempera-_JJ ture_NN of_IN almost_RB 70°_CD F._NNP ,_, he_PRP states_VBZ ,_, allows_VBZ small-pox_NN to_TO spread_VB with_IN fatal_JJ freedom_NN ,_, a_DT temperature_NN of_IN 80°_CD checks_NNS its_PRP$ progress_NN materially_RB and_CC decreases_VBZ the_DT death-rate_NN ,_, while_IN a_DT continuance_NN of_IN a_DT temperature_NN of_IN 85°_CD for_IN two_CD or_CC three_CD weeks_NNS even_RB arrests_VBZ the_DT progress_NN of_IN the_DT epidemic_NN in_IN a_DT most_RBS peremptory_JJ manner_NN ._.
This_DT view_NN regarding_VBG the_DT influence_NN of_IN temperature_NN on_IN the_DT spread_NN of_IN small-pox_NN is_VBZ not_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT statistics_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN in_IN many_JJ parts_NNS of_IN Northern_NNP India_NNP ,_, nor_CC does_VBZ it_PRP appear_VB to_TO be_VB borne_VBN out_RP by_IN the_DT returns_NNS for_IN Lower_JJR Bengal_NNP ._.
In_IN the_DT mofussil_NN ,_, the_DT recorded_JJ number_NN of_IN deaths_NNS from_IN small-pox_NN in_IN 1878_CD was_VBD 12,410_CD ,_, against_IN 8,088_CD in_IN 1877_CD and_CC 10,746_CD in_IN 1876_CD ._.
11_CD ._.
The_DT question_NN of_IN introducing_VBG a_DT measure_NN to_TO make_VB vaccination_NN compul-_JJ sory_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC in_IN municipalities_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN separately_RB submitted_VBN to_TO Govern-_NNP ment_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN connection_NN with_IN that_DT subject_VBP the_DT proposal_NN for_IN legislation_NN in_IN order_NN to_TO compel_VB notice_NN being_VBG given_VBN on_IN the_DT occurrence_NN of_IN a_DT case_NN of_IN small-pox_NN will_MD receive_VB consideration_NN ._.
Orders_NNS have_VBP already_RB been_VBN passed_VBN that_IN all_DT candidates_NNS for_IN admis-_JJ sion_NN to_TO the_DT police_NN force_NN or_CC as_IN jail_NN warders_NNS must_MD be_VB vaccinated_VBN ,_, if_IN they_PRP are_VBP not_RB already_RB protected_VBN against_IN small-pox_NN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP is_VBZ awaiting_VBG a_DT (_( 5_CD )_) report_NN from_IN the_DT Committee_NNP on_IN medical_JJ expenditure_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN of_IN vacci-_JJ nation_NN ._.
From_IN the_DT reports_NNS for_IN the_DT last_JJ few_JJ years_NNS Sir_NNP Ashley_NNP Eden_NNP is_VBZ inclined_VBN to_TO believe_VB that_IN the_DT administration_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN is_VBZ capable_JJ of_IN much_JJ im-_JJ provement_NN without_IN any_DT additional_JJ expenditure_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP is_VBZ unwilling_JJ to_TO introduce_VB any_DT radical_JJ change_NN until_IN he_PRP has_VBZ had_VBD the_DT advantage_NN of_IN learning_VBG the_DT views_NNS of_IN the_DT Committee_NNP ._.
ORDER.REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP FOR_NNP 1879-80_CD ._.
BY_NNP A._NNP J._NNP PAYNE_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Surgeon-General_NNP for_IN Bengal_NNP ._.

1880_CD ._.
REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP THE_NNP PROVINCE_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP FOR_NNP 1879-80_CD ._.
BY_NNP A._NNP J._NNP PAYNE_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Surgeon-General_NNP for_IN Bengal_NNP ._.
Calcutta_NN :_: PRINTED_NN AT_IN THE_NNP BENGAL_NNP SECRETARIAT_NNP PRESS_NNP ._.
1880_CD ._.
No_DT ._.
3301_CD 1/2_CD ._.
FROM_IN THE_NNP SURGEON-GENERAL_NNP FOR_NNP BENGAL_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP ,_, JUDICIAL_NNP ,_, POLITICAL_NNP ,_, AND_NNP APPOINTMENT_NNP DEPARTMENTS_NNP ._.
Dated_VBN Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT 24th_CD September_NNP 1880_CD ._.
SIR_NNP ,_, IN_NNP submitting_VBG the_DT report_NN on_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1879-80_CD ,_, I_PRP beg_VBP to_TO say_VB that_IN the_DT sole_JJ reason_NN of_IN its_PRP$ having_VBG been_VBN delayed_VBN beyond_IN the_DT prescribed_JJ date_NN is_VBZ that_IN orders_NNS were_VBD received_VBN for_IN the_DT preparation_NN of_IN statis-_JJ tical_JJ tables_NNS in_IN new_JJ forms_NNS at_IN a_DT period_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN too_RB late_JJ to_TO admit_VB of_IN the_DT forms_NNS being_VBG sent_VBD to_TO the_DT officers_NNS of_IN the_DT department_NN in_IN time_NN for_IN current_JJ record_NN of_IN the_DT additional_JJ points_NNS of_IN information_NN required_VBN ._.
The_DT forms_NNS were_VBD received_VBN in_IN my_PRP$ office_NN on_IN the_DT 9th_CD February_NNP 1880_CD ,_, when_WRB the_DT working_VBG season_NN was_VBD approach-_JJ ing_VBG its_PRP$ end_NN ,_, and_CC all_DT that_WDT could_MD be_VB done_VBN in_IN conformity_NN with_IN orders_NNS was_VBD to_TO direct_JJ Superintendents_NNS of_IN circles_NNS to_TO give_VB the_DT new_JJ information_NN that_WDT was_VBD required_VBN as_RB completely_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.
2_CD ._.
When_WRB the_DT comparative_JJ decennial_JJ statements_NNS were_VBD obtained_VBN ,_, the_DT figures_NNS returned_VBN were_VBD found_VBN to_TO differ_VB materially_RB from_IN those_DT given_VBN in_IN former_JJ reports_NNS ,_, and_CC corrections_NNS and_CC explanations_NNS occupied_VBD much_JJ time_NN ._.
Even_RB now_RB the_DT figures_NNS of_IN the_DT decennial_JJ statement_NN do_VBP not_RB correspond_VB with_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT former_JJ reports_NNS of_IN this_DT office_NN ._.
Some_DT officers_NNS acknowledge_VBP omissions_NNS ,_, and_CC others_NNS excessive_JJ entries_NNS ,_, in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ;_: in_IN some_DT ,_, re-vaccinations_NNS have_VBP been_VBN included_VBN in_IN the_DT figures_NNS of_IN primary_JJ vaccinations_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN some_DT the_DT work_NN of_IN ex-inoculators_NNS was_VBD shown_VBN both_DT by_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP and_CC Superintendents_NNP of_IN circles_NNS ,_, resulting_VBG in_IN double_JJ entry_NN ._.
The_DT past_JJ records_NNS of_IN Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP do_VBP not_RB seem_VB to_TO be_VB trustworthy_JJ ._.
Dr._NNP Jackson_NNP reports_NNS that_IN his_PRP$ returns_NNS for_IN certain_JJ dispensaries_NNS show_VBP more_RBR successful_JJ cases_NNS than_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS ._.
The_DT manuscript_NN returns_NNS exist_VBP in_IN my_PRP$ office_NN only_RB from_IN the_DT year_NN 1877-78_JJ ,_, all_DT earlier_JJR manuscripts_NNS having_VBG been_VBN destroyed_VBN ,_, as_IN I_PRP am_VBP told_RB ,_, in_IN the_DT office_NN of_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ._.
The_DT printed_JJ annual_JJ reports_NNS of_IN the_DT early_JJ years_NNS have_VBP therefore_RB been_VBN used_VBN for_IN comparison_NN ,_, but_CC these_DT ,_, where_WRB they_PRP differ_VBP from_IN the_DT figures_NNS now_RB returned_VBN ,_, do_VBP not_RB enable_VB me_PRP to_TO say_VB which_WDT is_VBZ correct_JJ ._.
I_PRP have_VBP endeavoured_VBN to_TO adjust_VB discrepancies_NNS as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ by_IN calling_VBG for_IN explanations_NNS and_CC otherwise_RB ,_, and_CC it_PRP was_VBD not_RB until_IN the_DT 23rd_CD August_NNP that_IN the_DT last_JJ corrected_JJ return_NN reached_VBD me_PRP ._.
3_CD ._.
During_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN Surgeon-Major_NNP T._NNP E._NNP Charles_NNP was_VBD Superintendent-General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP in_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC its_PRP$ suburbs_NN ._.
This_DT office_NN has_VBZ been_VBN abolished_VBN under_IN the_DT new_JJ arrangements_NNS for_IN compulsory_JJ vaccin-_JJ ation_NN ,_, which_WDT provide_VBP that_IN vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN shall_MD be_VB controlled_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, while_IN the_DT suburbs_NNS will_MD become_VB a_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP circle_NN ._.
Surgeon-Major_JJ R._NNP Lidderdale_NNP continued_VBD to_TO superintend_VB the_DT Darjeeling_NNP circle_NN in_IN 1879-80_JJ ,_, and_CC Surgeon_NNP K._NNP P._NNP Gupta_NNP held_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP circle_NN ._.
Surgeon_NNP D._NNP Basu_NNP controlled_VBD the_DT Ranchi_NNP circle_NN till_NN 8th_CD October_NNP 1879_CD ,_, when_WRB he_PRP was_VBD relieved_VBN by_IN the_DT return_NN of_IN Surgeon-Major_JJ Wood_NNP ._.
Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Kali_NNP Doss_NNP Bose_NNP officiated_VBD for_IN Dr._NNP Wood_NNP towards_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN ._.
The_DT Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP circle_NN was_VBD Superintended_VBN by_IN Apothecary_NNP A._NN Lyons_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Mathoranath_NNP Sen_NNP took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT Behar_NNP circle_NN on_IN 19th_CD August_NNP 1879_CD ,_, and_CC from_IN 15th_CD idem_NN Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP P._NNP C._NNP Bose_NNP superintended_VBD the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP ._.
The_DT Orissa_NNP circle_NN was_VBD under_IN Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Prisitosh_NNP Haldar_NNP ._.
2_CD REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP 4_CD ._.
The_DT subjoined_JJ statement_NN shows_VBZ the_DT agency_NN employed_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN :_: FOR_IN THE_DT YEAR_NNP 1879-80_CD ._.
3_CD children_NNS ._.
I_PRP would_MD refer_VB to_TO the_DT remarks_NNS of_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Superintendent_NNP and_CC of_IN Mr._NNP Edgar_NNP ,_, the_DT Officiating_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN the_DT Patna_NNP Division_NNP ,_, produced_VBD in_IN the_DT abstract_NN ._.

READ_NNP (_( 2_CD )_) small_JJ results_NNS as_IN are_VBP here_RB shown_VBN ._.
The_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP will_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO proceed_VB without_IN delay_NN to_TO this_DT circle_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO report_VB ,_, in_IN consultation_NN with_IN the_DT local_JJ officers_NNS ,_, whether_IN the_DT failure_NN experienced_VBD has_VBZ been_VBN due_JJ to_TO any_DT want_NN of_IN competence_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT staff_NN ,_, and_CC whether_IN he_PRP would_MD recommend_VB that_IN the_DT circle_NN be_VB maintained_VBN ,_, or_CC that_IN the_DT work_NN be_VB postponed_VBN until_IN a_DT larger_JJR staff_NN can_MD be_VB transferred_VBN from_IN the_DT districts_NNS in_IN which_WDT they_PRP are_VBP now_RB engaged_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB observed_VBN that_IN in_IN the_DT report_NN for_IN 1878-79_JJ one_CD cause_NN of_IN the_DT want_NN of_IN success_NN was_VBD stated_VBN to_TO be_VB a_DT want_NN of_IN co-operation_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT police_NN ._.
This_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ a_DT difficulty_NN which_WDT the_DT local_JJ officers_NNS should_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO remove_VB at_IN once_RB if_IN they_PRP interest_NN themselves_PRP properly_RB in_IN the_DT matter_NN ._.
The_DT other_JJ circles_NNS all_DT show_VBP an_DT increase_NN ._.
The_DT figures_NNS for_IN two_CD years_NNS stand_VBP thus_RB (_( 3_CD )_) 8_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ cost_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP during_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN amounted_VBD to_TO Rs_NNP ._.
1,20,017-10-3_JJ ,_, and_CC was_VBD adjusted_VBN as_IN follows_VBZ :_: (_( 4_CD )_) It_PRP is_VBZ explained_VBN that_IN in_IN Behar_NNP and_CC Orissa_NNP the_DT Superintendents_NNP personally_RB inspected_VBD the_DT cases_NNS ._.
This_DT ,_, however_RB ,_, is_VBZ not_RB a_DT sufficient_JJ excuse_NN ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS recorded_VBN in_IN the_DT Behar_NNP Circle_NNP was_VBD only_RB 11,061_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT Superin-_JJ tendent_NN should_MD be_VB called_VBN upon_IN to_TO explain_VB why_WRB he_PRP only_RB inspected_VBD 6,235_CD of_IN these_DT ._.
It_PRP can_MD hardly_RB be_VB expected_VBN that_DT vaccination_NN will_MD make_VB progress_NN among_IN a_DT people_NNS who_WP regard_VBP it_PRP with_IN suspicion_NN and_CC aversion_NN ,_, if_IN the_DT superior_JJ staff_NN do_VBP not_RB exhibit_VB more_JJR interest_NN in_IN their_PRP$ work_NN than_IN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT case_NN in_IN this_DT circle_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Ranchi_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, too_RB ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS inspected_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP was_VBD quite_RB insufficient_JJ ,_, and_CC an_DT explanation_NN should_MD be_VB required_VBN ._.
In_IN explanation_NN of_IN the_DT small_JJ outturn_NN of_IN inspection_NN work_NN performed_VBN in_IN the_DT Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN that_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Superintendent_NNP was_VBD ineffective_JJ from_IN illness_NN during_IN half_PDT the_DT season_NN ;_: if_IN this_DT was_VBD the_DT case_NN ,_, he_PRP should_MD have_VB applied_VBN to_TO be_VB relieved_VBN ._.
Of_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP Circle_NNP no_DT details_NNS are_VBP given_VBN ._.
Of_IN vaccinations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN licensed_JJ agency_NN ,_, 69.1_CD per_IN cent_NN were_VBD inspected_VBN ._.

FROM_IN SURGEON-MAJOR_NNP R._NNP LIDDERDALE_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP BENGAL_NNP ,_, MEDICAL_NNP AND_NNP MUNICIPAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP (_( MEDICAL_NNP )_) ._.

SIR_NNP ,_, I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO submit_VB my_PRP$ report_NN on_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Bengal_NNP for_IN the_DT year_NN 1880-81_RB ._.
It_PRP consists_VBZ of_IN a_DT general_JJ summary_NN of_IN the_DT transactions_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN very_RB full_JJ abstracts_NNS of_IN the_DT circle_NN vaccination_NN reports_NNS furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT eight_CD Superintendents_NNS of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT dispensary_JJ and_CC municipal_JJ vaccination_NN reports_NNS submitted_VBN by_IN the_DT District_NNP Medical_NNP Officers_NNP ;_: the_DT whole_NN supplemented_VBN by_IN facts_NNS gathered_VBN from_IN the_DT sanitary_JJ reports_NNS of_IN the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP for_IN 1880_CD and_CC my_PRP$ own_JJ remarks_NNS on_IN points_NNS of_IN interest_NN deserving_VBG the_DT attention_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.
Dispensary_JJ vaccinations_NNS to_TO be_VB desig-_JJ nated_JJ municipal_JJ vaccinations_NNS ._.
2_CD ._.
I_PRP should_MD note_VB that_IN the_DT vaccinations_NNS that_WDT hitherto_VBP went_VBD by_IN thename_NN of_IN dispensary_JJ vaccinations_NNS should_MD now_RB be_VB denominated_VBN municipal_JJ vaccinations_NNS ,_, as_IN the_DT great_JJ majority_NN of_IN the_DT results_NNS refer_VBP to_TO the_DT municipalities_NNS ,_, 91_CD in_IN number_NN ,_, the_DT small_JJ remainder_NN being_VBG represented_VBN by_IN only_RB 24_CD dispensaries_NNS ._.
The_DT Government_NNP is_VBZ aware_JJ of_IN the_DT cause_NN of_IN this_DT change_NN ,_, viz_NN ._.
the_DT abolition_NN of_IN paid_VBN vaccinators_NNS from_IN 1878-79_JJ and_CC the_DT transfer_NN of_IN the_DT sudder_NN dispensaries_NNS to_TO municipalities_NNS ._.
Some_DT operations_NNS coming_VBG under_IN this_DT head_NN were_VBD also_RB performed_VBN in_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT thanas_NN in_IN the_DT districts_NNS of_IN Chittagong_NNP and_CC Noakholli_NNP ,_, where_WRB the_DT Government_NNP circle_NN system_NN of_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ not_RB in_IN operation_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT few_JJ in_IN the_DT Nuddea_NNP Rajah_NNP 's_POS and_CC Angool_NNP Government_NNP Estates_NNP ._.
Change_NN of_IN population_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
In_IN making_VBG the_DT calculations_NNS the_DT revised_JJ populations_NNS used_VBN in_IN the_DT sanitarybranch_NN of_IN this_DT office_NN have_VBP been_VBN adopted_VBN ,_, instead_RB of_IN ,_, as_IN hitherto_NN ,_, the_DT census_NN populations_NNS of_IN 1872_CD ,_, as_IN the_DT latter_NN are_VBP at_IN present_JJ incorrect_JJ owing_VBG to_TO many_JJ changes_NNS in_IN revision_NN of_IN areas_NNS by_IN the_DT alteration_NN of_IN thana_NN and_CC village_NN boundaries_NNS and_CC re-estimates_NNS of_IN population_NN having_VBG taken_VBN place_NN since_IN 1872_CD ._.
With_IN these_DT prefatory_NN remarks_NNS ,_, I_PRP proceed_VBP to_TO record_VB the_DT transactions_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
Control_NN of_IN Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP transferred_VBD to_TO Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
4_CD ._.
In_IN the_DT orders_NNS No_NNP ._.
150_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 15th_CD March_NNP 1880_CD ,_, referring_VBG tothe_JJ reorganization_NN of_IN the_DT Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Service_NNP carried_VBD out_RP by_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP with_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Her_NNP Majesty_NNP 's_POS Secretary_NNP of_IN State_NNP for_IN India_NNP ,_, it_PRP was_VBD directed_VBN that_IN the_DT supervision_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP should_MD form_VB an_DT impor-_JJ tant_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT duties_NNS of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ;_: that_IN the_DT separate_JJ appointment_NN of_IN the_DT duties_NNS of_IN the_DT Superintendent-General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP should_MD be_VB abolished_VBN ;_: and_CC that_IN the_DT Superintendents_NNS of_IN Vaccination_NNP should_MD become_VB Deputy_NNP Sanitary_JJ Commissioners_NNS under_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ,_, who_WP is_VBZ to_TO utilize_VB not_RB only_RB them_PRP ,_, but_CC the_DT whole_JJ vaccination_NN staff_NN and_CC the_DT Civil_NNP Surgeons_NNP ,_, as_RB far_RB as_IN possible_JJ ,_, in_IN sanitary_JJ work_NN ._.

3_CD Scheme_NNP of_IN Revision_NNP of_IN the_DT Vaccina-_NNP tion_NN Department_NNP ._.
9_CD ._.
I_PRP have_VBP submitted_VBN for_IN orders_NNS ,_, in_IN accordance_NN with_IN the_DT wishes_NNS of_IN Govern-_NNP ment_NN and_CC in_IN consonance_NN with_IN the_DT spirit_NN of_IN the_DT orders_NNS of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP reorganizing_VBG the_DT Medi-_NNP cal_JJ Administrative_JJ Staff_NNP for_IN India_NNP ,_, a_DT scheme_NN revising_VBG the_DT organization_NN of_IN the_DT working_NN and_CC establishment_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP at_IN a_DT considerably-_NN increased_JJ expenditure_NN ._.
The_DT principal_JJ features_NNS of_IN this_DT scheme_NN are:4_VBZ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP Dewangunge_NNP and_CC Jamalpore_NNP in_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Mymensing_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP Circle_NNP ;_: and_CC into_IN thanas_JJ Barh_NNP ,_, Futwa_NNP and_CC Mussoorie_NNP in_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Patna_NNP ,_, under_IN the_DT Behar_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
These_DT areas_NNS cover_VBP 5,260_CD square_JJ miles_NNS and_CC contain_NN 2,354,615_CD inhabitants_NNS ._.
Thus_RB on_IN the_DT whole_JJ protection_NN was_VBD offered_VBN to_TO a_DT new_JJ tract_NN of_IN country-_JJ extending_NN over_IN 10,144_CD square_JJ miles_NNS ,_, and_CC containing_VBG a_DT population_NN of_IN 3,984,874_CD ._.
Operations_NNS with_IN the_DT lancet_NN superseded_VBD that_IN by_IN the_DT needle_NN in_IN the_DT Ranchi_NNP Circle_NNP this_DT year_NN to_TO a_DT large_JJ extent_NN ._.
The_DT division_NN of_IN work_NN among_IN the_DT Deputy_NNP Superintendents_NNPS in_IN the_DT Metro-_NNP politan_NN Circles_NNP was_VBD not_RB well_RB arranged_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT plan_NN of_IN operations_NNS pursued_VBN in_IN the_DT Ranchi_NNP Circle_NNP was_VBD most_RBS unsystematic_JJ and_CC very_RB bad_JJ ._.
My_PRP$ remarks_NNS on_IN these_DT points_NNS will_MD be_VB found_VBN in_IN the_DT abstracts_NNS of_IN the_DT reports_NNS of_IN these_DT circles_NNS ._.
I_PRP might_MD here_RB mention_VB that_IN in_IN July_NNP the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN Chota_NNP Nagpore_NNP and_CC Deputy_NNP Commissioner_NNP of_IN Lohardugga_NNP requested_VBD the_DT services_NNS of_IN the_DT vaccin-_JJ ators_NNS of_IN the_DT Ranchi_NNP Circle_NNP as_IN census_NN enumerators_NNS in_IN February_NNP 1881_CD ._.
As_IN their_PRP$ services_NNS could_MD not_RB possibly_RB be_VB given_VBN for_IN the_DT purpose_NN ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN it_PRP would_MD lead_VB to_TO the_DT loss_NN of_IN all_DT living_VBG stocks_NNS of_IN vaccine_NN lymph_NN ,_, and_CC consequently_RB to_TO the_DT suspension_NN of_IN vaccine_JJ operations_NNS during_IN perhaps_RB two_CD monthsFOR_IN THE_DT YEAR_NN 1880_CD 81_CD ._.
5_CD From_IN the_DT figures_NNS in_IN the_DT above_NN table_NN it_PRP will_MD be_VB seen_VBN that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN in_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Circles_NNP amounted_VBD to_TO 1,339,012_CD ,_, against_IN 1,676,350_CD in_IN the_DT preceding_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Munici-_NNP palities_NNS and_CC Dispensaries_NNS to_TO 55,300_CD ,_, against_IN 66,645_CD ;_: and_CC that_IN the_DT collective_JJ result_NN was_VBD 1,394,312_CD persons_NNS vaccinated_VBN in_IN 1880-81_JJ ,_, against_IN 1,742,995_CD in_IN 1879-80_CD ._.
There_EX was_VBD thus_RB a_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS per-_NNS formed_VBN to_TO the_DT extent_NN of_IN 337,338_CD in_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Circles_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN 11,345_CD in_IN the_DT Municipalities_NNPS and_CC Dispensaries_NNPS ,_, culminating_VBG in_IN a_DT total_JJ falling_VBG off_IN of_IN 348,683_CD operations_NNS ._.
This_DT decrease_NN was_VBD shared_VBN by_IN all_PDT the_DT circles_NNS except_IN Orissa_NNP and_CC Behar_NNP ,_, where_WRB increased_VBN activity_NN resulted_VBD in_IN an_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN operations_NNS ,_, the_DT latter_JJ circle_NN thus_RB redeeming_VBG ,_, to_TO a_DT small_JJ extent_NN ,_, its_PRP$ reputation_NN for_IN continued_JJ bad_JJ work_NN ._.
In_IN reduction_NN of_IN work_NN the_DT circles_NNS ranked_VBD as_IN follows:6_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP Primary_NNP and_CC Secondary_NNP operations_NNS performed_VBD ._.
14_CD ._.
The_DT next_JJ table_NN shows_VBZ how_WRB many_JJ out_IN of_IN the_DT total_JJ vaccinations_NNS wereprimary_JJ and_CC secondary_JJ operations_NNS ._.
The_DT former_JJ includes_VBZ 3,176_CD repetition_NN cases_NNS in_IN 1880-81_JJ and_CC 17,768_CD in_IN 1879-80_JJ :_: FOR_IN THE_DT YEAR_NNP 1880-81_CD ._.
7_CD 1879-80_JJ ;_: but_CC the_DT rate_NN of_IN success_NN attained_VBN in_IN primary_JJ operations_NNS compares_VBZ unfavorably_RB with_IN the_DT vaccination_NN circles_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ not_RB what_WP it_PRP should_MD be_VB ._.
Average_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN each_DT vaccinator_NN ._.
16_CD ._.
The_DT information_NN under_IN this_DT head_NN is_VBZ given_VBN below:8_JJ REPORT_NNP ON_NNP VACCINATION_NNP IN_NNP BENGAL_NNP so_RB well_RB ;_: and_CC this_DT fact_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN persons_NNS who_WP obtained_VBD licenses_NNS ,_, furnish_JJ proof_NN that_IN the_DT scheme_NN is_VBZ receiving_VBG public_JJ approval_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT licensees_NNS find_VBP that_IN they_PRP can_MD gain_VB a_DT living_NN ._.

Sex_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinated_VBN ._.
18_CD ._.
The_DT following_VBG table_JJ furnishes_NNS particulars_NNS bearing_VBG reference_NN to_TO the_DT sex_NN ofthe_NN vaccinated_VBN ._.
The_DT figures_NNS do_VBP not_RB include_VB 10,217_CD re-vaccinations_NNS in_IN the_DT circles_NNS and_CC 6,299_CD vaccinations_NNS at_IN the_DT cooly_NN depôts_NN in_IN the_DT suburbs_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
The_DT sex_NN of_IN the_DT re-vaccinated_JJ has_VBZ not_RB been_VBN furnished_VBN ,_, it_PRP not_RB being_VBG usual_JJ to_TO register_VB it_PRP ,_, and_CC that_IN of_IN the_DT coolies_NNS was_VBD omitted_VBN to_TO be_VB recorded_VBN ._.
The_DT latter_NN will_MD be_VB noted_VBN in_IN future_JJ ._.
In_IN dispensary_JJ vaccinations_NNS the_DT results_NNS of_IN the_DT Azimgunge_NNP ,_, Saidpore_NNP ,_, Goalundo_NNP ,_, Lalgola_NNP ,_, and_CC Dehree_NNP dispensaries_NNS are_VBP excluded_VBN owing_VBG to_TO the_DT sexual_JJ populations_NNS in_IN 1880-81_CD of_IN these_DT places_NNS not_RB being_VBG on_IN record_NN :_: FOR_IN THE_DT YEAR_NNP 1880-81_CD ._.
9_CD The_DT collective_JJ figures_NNS show_VBP ,_, for_IN both_DT the_DT Vaccination_NNP ,_, Circles_NNP and_CC the_DT Municipalities_NNPS and_CC Dispensaries_NNP ,_, that_IN the_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN operations_NNS were_VBD performed_VBN on_IN children_NNS of_IN one_CD and_CC under_IN six_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, and_CC next_JJ on_IN the_DT adults_NNS ;_: the_DT infants_NNS exhibiting_VBG ,_, comparatively_RB ,_, a_DT very_RB low_JJ ratio_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD also_RB the_DT case_NN in_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT circles_NNS ,_, except_IN that_DT in_IN Calcutta_NNP infants_NNS were_VBD vaccinated_VBN in_IN larger_JJR numbers_NNS than_IN those_DT of_IN other_JJ ages_NNS ,_, and_CC that_IN in_IN the_DT Suburbs_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT Ranchi_NNP and_CC Behar_NNP Circles_NNP infant_JJ vaccinations_NNS exceeded_VBD adult_NN vaccinations_NNS ._.
The_DT circles_NNS that_WDT afforded_VBD the_DT best_JJS protection_NN to_TO infants_NNS were_VBD Calcutta_NNP ,_, the_DT Suburbs_NNP ,_, and_CC Ranchi_NNP ,_, where_WRB 43.84_CD ,_, 24.20_CD ,_, and_CC 27.39_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT total_JJ vaccinations_NNS were_VBD operated_VBN on_IN ._.
Those_DT that_WDT gave_VBD the_DT least_JJS protection_NN were_VBD the_DT Metropolitan_NNP ,_, Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP ,_, Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP ,_, and_CC Orissa_NNP Circles_NNP ,_, the_DT outcome_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD last-named_JJ circles_NNS (_( 6.12_CD and_CC 2.24_CD per_IN cent_NN ._. )_)
being_VBG very_RB low_JJ ._.
Calcutta_NNP has_VBZ to_TO be_VB congratulated_VBN for_IN the_DT appreciable_JJ proportion_NN of_IN infants_NNS protected_VBN ,_, considering_VBG that_IN it_PRP worked_VBD to_TO some_DT extent_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ,_, under_IN a_DT new_JJ system_NN inagurated_VBN under_IN a_DT new_JJ law_NN (_( the_DT Compulsory_NNP Vaccination_NNP Act_NNP )_) ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ alto-_JJ gether_NN opposed_VBD to_TO the_DT domiciliary_JJ plan_NN of_IN operations_NNS hitherto_VBP pursued_VBN ._.
Religion_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinated_VBN ._.
20_CD ._.

13_CD to_TO the_DT progress_NN of_IN vaccination_NN are_VBP lessening_VBG ._.
Complaints_NNS about_IN the_DT difficulty_NN of_IN realizing_VBG fees_NNS were_VBD ,_, as_IN usual_JJ ,_, felt_VBD ,_, but_CC to_TO a_DT lesser_JJR extent_NN than_IN in_IN former_JJ years_NNS ._.
Not_RB a_DT single_JJ complaint_NN was_VBD made_VBN in_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP Circle_NNP ._.
The_DT following_JJ facts_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT licensed_JJ agency_NN work_NN are_VBP worthy_JJ of_IN reproduction_NN here_RB ._.
(_( a_DT )_) In_IN order_NN to_TO obviate_VB the_DT great_JJ difficulty_NN that_WDT was_VBD experienced_VBN in_IN controlling_VBG the_DT licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS in_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP Circles_NNP ,_, a_DT plan_NN was_VBD adopted_VBN by_IN which_WDT each_DT vaccinator_NN has_VBZ to_TO deposit_VB Rs_NNP ._.
16_CD as_IN security_NN for_IN good_JJ conduct_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO execute_VB a_DT deed_NN of_IN agreement_NN binding_VBG himself_PRP to_TO work_VB accord-_JJ ing_NN to_TO the_DT rules_NNS and_CC regulations_NNS under_IN a_DT penalty_NN ._.
This_DT plan_NN might_MD be_VB bene-_JJ ficially_RB adopted_VBN in_IN other_JJ circles_NNS where_WRB the_DT self-supporting_JJ system_NN is_VBZ in_IN operation_NN ._.
(_( b_NN )_) Owing_VBG to_TO some_DT of_IN the_DT ex-inoculators_NNS having_VBG behaved_VBN badly_RB last_JJ year_NN in_IN Bhagulpore_NNP and_CC Monghyr_NNP ,_, in_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, the_DT Superin-_NNP tendent_NN determined_VBD to_TO subject_VB the_DT candidates_NNS to_TO a_DT course_NN of_IN practical_JJ training_NN before_IN granting_VBG the_DT licenses_NNS ._.
The_DT result_NN was_VBD that_IN not_RB a_DT single_JJ man_NN would_MD consent_VB to_TO be_VB trained_VBN ._.
This_DT shows_VBZ that_IN these_DT men_NNS never_RB practise_VBP vaccination_NN ,_, but_CC simply_RB obtain_VB licenses_NNS to_TO impress_VB the_DT people_NNS with_IN the_DT belief_NN that_IN they_PRP have_VBP authority_NN to_TO practise_VB inoculation_NN ._.
(_( c_NN )_) Thirty-seven_CD out_IN of_IN the_DT 178_CD men_NNS who_WP received_VBD licenses_NNS in_IN the_DT Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP Circle_NNP did_VBD not_RB practise_VB ._.
The_DT cause_NN is_VBZ referred_VBN to_TO a_DT feeling_NN of_IN uncer-_JJ tainty_NN as_IN to_TO whether_IN they_PRP would_MD be_VB able_JJ to_TO get_VB a_DT livelihood_NN being_VBG entertained_VBN by_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT difficulty_NN they_PRP believed_VBD would_MD be_VB met_VBN in_IN realizing_VBG their_PRP$ fees_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN here_RB vaccination_NN is_VBZ not_RB sought_VBN for_IN by_IN the_DT men_NNS so_RB much_RB as_IN a_DT pro-_JJ fession_NN as_IN a_DT supplementary_JJ means_NNS to_TO eke_VB out_RP a_DT precarious_JJ and_CC scanty_JJ living_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP fears_VBZ that_IN unless_IN something_NN is_VBZ done_VBN to_TO improve_VB their_PRP$ position_NN there_RB must_MD sooner_VB or_CC later_RB be_VB a_DT break_JJ down_RP ._.
(_( d_NN )_) In_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP Circles_NNP men_NNS without_IN licenses_NNS yet_RB practise_VBP vaccination_NN and_CC charge_NN fees_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Superintendent_NNP asks_VBZ for_IN the_DT inter-_JJ ference_NN of_IN Government_NNP to_TO put_VB a_DT stop_NN to_TO this_DT ._.
Its_PRP$ evils_NNS will_MD be_VB found_VBN described_VBN in_IN the_DT abstract_NN of_IN the_DT report_NN of_IN these_DT circles_NNS ._.
Although_IN the_DT Government_NNP might_MD not_RB deem_VB it_PRP expedient_JJ to_TO interfere_VB ,_, yet_RB these_DT men_NNS should_MD be_VB discouraged_VBN in_IN every_DT way_NN ._.
The_DT effect_NN of_IN such_JJ work_NN is_VBZ well_RB shown_VBN ,_, in_IN the_DT frequent_JJ outbreaks_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN Dinagepore_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD overrun_VBN by_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN operators_NNS ._.

150_CD ._.
In_IN this_DT circle_NN also_RB the_DT zemindars_NNS of_IN Seraikela_NNP and_CC Doogni_NNP compelled_VBD the_DT vaccinators_NNS to_TO levy_VB a_DT fee_NN of_IN four_CD annas_NNS for_IN each_DT male_NN and_CC two_CD annas_NNS for_IN each_DT female_JJ whom_WP they_PRP vaccinated_VBD ,_, and_CC appro-_RB priated_VBN to_TO themselves_PRP one-fourth_JJ of_IN the_DT proceeds_NNS realized_VBN ._.

(_( f_NN )_) The_DT Superintendent_NN of_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP Circle_NNP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT time_NN has_VBZ arrived_VBN for_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP district_NN being_VBG left_VBN in_IN the_DT hands_NNS of_IN the_DT local_JJ licensed_VBD vaccinators_NNS under_IN a_DT properly-organized_JJ plan_NN with_IN four_CD or_CC five_CD vaccinators_NNS to_TO supervise_VB their_PRP$ work_NN ._.

Attitude_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS towards_IN vaccination_NN ._.
25_CD ._.
