CALCUTTA_NNP ._.
Transfer_NN of_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP to_TO Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN Corporation_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT Suburbs_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP to_TO Super-_NNP intendent_NN of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, Metropolitan_NNP Circles_NNP ._.
IN_NNP pursuance_NN of_IN the_DT ruling_NN of_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN India_NNP transferring_VBG the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP to_TO the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP for_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, orders_NNS (_( Bengal_JJ Government_NNP No_NNP ._.
254T_CD ,_, dated_VBD the_DT 25th_CD May_NNP 1880_CD )_) were_VBD also_RB passed_VBN removing_VBG the_DT vaccination_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Calcutta_NNP from_IN the_DT control_NN and_CC superintendence_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent-General_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, and_CC vesting_VBG it_PRP in_IN those_DT of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Corporation_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
In_IN consequence_NN ,_, the_DT latter_JJ officer_NN ,_, as_IN Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, took_VBD over_RP charge_NN of_IN the_DT duties_NNS from_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN June_NNP 1880_CD ._.
Under_IN the_DT same_JJ orders_NNS the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN the_DT Suburbs_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP was_VBD made_VBN over_IN to_TO the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP ,_, Metropolitan_NNP Circles_NNP ._.
The_DT details_NNS of_IN the_DT work_NN performed_VBN in_IN this_DT area_NN ,_, which_WDT used_VBD hitherto_NN to_TO be_VB included_VBN with_IN those_DT of_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, have_VBP there-_JJ fore_NN been_VBN shown_VBN separately_RB in_IN the_DT statements_NNS appended_VBD to_TO this_DT report_NN ,_, as_IN work_NN performed_VBN by_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT particulars_NNS relating_VBG to_TO the_DT transactions_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN have_VBP also_RB been_VBN separately_RB abstracted_VBN ._.
The_DT arrangements_NNS above_IN alluded_VBN to_TO with_IN regard_NN to_TO Calcutta_NNP were_VBD ordered_VBN and_CC carried_VBN out_RP in_IN anticipation_NN of_IN the_DT passing_NN of_IN a_DT law_NN ,_, which_WDT will_MD be_VB presently_RB referred_VBN to_TO ,_, under_IN the_DT provisions_NNS of_IN which_WDT the_DT vaccination_NN arrangements_NNS in_IN Calcutta_NNP ,_, admi-_JJ nistrative_JJ ,_, penal_JJ ,_, financial_JJ ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, are_VBP placed_VBN under_IN its_PRP$ Municipal_NNP Corporation_NNP to_TO be_VB conducted_VBN on_IN a_DT new_JJ and_CC different_JJ principle_NN and_CC plan_NN ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT following_NN is_VBZ the_DT abstract_NN of_IN the_DT Report_NNP on_IN vaccination_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP for_IN 1880-81_JJ furnished_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP K._NNP McLeod_NNP ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN Vaccination_NNP :_: ABSTRACTS_NNP OF_NNP REPORTS_NNP BY_NNP SUPERINTENDENTS_NNP ._.
17_CD This_DT was_VBD perhaps_RB due_JJ to_TO the_DT active_JJ steps_NNS which_WDT were_VBD taken_VBN to_TO suppress_VB the_DT disease_NN as_IN detailed_VBN in_IN Dr._NNP Charles_NNP '_POS report_NN for_IN the_DT two_CD years_NNS 1878-79_JJ and_CC 1879-80_JJ ._.
This_DT last_JJ outbreak_NN aroused_VBD renewed_VBN enquiry_NN ,_, the_DT result_NN of_IN which_WDT went_VBD to_TO show_VB that_DT vaccination_NN was_VBD still_RB backward_VBN in_IN Calcutta_NNP ;_: that_IN a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN the_DT children_NNS born_VBN in_IN and_CC brought_VBD into_IN the_DT town_NN was_VBD not_RB vaccinated_VBN ;_: and_CC that_IN about_RB 10_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT adult_NN population_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN were_VBD unprotected_VBN ._.
Inoculation_NN appears_VBZ now_RB to_TO be_VB very_RB rarely_RB if_IN ever_RB practised_VBN within_IN the_DT area_NN of_IN the_DT town_NN ._.
The_DT voluntary_JJ and_CC domiciliary_JJ system_NN having_VBG been_VBN found_VBN insufficient_JJ adequately_RB to_TO protect_VB the_DT town_NN ,_, it_PRP was_VBD considered_VBN advisable_JJ to_TO invoke_VB the_DT aid_NN of_IN law_NN and_CC render_VB vaccin-_JJ ation_NN compulsory_NN and_CC its_PRP$ neglect_JJ penal_NN ._.
Compulsory_NNP vaccination_NN has_VBZ long_RB been_VBN adopted_VBN by_IN civilized_JJ nations_NNS and_CC communities_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN 1877_CD an_DT Act_NNP ,_, modelled_VBD upon_IN the_DT English_NNP Act_NNP ,_, was_VBD passed_VBN by_IN the_DT Bombay_NNP Legislature_NNP ,_, rendering_VBG vaccination_NN compulsory_NN within_IN the_DT town_NN of_IN Bombay_NNP ._.
It_PRP was_VBD ascertained_VBN that_IN this_DT Act_NNP had_VBD worked_VBN smoothly_RB and_CC efficiently_RB ._.
After_IN careful_JJ deliberation_NN ,_, Act_NNP V_NNP of_IN 1880_CD was_VBD passed_VBN by_IN the_DT Bengal_NNP Legislative_NNP Council_NNP ._.
It_PRP received_VBD the_DT assent_NN of_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP on_IN the_DT 12th_CD of_IN April_NNP and_CC of_IN the_DT Governor-_NNP General_NNP on_IN the_DT 17th_CD of_IN May_NNP ,_, and_CC having_VBG been_VBN published_VBN in_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP Gazette_NNP of_IN the_DT 9th_CD June_NNP ,_, became_VBD thenceforward_RB ,_, and_CC by_IN virtue_NN of_IN that_DT publication_NN ,_, law_NN ._.
&_CC quot_NN ;_: The_DT new_JJ Act_NNP throws_VBZ upon_IN parents_NNS and_CC guardians_VBZ the_DT legal_JJ responsibility_NN of_IN having_VBG their_PRP$ children_NNS vaccinated_VBN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ no_RB longer_RB the_DT duty_NN of_IN vaccinators_NNS to_TO search_VB for_IN unprotected_JJ children_NNS in_IN their_PRP$ villages_NNS and_CC houses_NNS and_CC prevail_VB upon_IN them_PRP to_TO accept_VB protection_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ incumbent_JJ upon_IN all_DT parents_NNS and_CC guardians_NNS of_IN children_NNS to_TO take_VB measures_NNS to_TO procure_VB vaccin-_JJ ation_NN for_IN them_PRP ._.
The_DT Act_NNP provides_VBZ that_IN every_DT facility_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB afforded_VBN them_PRP to_TO that_DT end_NN ._.
The_DT Corporation_NNP is_VBZ enjoined_VBN to_TO select_VB public_JJ vaccine_NN stations_NNS and_CC make_VB known_VBN their_PRP$ position_NN ,_, working_VBG hours_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN ;_: to_TO entertain_VB a_DT sufficient_JJ establishment_NN of_IN public_JJ vaccinators_NNS ;_: and_CC to_TO make_VB arrangements_NNS for_IN the_DT supply_NN of_IN lymph_NN ,_, inspection_NN of_IN results_NNS ,_, and_CC general_JJ supervision_NN ._.
Persons_NNS preferring_VBG to_TO obtain_VB vaccination_NN at_IN their_PRP$ houses_NNS are_VBP permitted_VBN ,_, on_IN payment_NN of_IN a_DT very_RB moderate_JJ fee_NN (_( four_CD annas_NN )_) ,_, to_TO claim_VB the_DT services_NNS of_IN public_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, or_CC get_VB the_DT operation_NN done_VBN by_IN medical_JJ practitioners_NNS ._.
A_DT system_NN of_IN notices_NNS has_VBZ been_VBN devised_VBN ,_, by_IN which_WDT every_DT parent_NN and_CC guardian_JJ registering_VBG the_DT birth_NN of_IN his_PRP$ child_NN is_VBZ reminded_VBN of_IN his_PRP$ duty_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT system_NN of_IN certificates_NNS and_CC returns_NNS laid_VBD down_RP by_IN which_WDT default_NN may_MD be_VB detected_VBN ._.
Facilities_NNS are_VBP also_RB offered_VBN for_IN compassing_VBG the_DT vaccination_NN of_IN unprotected_JJ adults_NNS and_CC children_NNS without_IN guardians_NNS ,_, and_CC a_DT procedure_NN prescribed_VBN by_IN which_WDT legal_JJ compulsion_NN may_MD be_VB brought_VBN to_TO bear_VB on_IN the_DT negligent_NN or_CC recusant._NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Steps_NNP taken_VBN to_TO bring_VB Act_NNP V_NNP (_( B._NNP C._NNP )_) of_IN 1880_CD into_IN operation_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
Immediately_RB after_IN the_DT promulgation_NN of_IN the_DT Act_NNP V_NNP (_( B.C_NNP ._. )_)
of_IN 1880_CD ,_, rendering_VBG vaccin-_JJ ation_NN compulsory_NN in_IN the_DT town_NN ,_, public_JJ vaccine_NN stations_NNS ,_, mostly_RB in_IN hospitals_NNS ,_, were_VBD selected_VBN so_RB as_IN to_TO correspond_VB to_TO certain_JJ police_JJ sections_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN and_CC be_VB situated_VBN in_IN their_PRP$ centres_NNS ._.
The_DT establishment_NN was_VBD distributed_VBN to_TO these_DT stations_NNS ;_: the_DT rules_NNS required_VBN by_IN the_DT Act_NNP to_TO be_VB framed_VBN were_VBD drawn_VBN up_RP ;_: instructions_NNS were_VBD pre-_JJ pared_JJ and_CC given_VBN to_TO the_DT vaccination_NN staff_NN ;_: forms_NNS ,_, registers_NNS ,_, and_CC returns_NNS were_VBD printed_VBN and_CC distributed_VBN ;_: the_DT new_JJ arrangements_NNS were_VBD proclaimed_VBN to_TO the_DT people_NNS by_IN means_NNS of_IN advertisements_NNS and_CC hand-bills_NNS ,_, &_CC c._VB All_PDT this_DT took_VBD time_NN ,_, but_CC by_IN the_DT 1st_CD of_IN October_NNP all_PDT the_DT arrangements_NNS were_VBD completed_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT stations_NNS were_VBD in_IN full_JJ working_VBG order_NN ._.
As_IN under_IN section_NN 13_CD of_IN the_DT Act_NNP the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP of_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP is_VBZ required_VBN to_TO serve_VB a_DT notice_NN in_IN the_DT prescribed_JJ form_NN (_( Schedule_NNP D_NNP )_) on_IN all_DT unprotected_JJ persons_NNS arriving_VBG in_IN the_DT said_VBD Port_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO prosecute_VB before_IN a_DT Magistrate_NNP all_DT persons_NNS committing_VBG offences_NNS under_IN the_DT Act_NNP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD supplied_VBN with_IN forms_NNS of_IN Schedule_NNP D._NNP A_NNP public_JJ vaccine_NN station_NN was_VBD selected_VBN at_IN Koila_NNP Ghât_NNP police-station_NN ,_, and_CC subse-_JJ quently_RB at_IN the_DT Sailors_NNP '_POS Home_NNP for_IN seamen_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT time_NN for_IN the_DT attendance_NN of_IN two_CD vaccinators_NNS at_IN the_DT station_NN was_VBD fixed_VBN for_IN Wednesday_NNP between_IN the_DT hours_NNS of_IN 9_CD and_CC 11_CD A.M._NNP to_TO suit_VB the_DT convenience_NN of_IN the_DT seamen_NNS ._.

In_IN reply_NN to_TO an_DT enquiry_NN on_IN the_DT subject_NN made_VBN by_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP ,_, he_PRP was_VBD informed_VBN that_IN the_DT Act_NNP applies_NNS also_RB to_TO persons_NNS on_IN board_NN of_IN foreign_JJ vessels_NNS arriving_VBG in_IN the_DT Port_NNP ,_, inasmuch_JJ as_IN foreigners_NNS are_VBP subject_JJ to_TO the_DT laws_NNS of_IN the_DT country_NN ._.
Gradual_JJ introduction_NN of_IN the_DT new_JJ sys-_JJ tem_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT new_JJ system_NN under_IN the_DT Act_NNP being_VBG diametrically_RB opposed_VBN to_TO the_DT old_JJ ,_, as_IN has_VBZ been_VBN already_RB shown_VBN ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, knowing_VBG the_DT frail_NN hold_NN which_WDT vaccination_NN had_VBD yet_RB taken_VBN upon_IN the_DT people_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT influence_NN which_WDT custom_NN has_VBZ on_IN them_PRP ,_, and_CC being_VBG desirous_JJ of_IN not_RB even_RB losing_VBG that_IN hold_NN ,_, resolved_VBN to_TO effect_NN the_DT change_NN from_IN one_CD system_NN to_TO the_DT other_JJ gradually_RB ,_, and_CC with_IN this_DT view_NN directed_VBD the_DT establishment_NN under_IN him_PRP ,_, while_IN attending_VBG regularly_RB at_IN the_DT vaccine_NN stations_NNS and_CC inducing_VBG as_RB many_JJ as_IN possible_JJ to_TO resort_VB to_TO them_PRP ,_, not_RB to_TO discontinue_VB vaccinating_VBG in_IN the_DT bustees_NNS ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ hoped_VBN that_IN eventually_RB ,_, when_WRB the_DT people_NNS shall_MD have_VB been_VBN taught_VBN to_TO know_VB and_CC follow_VB the_DT new_JJ system_NN ,_, bustee_NN vaccination_NN will_MD be_VB discontinued_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT time_NN and_CC labour_NN of_IN the_DT establishment_NN thus_RB employed_VBN economised_VBN ._.

Prevalence_NN of_IN small-pox_NN ._.
17_CD ._.
Small-pox_NNP prevailed_VBD throughout_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, but_CC not_RB in_IN epidemic_JJ form_NN ._.
Altogether_RB 110_CD deaths_NNS were_VBD reported_VBN ,_, which_WDT gives_VBZ a_DT death-rate_NN of_IN .25_NNP per_IN 1,000_CD of_IN the_DT population_NN ._.
The_DT most_RBS fatal_JJ months_NNS were_VBD April_NNP 1880_CD and_CC February_NNP and_CC March_NNP 1881_CD ,_, during_IN which_WDT 81_CD casualties_NNS occurred_VBD ._.
The_DT sections_NNS of_IN the_DT town_NN that_WDT suffered_VBD most_RBS were_VBD Colootolla_NNP ,_, Fenwick_NNP Bazar_NNP ,_, Moocheeparah_NNP ,_, and_CC Taltolla_NNP ._.
The_DT classes_NNS among_IN whom_WP the_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN the_DT cases_NNS occurred_VBD were_VBD up-country_JJ Mahomedans_NNPS ,_, Chamars_NNP ,_, grass-cutters_NNS ,_, and_CC other_JJ low_JJ castes_NNS of_IN up-countrymen_NNS ,_, the_DT prostitutes_NNS ,_, day-labourers_NNS ,_, manjees_NNS of_IN the_DT eastern_JJ districts_NNS of_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, &_CC c._NN In_IN fact_NN ,_, the_DT disease_NN prevailed_VBD most_JJS among_IN the_DT floating_VBG population_NN ._.
There_EX were_VBD several_JJ instances_NNS on_IN record_NN in_IN which_WDT small-_JJ pox_NN was_VBD imported_VBN into_IN the_DT town_NN by_IN pilgrims_NNS ,_, travellers_NNS ,_, &_CC c._VBP The_DT S._NNP S._NNP Rydalhall_NNP ,_, which_WDT came_VBD into_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP in_IN September_NNP ,_, had_VBD a_DT case_NN on_IN board_NN ._.
Vaccination_NN was_VBD offered_VBN ,_, but_CC it_PRP was_VBD refused_VBN ._.
There_EX were_VBD several_JJ cases_NNS of_IN the_DT disease_NN among_IN the_DT pilgrims_NNS on_IN board_NN the_DT S._NNP S._NNP Clangordon_NNP ,_, which_WDT arrived_VBD in_IN Port_NNP in_IN December_NNP ._.
Although_IN some_DT of_IN the_DT men_NNS were_VBD sent_VBN to_TO hospital_NN and_CC others_NNS vaccinated_VBN ,_, several_JJ went_VBD to_TO live_VB with_IN their_PRP$ friends_NNS in_IN the_DT bustees_NNS ,_, and_CC thus_RB disseminated_VBD the_DT disease_NN ._.
In_IN some_DT cases_NNS the_DT railway_NN authorities_NNS detected_VBD cases_NNS of_IN small-pox_JJ and_CC sent_VBD the_DT affected_JJ to_TO hospital_NN ;_: but_CC in_IN the_DT case_NN of_IN travellers_NNS coming_VBG in_IN boats_NNS from_IN the_DT eastern_JJ districts_NNS in_IN Bengal_NNP ,_, the_DT men_NNS got_VBD into_IN the_DT bustees_NNS and_CC communicated_VBD the_DT disease_NN to_TO others_NNS before_IN anything_NN could_MD be_VB known_VBN of_IN the_DT matter_NN ._.

21_CD Dr._NNP Gupta_NNP is_VBZ localizing_VBG his_PRP$ vaccinators_NNS strictly_RB ._.
This_DT will_MD have_VB a_DT good_JJ effect_NN in_IN restricting_VBG the_DT work_NN within_IN defined_JJ areas_NNS ,_, so_IN that_IN the_DT people_NNS will_MD know_VB easily_RB where_WRB to_TO apply_VB for_IN vaccination_NN when_WRB they_PRP desire_VBP it_PRP ._.
In_IN order_NN to_TO obviate_VB the_DT great_JJ difficulty_NN that_WDT was_VBD experienced_VBN in_IN control-_JJ ling_VBG the_DT licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, a_DT plan_NN was_VBD adopted_VBN this_DT year_NN of_IN requiring_VBG each_DT vaccinator_NN to_TO deposit_VB Rs_NNP ._.
16_CD as_IN security_NN for_IN good_JJ conduct_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO execute_VB an_DT ekrarnamah_NN (_( deed_NN of_IN agree-_JJ ment_NN )_) binding_VBG himself_PRP to_TO work_VB according_VBG to_TO the_DT rules_NNS and_CC regulations_NNS of_IN the_DT Department_NNP under_IN a_DT penalty_NN for_IN disobedience_NN and_CC misconduct_NN ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP reports_NNS that_IN men_NNS without_IN licenses_NNS yet_RB practise_VBP vaccination_NN and_CC charge_NN fees_NNS ._.
This_DT was_VBD done_VBN extensively_RB in_IN Burdwan_NNP ,_, Midnapore_NNP ,_, Jessore_NNP ,_, &_CC c._VBP An_DT instance_NN in_IN point_NN is_VBZ given_VBN of_IN some_DT Hindustani_NNP tikaits_NNS coming_VBG from_IN Singbhoom_NNP and_CC Manbhoom_NNP having_VBG nominally_RB vaccinated_VBN people_NNS in_IN many_JJ villages_NNS in_IN thanas_NN Bheempore_NNP ,_, Jhargram_NNP ,_, Salboni_NNP ,_, and_CC Gurbetta_NNP in_IN the_DT summer_NN ,_, whose_WP$ oper-_JJ ations_NNS were_VBD generally_RB failures_NNS ,_, as_IN they_PRP used_VBD only_RB crusts_NNS ._.
The_DT evils_NNS of_IN this_DT practice_NN are_VBP rightly_RB stated_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP to_TO be_VB very_RB great_JJ ._.
The_DT men_NNS might_MD use_VB bad_JJ lymph_NN ,_, or_CC even_RB small-pox_JJ matter_NN ,_, by_IN which_WDT the_DT disease_NN may_MD break_VB out_RP among_IN the_DT badly_RB vaccinated_VBN and_CC thus_RB cause_VB vaccination_NN to_TO be_VB discredited_VBN ;_: and_CC their_PRP$ work_NN ,_, being_VBG under_IN no_DT supervision_NN or_CC check_NN ,_, is_VBZ liable_JJ to_TO be_VB of_IN the_DT worst_JJS quality_NN ._.
Moreover_RB ,_, the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP loses_VBZ the_DT subjects_NNS thus_RB operated_VBN on_IN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ work_NN is_VBZ consequently_RB reduced_VBN to_TO a_DT lower_JJR number_NN of_IN vaccinations_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT licensed_JJ vaccinators_NNS suffer_VBP in_IN their_PRP$ earnings_NNS ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP again_RB calls_VBZ for_IN the_DT interference_NN of_IN Government_NNP to_TO put_VB a_DT stop_NN to_TO this_DT evil_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ an_DT important_JJ point_NN ,_, and_CC although_IN the_DT Government_NNP might_MD not_RB deem_VB it_PRP expedient_JJ to_TO interfere_VB ,_, yet_RB these_DT men_NNS should_MD be_VB discouraged_VBN in_IN every_DT possible_JJ way_NN ._.
The_DT effect_NN of_IN such_JJ work_NN is_VBZ well_RB shown_VBN in_IN the_DT frequent_JJ outbreaks_NNS of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN Dinagepore_NNP ,_, which_WDT was_VBD overrun_VBN by_IN this_DT class_NN of_IN operators_NNS ._.
The_DT people_NNS ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD ,_, entertain_VBP a_DT notion_NN that_IN a_DT child_NN whose_WP$ arms_NNS have_VBP been_VBN once_RB scratched_VBN with_IN a_DT lancet_NN is_VBZ vaccinated_VBN and_CC protected_VBN against_IN small-pox_NN for_IN life_NN ,_, so_IN that_DT proposals_NNS for_IN re-_JJ vaccination_NN are_VBP not_RB listened_VBN to_TO by_IN its_PRP$ parents_NNS ._.
To_TO combat_VB this_DT notion_NN the_DT Superintendent_NNP availed_VBD himself_PRP of_IN every_DT opportunity_NN to_TO tell_VB the_DT people_NNS that_WDT unless_IN a_DT child_NN bears_VBZ good_JJ and_CC typical_JJ vaccine_NN marks_NNS or_CC cicatrices_NNS it_PRP must_MD be_VB revaccinated_VBN ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP has_VBZ submitted_VBN with_IN his_PRP$ report_NN a_DT map_JJ showing_VBG the_DT areas_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ circle_NN that_WDT have_VBP been_VBN efficiently_RB ,_, partially_RB ,_, and_CC less_JJR than_IN half_NN ,_, vaccinated_VBN ._.
I_PRP regret_VBP that_DT want_NN of_IN time_NN has_VBZ prevented_VBN my_PRP$ having_VBG it_PRP lithographed_VBD and_CC appended_VBD to_TO my_PRP$ report_NN ,_, for_IN such_JJ documents_NNS are_VBP very_RB useful_JJ as_IN illustrating_VBG the_DT condition_NN as_IN to_TO protection_NN of_IN the_DT ground_NN gone_VBN over_IN ,_, and_CC the_DT progress_NN of_IN work_NN ,_, and_CC as_RB serving_NN as_IN guides_NNS for_IN future_JJ operations_NNS ._.
From_IN Dr._NNP Gupta_NNP 's_POS map_NN I_PRP gather_VBP that_IN in_IN the_DT Midnapore_NNP ,_, Howrah_NNP ,_, and_CC Bankoora_NNP districts_NNS there_EX are_VBP still_RB large_JJ parts_NNS of_IN thanas_NNS which_WDT were_VBD less_JJR than_IN half_NN vaccinated_VBN in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS and_CC remain_VBP so_RB this_DT year_NN ;_: that_IN in_IN Beerbhoom_NNP there_EX are_VBP five_CD thanas_NNS which_WDT have_VBP only_RB been_VBN partially_RB vaccinated_VBN this_DT year_NN ;_: and_CC that_IN Jessore_NNP ,_, too_RB ,_, shows_VBZ similar_JJ areas_NNS It_PRP must_MD be_VB remem-_JJ bered_VBN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN Midnapore_NNP and_CC Bankoora_NNP were_VBD added_VBN to_TO the_DT Metropolitan_NNP Circles_NNP with-_NN out_IN ever_RB having_VBG been_VBN gone_VBN over_IN by_IN a_DT paid_JJ Government_NNP establishment_NN ;_: but_CC I_PRP did_VBD not_RB expect_VB to_TO find_VB such_JJ areas_NNS in_IN Burdwan_NNP ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ so_RB long_RB been_VBN included_VBN in_IN this_DT sphere_NN of_IN work_NN ._.

The_DT information_NN is_VBZ tabulated_VBN below:22_JJ ABSTRACTS_NNP OF_NNP REPORTS_NNP BY_NNP SUPERINTENDENTS_NNP ._.

23_CD (_( 4_CD )_) that_WDT coincident_NN with_IN the_DT above_JJ reduction_NN ,_, the_DT average_JJ work_NN of_IN each_DT vaccinator_NN had_VBD also_RB fallen_VBN off_RP ;_: (_( 5_CD )_) that_IN the_DT value_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN as_IN represented_VBN by_IN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN primary_JJ success-_JJ ful_JJ operations_NNS ,_, is_VBZ very_RB satisfactory_JJ throughout_IN ._.
The_DT causes_NNS of_IN the_DT falling_VBG off_RP will_MD be_VB gathered_VBN from_IN the_DT following_JJ brief_JJ history_NN of_IN the_DT operations_NNS performed_VBD during_IN the_DT season_NN ,_, taken_VBN from_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP 's_POS report_NN ._.
Virus_NN was_VBD established_VBN in_IN all_PDT the_DT four_CD circles_NNS either_CC at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN September_NNP or_CC beginning_NN of_IN October_NNP ,_, but_CC very_RB little_JJ work_NN could_MD be_VB done_VBN in_IN the_DT early_JJ part_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN in_IN the_DT 24_CD Pergunnahs_NNP ,_, Jessore_NNP ,_, Nuddea_NNP ,_, Beerbhoom_NNP ,_, Burdwan_NNP ,_, Midnapore_NNP ,_, Hooghly_NNP ,_, and_CC Serampore_NNP ,_, owing_VBG to_TO the_DT severity_NN ,_, to_TO a_DT more_RBR or_CC less_RBR extent_JJ ,_, with_IN which_WDT fever_NN prevailed_VBD in_IN these_DT districts_NNS during_IN the_DT months_NNS of_IN October_NNP ,_, November_NNP ,_, and_CC December_NNP of_IN this_DT conspicuously_RB bad_JJ fever_NN year_NN ._.
In_IN Nuddea_NNP ,_, Jessore_NNP ,_, Hooghly_NNP ,_, and_CC Serampore_NNP several_JJ inspectors_NNS and_CC a_DT good_JJ number_NN of_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS were_VBD laid_VBN up_RP with_IN the_DT disease_NN ._.
This_DT fever_NN also_RB precluded_VBD the_DT unprotected_JJ children_NNS at_IN Beerbhoom_NNP ,_, of_IN whom_WP there_EX is_VBZ a_DT large_JJ number_NN ,_, from_IN being_VBG vaccinated_VBN ._.

118_CD ._.
The_DT Mahomedans_NNPS generally_RB are_VBP much_RB opposed_VBN to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC of_IN them_PRP the_DT Ferazee_NNP sect_NN are_VBP particularly_RB hostile_JJ to_TO it_PRP ,_, and_CC no_DT argument_NN or_CC persuasion_NN has_VBZ any_DT effect_NN with_IN them_PRP ,_, their_PRP$ fanaticism_NN and_CC bigo-_JJ try_NN overruling_VBG every_DT thing_NN ._.

55_CD On_IN this_DT point_NN the_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN the_DT Division_NNP remarks_NNS that_IN there_EX would_MD be_VB no_DT objection_NN to_TO a_DT notice_NN being_VBG issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Magistrate_NNP to_TO the_DT effect_NN that_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ solely_RB intended_VBN to_TO protect_VB the_DT people_NNS from_IN small-pox_JJ ,_, or_CC that_IN perhaps_RB the_DT best_JJS course_NN is_VBZ to_TO leave_VB rumours-_NN of_IN this_DT sort_NN to_TO die_VB out_RP when_WRB the_DT people_NNS see_VBP that_IN they_PRP come_VBP to_TO nothing_NN ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP also_RB notes_VBZ that_IN some_DT parents_NNS entertain_VBP a_DT doubt_NN about_IN the_DT prophylactic_JJ influence_NN of_IN vaccin-_JJ ation_NN ,_, on_IN the_DT ground_NN that_IN no_DT eruptions_NNS similar_JJ to_TO those_DT of_IN inoculated_JJ small-pox_JJ appear_NN on_IN the_DT body_NN of_IN their_PRP$ vaccinated_JJ children_NNS ,_, such_JJ eruptions_NNS being_VBG considered_VBN as_IN the_DT only_JJ sure_JJ sign_NN of_IN future_JJ protection_NN ._.
He_PRP explained_VBD to_TO them_PRP that_IN notwithstanding_VBG the_DT absence_NN of_IN the_DT desired_JJ eruptions_NNS vaccination_NN is_VBZ as_RB successful_JJ in_IN affording_VBG pretection_NN as_IN inoculation_NN without_IN the_DT dangers_NNS that_WDT attend_VBP the_DT latter_NN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP of_IN Cuttack_NNP reports_NNS that_IN he_PRP visited_VBD the_DT Pattamundi_NNP sub-circle_NN without_IN any_DT previous_JJ notice_NN ,_, and_CC found_VBD that_IN the_DT vaccinators_NNS were_VBD present_JJ ,_, and_CC that_IN really_RB good_JJ vaccine_NN vesicles_NNS had_VBD been_VBN raised_VBN on_IN the_DT unprotected_JJ who_WP had_VBD received_VBN vaccination_NN ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, instead_RB of_IN going_VBG into_IN camp_NN with_IN his_PRP$ men_NNS at_IN the_DT beginning_NN of_IN the_DT season_NN and_CC remaining_VBG with_IN them_PRP ,_, only_RB appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB visited_VBN them_PRP much_RB according_VBG to_TO his_PRP$ own_JJ convenience_NN ._.
In_IN November_NNP he_PRP was_VBD with_IN them_PRP only_RB nine_CD days_NNS out_IN of_IN the_DT month_NN ,_, excusing_VBG himself_PRP for_IN remaining_VBG in_IN Cuttack_NNP till_VBP the_DT 13th_CD ,_, on_IN the_DT ground_NN that_IN there_EX was_VBD little_JJ work_NN to_TO be_VB inspected_VBN ,_, and_CC returning_VBG there_RB on_IN the_DT 20th_JJ on_IN account_NN of_IN the_DT arrival_NN of_IN his_PRP$ family_NN ,_, as_IN if_IN during_IN the_DT seven_CD recess_JJ months_NNS there_RB was_VBD not_RB ample_JJ time_NN to_TO have_VB arranged_VBN about_IN their_PRP$ coming_NN ._.
If_IN this_DT Superintendent_NNP would_MD understand_VB that_IN his_PRP$ business_NN comprises_NNS much_RB more_JJR than_IN the_DT checking_NN of_IN his_PRP$ vaccinators_NNS '_POS returns_NNS ,_, we_PRP should_MD hear_VB less_JJR of_IN the_DT opposition_NN to_TO vaccination_NN in_IN Orissa_NNP ._.

To_TO send_VB a_DT vaccinator_NN to_TO a_DT zemin-_JJ dar_NN 's_POS house_NN without_IN previous_JJ notice_NN or_CC information_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO expect_VB vaccination_NN to_TO be_VB received_VBN in_IN ignorant_JJ backward_NN districts_NNS ,_, is_VBZ only_RB to_TO invite_VB failure_NN ._.
Even_RB when_WRB small-pox_JJ breaks_NNS out_RP ,_, the_DT Superintendent_NNP seems_VBZ never_RB to_TO trouble_NN himself_PRP to_TO go_VB to_TO the_DT affected_JJ localities_NNS ._.
From_IN the_DT 13th_CD of_IN November_NNP to_TO the_DT 31st_CD of_IN March_NNP he_PRP was_VBD only_RB ,_, as_IN before_IN shown_VBN ,_, 97_CD days_NNS away_RB from_IN Cuttack_NNP ,_, and_CC too_RB many_JJ of_IN this_DT small_JJ number_NN of_IN days_NNS were_VBD uselessly_RB spent_VBN in_IN going_VBG and_CC returning_VBG ._.
This_DT plan_NN of_IN inspection_NN is_VBZ also_RB very_RB faulty_RB ._.
He_PRP goes_VBZ to_TO one_CD place_NN ,_, where_WRB he_PRP remains_VBZ perhaps_RB a_DT fortnight_NN ,_, and_CC passes_VBZ all_DT this_DT time_NN merely_RB revolving_VBG round_RP one_CD small_JJ centre_NN ._.
If_IN the_DT operations_NNS have_VBP spread_VBN over_IN any_DT extended_JJ area_NN ,_, the_DT best_JJS part_NN of_IN his_PRP$ time_NN must_MD be_VB spent_VBN in_IN going_VBG from_IN and_CC returning_VBG to_TO the_DT place_NN he_PRP lodges_VBZ at_IN ._.
He_PRP should_MD have_VB a_DT camp_NN and_CC move_VB it_PRP from_IN place_NN to_TO place_NN ,_, wherever_WP his_PRP$ men_NNS are_VBP working_VBG ._.
His_PRP$ statement_NN that_IN he_PRP has_VBZ travelled_VBN over_RP 1,858_CD miles_NNS proves_VBZ the_DT inefficiency_NN of_IN his_PRP$ mode_NN of_IN conducting_VBG his_PRP$ inspections_NNS ._.

Inoculation_NN ._.
134_CD ._.
Inoculation_NN is_VBZ practised_VBN almost_RB throughout_IN the_DT whole_NN of_IN Orissa_NNP ,_, as_IN the_DT law_NN pro-_NN hibiting_VBG it_PRP is_VBZ not_RB in_IN force_NN in_IN any_DT part_NN of_IN it_PRP except_IN the_DT Balasore_NNP town_NN ._.
But_CC it_PRP is_VBZ said_VBD that_IN in_IN places_NNS where_WRB vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN introduced_VBN during_IN the_DT last_JJ six_CD years_NNS '_POS inoculation_NN is_VBZ on_IN the_DT decline_NN ,_, as_IN most_JJS of_IN the_DT people_NNS appear_VBP to_TO recognize_VB the_DT advantages_NNS of_IN vaccination_NN and_CC its_PRP$ efficacy_NN as_IN a_DT prophylactic_JJ ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP believes_VBZ that_IN the_DT time_NN has_VBZ now_RB arrived_VBN for_IN the_DT introduction_NN of_IN Act_NNP IV_NNP (_( B.C_NNP ._. )_)
of_IN 1865_CD ,_, prohibiting_VBG inoculation_NN ,_, into_IN some_DT parts_NNS of_IN the_DT district_NN of_IN Cuttack_NNP ,_, &_CC quot_NN ;_: especially_RB in_IN those_DT localities_NNS where_WRB vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN introduced_VBN during_IN the_DT last_JJ five_CD or_CC six_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC where_WRB the_DT people_NNS no_RB longer_RB entertain_VB any_DT doubts_NNS about_IN its_PRP$ efficiency_NN in_IN affording_VBG future_JJ protection_NN &_CC quot_NN ;_: Of_IN such_JJ localities_NNS he_PRP selects_VBZ the_DT sub-division_NN of_IN Kendrapara_NNP as_IN the_DT first_JJ area_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT law_NN should_MD be_VB enforced_VBN ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT prohi-_JJ bition_NN of_IN inoculation_NN would_MD not_RB only_RB serve_VB to_TO advance_VB vaccination_NN ,_, but_CC would_MD also_RB induce_VB the_DT inoculators_NNS to_TO give_VB up_RP their_PRP$ trade_NN and_CC take_VB to_TO vaccination_NN ,_, as_IN so_RB long_RB as_IN the_DT prohibitory_NN law_NN is_VBZ not_RB in_IN force_NN it_PRP would_MD be_VB almost_RB impossible_JJ to_TO induce_VB the_DT inoculators_NNS to_TO work_VB on_IN the_DT licensed_JJ system_NN ._.
He_PRP says_VBZ that_IN even_RB now_RB many_JJ of_IN the_DT inoculators_NNS are_VBP willing_JJ to_TO work_VB as_IN paid_JJ vaccinators_NNS ,_, but_CC that_IN it_PRP is_VBZ impossible_JJ to_TO take_VB all_DT of_IN them_PRP into_IN service_NN ._.
The_DT Civil_NNP Surgeon_NNP supports_VBZ the_DT Superintendent_NNP 's_POS recommendation_NN in_IN this_DT matter_NN ,_, but_CC would_MD introduce_VB the_DT law_NN only_RB into_IN the_DT municipalities_NNS of_IN the_DT district_NN ,_, and_CC he_PRP thinks_VBZ that_IN if_IN the_DT law_NN could_MD be_VB enforced_VBN without_IN difficulty_NN in_IN the_DT Balasore_NNP town_NN there_EX is_VBZ no_DT reason_NN why_WRB it_PRP should_MD not_RB be_VB brought_VBN into_IN operation_NN in_IN the_DT Cuttack_NNP town_NN also_RB ,_, where_WRB the_DT people_NNS have_VBP had_VBN at_IN least_JJS equal_JJ oppor-_JJ tunities_NNS of_IN becoming_VBG acquainted_VBN with_IN the_DT superiority_NN of_IN vaccination_NN over_IN inoculation_NN ._.
The_DT Commissioner_NNP of_IN Orissa_NNP ,_, after_IN considering_VBG the_DT remarks_NNS of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP about_IN inocu-_JJ lation_NN declining_VBG as_IN vaccination_NN is_VBZ progressing56_JJ ABSTRACT_NNP OF_NNP REPORTS_NNP BY_NNP SUPERINTENDENTS_NNP ._.
higher_JJR classes_NNS ,_, however_RB ,_, such_JJ as_IN the_DT Brahmins_NNP and_CC Mohantees_NNP ,_, still_RB regard_VB inoculation_NN as_IN a_DT religious_JJ institution_NN ,_, and_CC strongly_RB resist_JJ vaccination_NN ,_, especially_RB in_IN localities_NNS where_WRB it_PRP is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN for_IN the_DT first_JJ time_NN ._.

Prevalence_NN of_IN small_JJ pox_NN ._.
137_CD ._.
From_IN the_DT report_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP it_PRP appears_VBZ that_IN about_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN January_NNP 1881_CD small-pox_NN broke_VBD out_RP in_IN Righagurh_NNP ,_, in_IN Kanika_NNP ,_, in_IN Cuttack_NNP ._.

It_PRP lasted_VBD up_RB to_TO the_DT beginning_NN of_IN March_NNP ,_, and_CC proved_VBD very_RB fatal_JJ ,_, most_JJS of_IN the_DT attacked_JJ having_VBG died_VBN ._.

The_DT following_JJ statement_NN shows_VBZ the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS per-_NNS formed_VBN in_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT past_JJ three_CD years_NNS in_IN each_DT of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN circles_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN dispensaries_NNS and_CC municipalities_NNS :_: (_( 3_CD )_) altogether_RB worthless_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Ranchi_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, the_DT success_NN in_IN secondary_JJ operations_NNS is_VBZ actually_RB shown_VBN as_IN greater_JJR than_IN in_IN primary_JJ operations_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP ,_, the_DT proportion_NN of_IN successful_JJ secondary_JJ operations_NNS to_TO the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN such_JJ operations_NNS is_VBZ entered_VBN at_IN 94.62_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
With_IN such_JJ figures_NNS as_IN these_DT before_IN him_PRP ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ difficult_JJ for_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP to_TO place_VB much_JJ reliance_NN on_IN the_DT returns_NNS furnished_VBN by_IN the_DT same_JJ operators_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ success_NN in_IN pri-_JJ mary_JJ vaccination_NN ._.

The_DT figures_NNS for_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC the_DT Suburbs_NNP can_MD probably_RB be_VB depended_VBN upon_IN ,_, and_CC these_DT show_VBP respectively_RB 8.06_CD and_CC 17.85_CD as_IN the_DT percentage_NN of_IN successful_JJ operations_NNS in_IN secondary_JJ vaccinations_NNS ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT average_JJ number_NN of_IN operations_NNS performed_VBN by_IN each_DT vaccinator_NN during_IN 1880-81_JJ ,_, was_VBD 1,256_CD against_IN 1,443_CD in_IN 1879-80_CD ,_, and_CC 1,191_CD in_IN 1878-79_JJ ._.

6_CD ._.

respectively_RB of_IN those_DT operated_VBN on_IN were_VBD below_IN one_CD year_NN of_IN age_NN ._.

of_IN the_DT number_NN born_VBN in_IN the_DT areas_NNS under_IN opera-_JJ tion_NN ._.

7_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN villages_NNS visited_VBN by_IN officers_NNS of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD 21,628_CD ,_, while_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN cases_NNS inspected_VBN was_VBD 918,049_CD out_IN of_IN 1,326,628_CD cases_NNS within_IN the_DT area_NN of_IN inspection_NN ._.

of_IN the_DT operations_NNS of_IN licensed_JJ vaccina-_JJ tors_NNS were_VBD inspected_VBN ,_, in_IN the_DT Ranchi_NNP Circle_NNP only_RB 46.20_CD ,_, in_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP Circle_NNP only_RB 33.24_CD ,_, and_CC in_IN Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP only_RB 18.99_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
The_DT Deputy_NNP Superin-_NNP tendent_NN of_IN the_DT latter_JJ circle_NN appears_VBZ to_TO have_VB altogether_RB neglected_VBN the_DT duties_NNS of_IN his_PRP$ office_NN ;_: but_CC it_PRP is_VBZ unnecessary_JJ for_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ to_TO say_VB here_RB anything_NN more_JJR upon_IN the_DT subject_NN ,_, as_IN a_DT special_JJ report_NN is_VBZ to_TO be_VB submitted_VBN by_IN the_DT Superintend-_NNP ent_NN to_TO the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP ._.
The_DT punishment_NN of_IN degradation_NN to_TO a_DT lower_JJR grade_NN inflicted_VBN on_IN the_DT head_NN vaccinator_NN in_IN the_DT Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, who_WP submitted_VBD false_JJ returns_NNS and_CC fictitious_JJ statements_NNS of_IN inspections_NNS and_CC concealed_JJ extortion_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN one_CD of_IN his_PRP$ subordinates_NNS ,_, appears_VBZ to_TO the_DT Lieutenant-_NNP Governor_NNP to_TO be_VB wholly_RB inadequate_JJ ._.
If_IN the_DT offences_NNS charged_VBN were_VBD all_DT clearly_RB proved_VBN ,_, the_DT man_NN should_MD be_VB dismissed_VBN ._.
The_DT vaccinator_NN against_IN whom_WP a_DT charge_NN of_IN extortion_NN is_VBZ reported_VBN to_TO have_VB been_VBN established_VBN should_MD also_RB be_VB discharged_VBN ,_, (_( 4_CD )_) unless_IN there_EX were_VBD some_DT circumstances_NNS connected_VBN with_IN the_DT case_NN that_WDT are_VBP not_RB mentioned_VBN in_IN the_DT report_NN ._.
So_RB much_JJ of_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT vaccination_NN staff_NN is_VBZ necessarily_RB without_IN supervision_NN ,_, that_IN when_WRB offences_NNS are_VBP detected_VBN they_PRP must_MD be_VB severely_RB punished_VBN ._.
The_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ agrees_NNS with_IN the_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP that_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP of_IN the_DT Orissa_NNP Circle_NNP ,_, Assistant_NNP Surgeon_NNP Prisitosh_NNP Haldar_NNP ,_, did_VBD not_RB sufficiently_RB exert_VBZ himself_PRP to_TO meet_VB the_DT out-_JJ break_NN of_IN small-pox_NN in_IN the_DT Orissa_NNP Division_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN 1880-81_RB ._.

8_CD ._.
The_DT total_JJ cost_NN of_IN the_DT Vaccination_NNP Department_NNP in_IN the_DT year_NN 1880-81_CD was_VBD Rs_NNP ._.

7,141_CD the_DT expenditure_NN on_IN vaccination_NN in_IN municipalities_NNS and_CC dispensaries_NNS ._.
The_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT success-_JJ ful_JJ operation_NN in_IN the_DT province_NN was_VBD 1_CD anna_JJ 3_CD pies_NNS against_IN 1_CD anna_JJ 1½_CD pies_NNS in_IN 1879-80_JJ ,_, and_CC 1_CD anna_NN 6_CD pies_NNS in_IN 1878-79_JJ ._.
The_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN each_DT operation_NN by_IN the_DT Government_NNP staff_NN was_VBD 1_CD anna_JJ 10¾_CD pies_NNS ,_, of_IN each_DT operation_NN by_IN the_DT licensed_JJ agency_NN 10¼_CD pies_NNS ,_, and_CC of_IN each_DT operation_NN in_IN dispensaries_NNS and_CC municipalities_NNS 2_CD annas_NNS 3¾_CD pies_NNS ._.
The_DT cost_NN of_IN each_DT successful_JJ case_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP was_VBD 14_CD annas_JJ 10_CD pies_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT suburbs_JJ 6_CD annas_NNS 10_CD pies_NNS ,_, in_IN Behar_NNP 5_CD annas_NNS 1_CD pie_NN ,_, in_IN Orissa_NNP 2_CD annas_NNS 1_CD pie_NN ,_, in_IN the_DT Metropolitan_NNP Circles_NNP 1_CD anna_NN 5¼_CD pies_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT Ranchi_NNP Circle_NNP 1_CD anna_NN 2_CD pies_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT Sonthal_NNP Pergunnahs_NNP 1_CD anna_VBD 1_CD 1/5_CD pies_NNS ,_, in_IN the_DT Darjeeling_NNP Circle_NNP 1_CD anna_NN 01/3_CD pies_NNS ,_, and_CC in_IN the_DT Eastern_NNP Bengal_NNP Circle_NNP 7½_CD pies_NNS ._.
The_DT general_JJ increase_NN in_IN the_DT average_JJ cost_NN of_IN operations_NNS in_IN the_DT past_JJ year_NN as_IN compared_VBN with_IN 1879-80_JJ is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT distribution_NN of_IN the_DT charges_NNS for_IN establishment_NN over_IN a_DT smaller_JJR number_NN of_IN operations_NNS ;_: for_IN although_IN the_DT gross_JJ cost_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN was_VBD lower_JJR last_JJ year_NN than_IN in_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, the_DT proportion_NN of_IN decrease_NN to_TO the_DT total_JJ cost_NN was_VBD far_RB below_IN the_DT proportion_NN of_IN decrease_NN in_IN operations_NNS to_TO the_DT total_JJ operations_NNS of_IN the_DT department_NN ._.
9_CD ._.
There_EX are_VBP indications_NNS in_IN the_DT reports_NNS of_IN the_DT year_NN that_IN the_DT attitude_NN of_IN the_DT people_NNS towards_NNS vaccination_NN is_VBZ improving_VBG throughout_IN the_DT province_NN ,_, as_RB well_RB as_IN in_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC the_DT Suburbs_NNP where_WRB a_DT law_NN making_VBG vaccination_NN compulsory_NN has_VBZ been_VBN successfully_RB introduced_VBN with_IN the_DT approval_NN of_IN the_DT public_NN ._.
There_EX are_VBP still_RB ,_, however_RB ,_, many_JJ instances_NNS in_IN which_WDT extravagant_JJ beliefs_NNS and_CC prejudices_NNS are_VBP held_VBN against_IN vaccination_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT names_NNS of_IN several_JJ persons_NNS of_IN influence_NN and-_JJ position_NN are_VBP mentioned_VBN in_IN the_DT report_NN as_IN opponents_NNS of_IN the_DT work_NN of_IN the_DT department_NN ._.
The_DT Sanitary_NNP Commissioner_NNP should_MD inform_VB the_DT Inspector-General_NNP of_IN Police_NNP of_IN the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT opposition_NN offered_VBN by_IN Mofut_NNP Hossein_NNP ,_, Inspector_NNP of_IN the_DT Colgong_NNP thana_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT matter_NN will_MD then_RB be_VB properly_RB enquired_VBN into_IN and_CC dealt_VB with_IN ._.
It_PRP would_MD seem_VB ,_, from_IN the_DT abstract_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP 's_POS report_NN ,_, that_IN the_DT inspector_NN was_VBD passively_RB indifferent_JJ rather_RB than_IN actively_RB opposed_VBN to_TO the_DT opera-_JJ tions_NNS of_IN the_DT department_NN ._.

._.
The_DT thanks_NNS of_IN Government_NNP are_VBP due_JJ to_TO the_DT zemindars_NNS Gopendra_NNP Nath_NNP Chowdhri_NNP of_IN Purchetgurh_NNP and_CC Kaliporosonno_NNP Gojendra_NNP Mohapatro_NNP of_IN Khemdroee_NNP ,_, to_TO Ali_NNP Jan_NNP Meah_NNP and_CC Baboos_NNP Shamachurn_NNP Ruth_NNP and_CC Ajudhya_NNP Nath_NNP Koila_NNP of_IN Midnapore_NNP ,_, to_TO Ajijar_NNP Rahman_NNP of_IN Chanderdhai_NNP in_IN Purneah_NNP ,_, and_CC to_TO Baboos_NNP Modhosudan_NNP Sing_NNP ,_, Lakhicharn_NNP Mondal_NNP ,_, and_CC Amar_NNP Nath_NNP Sing_NNP ,_, zemindars_VBZ in_IN the_DT Banka_NNP sub_NN division_NN ,_, for_IN the_DT assistance_NN given_VBN by_IN them_PRP to_TO the_DT operations_NNS of_IN the_DT department_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ to_TO learn_VB that_IN the_DT Maharajah_NNP of_IN Shusung_NNP asked_VBD last_JJ year_NN that_IN vaccination_NN might_MD be_VB introduced_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ estate_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_JJ trusts_NNS that_IN the_DT example_NN set_VBN by_IN him_PRP and_CC the_DT other_JJ gentle-_JJ men_NNS named_VBN above_IN will_MD be_VB followed_VBN by_IN other_JJ zemindars_NNS and_CC persons_NNS of_IN influence_NN throughout_IN the_DT country_NN ._.

(_( B.C_NNP ._. )_)
of_IN 1865_CD ,_, prohibiting_VBG the_DT practice_NN of_IN inoculation_NN ,_, was_VBD last_JJ year_NN extended_VBD to_TO the_DT Darjeeling_NNP Terai_NNP ,_, six_CD thanas_NNS in_IN Purneah_NNP ,_, the_DT town_NN of_IN Pooree_NNP ,_, six_CD thanas_NNS in_IN Mymensing_NNP ,_, and_CC four_CD thanas_NN in_IN Patna_NNP ,_, and_CC since_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN the_DT Act_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN introduced_VBN into_IN seven_CD more_JJR thanas_NNS in_IN the_DT Purneah_NNP district_NN ._.

of_IN 1880_CD came_VBD into_IN operation_NN in_IN Calcutta_NNP and_CC the_DT Suburbs_NNP and_CC in_IN the_DT Port_NNP of_IN Calcutta_NNP on_IN the_DT 17th_CD May_NNP 1880_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT arrange-_JJ ments_NNS made_VBN for_IN its_PRP$ introduction_NN and_CC working_VBG have_VBP already_RB been_VBN noticed_VBN by_IN the_DT Lieutenant-Governor_NNP in_IN his_PRP$ review_NN of_IN the_DT Health_NNP Officer_NNP 's_POS report_NN appended_VBD to_TO the_DT report_NN of_IN the_DT Calcutta_NNP Municipality_NNP for_IN the_DT past_JJ year.._NN
